## <a name="nx_arp_dynamic_entries_invalidate"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-114">nx_arp_dynamic_entries_invalidate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-114">nx_arp_dynamic_entries_invalidate</span></span>   
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-115">Invalida tutte le voci dinamiche nella cache ARP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-115">Invalidate all dynamic entries in the ARP cache</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-116">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-116">Prototype</span></span>     

```c
UINT nx_arp_dynamic_entries_invalidate(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-117">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-117">Description</span></span>   
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-118">Questo servizio invalida tutte le voci ARP dinamiche attualmente presenti nella cache ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-118">This service invalidates all dynamic ARP entries currently in the ARP cache.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-119">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-119">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-120">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-120">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-121">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-121">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-122">L'invalidamento della cache ARP riuscita **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-122">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP cache invalidate.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-123">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) ARP non è abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-123">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) ARP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-124">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) indirizzo IP non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-124">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-125">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) non è un thread.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-125">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller is not a thread.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-126">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-126">Allowed From</span></span>   
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-127">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-127">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-128">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-128">Preemption Possible</span></span>    
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-129">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-129">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-130">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-130">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Invalidate all dynamic entries in the ARP cache. */
status = nx_arp_dynamic_entries_invalidate(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the dynamic ARP entries were
   successfully invalidated. */
```

## <a name="nx_arp_dynamic_entry_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-147">nx_arp_dynamic_entry_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-147">nx_arp_dynamic_entry_set</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-148">Imposta voce ARP dinamica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-148">Set dynamic ARP entry</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-149">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-149">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_dynamic_entry_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG physical_msw,
    ULONG physical_lsw);  
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-150">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-150">Description</span></span>    
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-151">Questo servizio alloca una voce dinamica dalla cache ARP e imposta l'indirizzo IP specificato sul mapping degli indirizzi fisici.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-151">This service allocates a dynamic entry from the ARP cache and sets up the specified IP to physical address mapping.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-152">Se viene specificato un indirizzo fisico zero, alla rete viene inviata una richiesta ARP effettiva per poter risolvere l'indirizzo fisico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-152">If a zero physical address is specified, an actual ARP request is sent to the network in order to have the physical address resolved.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-153">Si noti inoltre che questa voce verrà rimossa se ARP aging è attivo o se la cache ARP è esaurita e si tratta della voce ARP usata meno di recente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-153">Also note that this entry will be removed if ARP aging is active or if the ARP cache is exhausted and this is the least recently used ARP entry.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-154">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-154">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-155">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-155">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-156">**ip_address** Indirizzo IP da mappare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-156">**ip_address** IP address to map.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-157">**physical_msw** Primi 16 bit (47-32) dell'indirizzo fisico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-157">**physical_msw** Top 16 bits (47-32) of the physical address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-158">**physical_lsw** Inferiore 32 bit (31-0) dell'indirizzo fisico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-158">**physical_lsw** Lower 32 bits (31-0) of the physical address.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-159">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-159">Return Values</span></span>    

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-160">Il set di voci dinamiche ARP riuscite **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-160">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP dynamic entry set.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-161">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) non sono disponibili altre voci ARP nella cache ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-161">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) No more ARP entries are available in the ARP cache.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-162">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) indirizzo IP non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-162">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-163">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore a istanza IP non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-163">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-164">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) questo componente non è stato abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-164">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-165">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-165">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-166">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-166">Allowed From</span></span>    
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-167">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-167">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-168">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-168">Preemption Possible</span></span>    
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-169">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-169">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-170">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-170">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Setup a dynamic ARP entry on the previously created IP
   Instance 0. */
status = nx_arp_dynamic_entry_set(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,4),
                                  0x1022, 0x1234);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, there is now a dynamic mapping between
   the IP address of 1.2.3.4 and the physical hardware address of
   10:22:00:00:12:34. */
```

## <a name="nx_arp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-187">nx_arp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-187">nx_arp_enable</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-188">Abilita ARP (Address Resolution Protocol)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-188">Enable Address Resolution Protocol (ARP)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-189">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-189">Prototype</span></span>    

```c
UINT nx_arp_enable(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    VOID *arp_cache_memory,
    ULONG arp_cache_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-190">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-190">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-191">Questo servizio Inizializza il componente ARP di NetX Duo per l'istanza IP specifica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-191">This service initializes the ARP component of NetX Duo for the specific IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-192">L'inizializzazione ARP include la configurazione della cache ARP e delle varie routine di elaborazione ARP necessarie per l'invio e la ricezione di messaggi ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-192">ARP initialization includes setting up the ARP cache and various ARP processing routines necessary for sending and receiving ARP messages.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-193">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-193">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-194">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-194">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-195">**arp_cache_memory** Puntatore all'area memoria per inserire la cache ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-195">**arp_cache_memory** Pointer to memory area to place ARP cache.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-196">**arp_cache_size** Ogni voce ARP è 52 byte, il numero totale di voci ARP è, di conseguenza, la dimensione divisa per 52.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-196">**arp_cache_size** Each ARP entry is 52 bytes, the total number of ARP entries is, therefore, the size divided by 52.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-197">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-197">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-198">Abilitazione ARP riuscita **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-198">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP enable.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-200">La memoria della cache ARP fornita dall'utente **NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) è troppo piccola.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-200">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) User supplied ARP cache memory is too small.</span></span>

```c
/* Enable ARP and supply 1024 bytes of ARP cache memory for
   previously created IP Instance ip_0. */

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, ARP was successfully enabled for this IP
instance.*/
```

## <a name="nx_arp_entry_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-224">nx_arp_entry_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-224">nx_arp_entry_delete</span></span>   
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-225">Elimina una voce ARP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-225">Delete an ARP entry</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-226">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-226">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_entry_delete(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG ip_address);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-227">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-227">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-228">Questo servizio rimuove una voce ARP per l'indirizzo IP specificato dalla relativa tabella ARP interna IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-228">This service removes an ARP entry for the given IP address from its IP internal ARP table.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-229">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-229">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-230">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-230">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-231">**ip_address** La voce ARP con l'indirizzo IP specificato deve essere eliminata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-231">**ip_address** ARP entry with the specified IP address should be deleted.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-232">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-232">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-233">Abilitazione ARP riuscita **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-233">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-234">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) non è possibile trovare alcuna voce con l'indirizzo IP specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-234">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) No entry with the specified IP address can be found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-235">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) un puntatore di memoria cache o un indirizzo IP non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-235">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or cache memory pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-236">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-236">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-237">Il **NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) indirizzo IP specificato non è valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-237">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Specified IP address is invalid.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-238">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-238">Allowed From</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-239">Inizializzazione, thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-239">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-240">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-240">Preemption Possible</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-241">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-241">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-242">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-242">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Delete the ARP entry with the IP address 1.2.3.4. */
status = nx_arp_entry_delete(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1, 2, 3, 4));

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, ARP entry with the specified IP address
   is deleted.*/
```

## <a name="nx_arp_gratuitous_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-259">nx_arp_gratuitous_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-259">nx_arp_gratuitous_send</span></span>   
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-260">Inviare una richiesta ARP gratuita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-260">Send gratuitous ARP request</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-261">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-261">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_gratuitous_send(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    VOID (*response_handler)(NX_IP *ip_ptr, NX_PACKET *packet_ptr));
```                               
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-262">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-262">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-263">Questo servizio attraversa tutte le interfacce fisiche per trasmettere richieste ARP gratuite, purché l'indirizzo IP dell'interfaccia sia valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-263">This service goes through all the physical interfaces to transmit gratuitous ARP requests as long as the interface IP address is valid.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-264">Se successivamente viene ricevuta una risposta ARP, viene chiamato il gestore di risposta fornito per elaborare la risposta all'ARP gratuito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-264">If an ARP response is subsequently received, the supplied response handler is called to process the response to the gratuitous ARP.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-265">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-265">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-266">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-266">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-267">**response_handler** Puntatore alla funzione di gestione delle risposte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-267">**response_handler** Pointer to response handling function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-268">Se viene specificato NX_NULL, le risposte verranno ignorate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-268">If NX_NULL is supplied, responses are ignored.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-269">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-269">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-270">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) la trasmissione ARP gratuita è stata completata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-270">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful gratuitous ARP send.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-271">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) non è disponibile alcun pacchetto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-271">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) No packet available.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-272">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) ARP non è abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-272">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) ARP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-273">L'indirizzo IP corrente **NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) non è valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-273">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Current IP address is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-274">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore IP non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-274">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-275">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) non è un thread.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-275">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller is not a thread.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-276">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-276">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-277">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-277">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-278">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-278">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-279">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-279">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-280">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-280">Example</span></span>

```
/* Send gratuitous ARP without any response handler. */
status = nx_arp_gratuitous_send(&ip_0, NX_NULL);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the gratuitous ARP was successfully
   sent. */
```

## <a name="nx_arp_hardware_address_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-297">nx_arp_hardware_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-297">nx_arp_hardware_address_find</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-298">Individuare l'indirizzo hardware fisico dato un indirizzo IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-298">Locate physical hardware address given an IP address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-299">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-299">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_hardware_address_find(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG *physical_msw,
    ULONG *physical_lsw);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-300">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-300">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-301">Questo servizio tenta di trovare un indirizzo hardware fisico nella cache ARP che è associato all'indirizzo IP specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-301">This service attempts to find a physical hardware address in the ARP cache that is associated with the supplied IP address.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-302">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-302">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-303">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-303">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-304">**ip_address** Indirizzo IP da cercare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-304">**ip_address** IP address to search for.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-305">**physical_msw** Puntatore alla variabile per la restituzione dei primi 16 bit (47-32) dell'indirizzo fisico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-305">**physical_msw** Pointer to the variable for returning the top 16 bits (47-32) of the physical address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-306">**physical_lsw** Puntatore alla variabile per la restituzione dei 32 bit inferiori (31-0) dell'indirizzo fisico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-306">**physical_lsw** Pointer to the variable for returning the lower 32 bits (31-0) of the physical address.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-307">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-307">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-308">Ricerca di indirizzi hardware ARP riuscita **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-308">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP hardware address find.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-309">Il mapping di **NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) non è stato trovato nella cache ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-309">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Mapping was not found in the ARP cache.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-310">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) indirizzo IP non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-310">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-311">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) un puntatore di memoria o un indirizzo IP non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-311">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or memory pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-312">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-312">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-313">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) questo componente non è stato abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-313">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-317">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-317">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-318">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-318">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Search for the hardware address associated with the IP address of
   1.2.3.4 in the ARP cache of the previously created IP
   Instance 0. */
status = nx_arp_hardware_address_find(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,4),
                                      &physical_msw,
                                      &physical_lsw);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the variables physical_msw and
   physical_lsw contain the hardware address.*/
```

## <a name="nx_arp_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-335">nx_arp_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-335">nx_arp_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-336">Recuperare informazioni sulle attività ARP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-336">Retrieve information about ARP activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-337">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-337">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *arp_requests_sent,
    ULONG *arp_requests_received,
    ULONG *arp_responses_sent,
    ULONG *arp_responses_received,
    ULONG *arp_dynamic_entries,
    ULONG *arp_static_entries,
    ULONG *arp_aged_entries,
    ULONG *arp_invalid_messages);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-338">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-338">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-339">Questo servizio recupera informazioni sulle attività ARP per l'istanza IP associata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-339">This service retrieves information about ARP activities for the associated IP instance.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-340">*Se un puntatore di destinazione è NX_NULL, le informazioni specifiche non vengono restituite al chiamante*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-340">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-341">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-341">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-342">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-342">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-343">**arp_requests_sent** Puntatore alla destinazione per le richieste ARP totali inviate da questa istanza IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-343">**arp_requests_sent** Pointer to destination for the total ARP requests sent from this IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-344">**arp_requests_received** Puntatore alla destinazione per le richieste ARP totali ricevute dalla rete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-344">**arp_requests_received** Pointer to destination for the total ARP requests received from the network.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-345">**arp_responses_sent** Puntatore alla destinazione per le risposte ARP totali inviate da questa istanza IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-345">**arp_responses_sent** Pointer to destination for the total ARP responses sent from this IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-346">**arp_responses_received** Puntatore alla destinazione per le risposte ARP totali ricevute dalla rete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-346">**arp_responses_received** Pointer to the destination for the total ARP responses received from the network.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-347">**arp_dynamic_entries** Puntatore alla destinazione per il numero corrente di voci ARP dinamiche.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-347">**arp_dynamic_entries** Pointer to the destination for the current number of dynamic ARP entries.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-348">**arp_static_entries** Puntatore alla destinazione per il numero corrente di voci ARP statiche.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-348">**arp_static_entries** Pointer to the destination for the current number of static ARP entries.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-349">**arp_aged_entries** Puntatore alla destinazione del numero totale di voci ARP obsolete e diventate non valide.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-349">**arp_aged_entries** Pointer to the destination of the total number of ARP entries that have aged and became invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-350">**arp_invalid_messages** Puntatore alla destinazione del totale dei messaggi ARP non validi ricevuti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-350">**arp_invalid_messages** Pointer to the destination of the total invalid ARP messages received.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-351">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-351">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-352">Il recupero delle informazioni ARP riuscite **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-352">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-353">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore IP non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-353">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-354">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-354">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-355">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) questo componente non è stato abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-355">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-357">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-357">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-358">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-358">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-359">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-359">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-360">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-360">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Pickup ARP information for ip_0. */
status = nx_arp_info_get(&ip_0, &arp_requests_sent,
                         &arp_requests_received,
                         &arp_responses_sent,
                         &arp_responses_received,
                         &arp_dynamic_entries,
                         &arp_static_entries,
                         &arp_aged_entries,
                         &arp_invalid_messages);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the ARP information has been stored in
   the supplied variables. */
```

## <a name="nx_arp_ip_address_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-377">nx_arp_ip_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-377">nx_arp_ip_address_find</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-378">Individuare l'indirizzo IP in base a un indirizzo fisico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-378">Locate IP address given a physical address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-379">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-379">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_ip_address_find(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG *ip_address,
    ULONG physical_msw, 
    ULONG physical_lsw);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-380">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-380">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-381">Questo servizio tenta di trovare un indirizzo IP nella cache ARP associata all'indirizzo fisico fornito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-381">This service attempts to find an IP address in the ARP cache that is associated with the supplied physical address.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-382">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-382">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-383">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-383">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-384">**ip_address** Puntatore per restituire l'indirizzo IP, se ne viene trovato uno mappato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-384">**ip_address** Pointer to return IP address, if one is found that has been mapped.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-385">**physical_msw** Primi 16 bit (47-32) dell'indirizzo fisico da cercare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-385">**physical_msw** Top 16 bits (47-32) of the physical address to search for.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-386">**physical_lsw** Inferiore 32 bit (31-0) dell'indirizzo fisico da cercare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-386">**physical_lsw** Lower 32 bits (31-0) of the physical address to search for.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-387">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-387">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-388">Ricerca di indirizzi IP ARP riusciti **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-388">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP IP address find</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-389">Il mapping di **NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) non è stato trovato nella cache ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-389">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Mapping was not found in the ARP cache.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-390">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) un puntatore di memoria o un indirizzo IP non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-390">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or memory pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-391">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-391">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-392">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) questo componente non è stato abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-392">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-393">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (irreversibile 0x4d) Physical_msw e physical_lsw sono entrambi 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-393">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Physical_msw and physical_lsw are both 0.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-394">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-394">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-395">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-395">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-396">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-396">Preemption Possible</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-398">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-398">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Search for the IP address associated with the hardware address of
   0x0:0x01234 in the ARP cache of the previously created IP
   Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_arp_ip_address_find(&ip_0, &ip_address, 0x0, 0x1234);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the variables ip_address contains the
   associated IP address. */
```

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-419">Questo servizio Elimina tutte le voci statiche nella cache ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-419">This service deletes all static entries in the ARP cache.</span></span>

## <a name="nx_arp_static_entry_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-448">nx_arp_static_entry_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-448">nx_arp_static_entry_create</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-449">Creare un indirizzo IP statico al mapping hardware nella cache ARP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-449">Create static IP to hardware mapping in ARP cache</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-450">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-450">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_static_entry_create(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG physical_msw,
    ULONG physical_lsw);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-451">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-451">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-452">Questo servizio crea un mapping statico da indirizzo IP a fisico nella cache ARP per l'istanza IP specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-452">This service creates a static IP-to-physical address mapping in the ARP cache for the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-453">Le voci ARP statiche non sono soggette ad aggiornamenti periodici ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-453">Static ARP entries are not subject to ARP periodic updates.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-454">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-454">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-455">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-455">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-456">**ip_address** Indirizzo IP da mappare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-456">**ip_address** IP address to map.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-457">**physical_msw** Primi 16 bit (47-32) dell'indirizzo fisico da mappare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-457">**physical_msw** Top 16 bits (47-32) of the physical address to map.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-458">**physical_lsw** Inferiore 32 bit (31-0) dell'indirizzo fisico da mappare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-458">**physical_lsw** Lower 32 bits (31-0) of the physical address to map.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-459">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-459">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-460">Creazione di una voce statica ARP riuscita **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-460">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP static entry create.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-461">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) non sono disponibili altre voci ARP nella cache ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-461">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) No more ARP entries are available in the ARP cache.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-462">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) indirizzo IP non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-462">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-463">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore IP non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-463">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-464">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-464">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-465">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) questo componente non è stato abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-465">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-466">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (irreversibile 0x4d) Physical_msw e physical_lsw sono entrambi 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-466">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Physical_msw and physical_lsw are both 0.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-467">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-467">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-468">Inizializzazione, thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-468">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-469">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-469">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-470">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-470">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-471">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-471">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Create a static ARP entry on the previously created IP
   Instance 0. */
status = nx_arp_static_entry_create(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,4),
                                    0x0, 0x1234);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, there is now a static mapping between
   the IP address of 1.2.3.4 and the physical hardware address of
   0x00:0x1234. */
```

## <a name="nx_arp_static_entry_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-488">nx_arp_static_entry_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-488">nx_arp_static_entry_delete</span></span> 
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-489">Eliminare l'indirizzo IP statico al mapping hardware nella cache ARP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-489">Delete static IP to hardware mapping in ARP cache</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-490">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-490">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_static_entry_delete(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG physical_msw,
    ULONG physical_lsw);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-491">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-491">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-492">Questo servizio trova ed elimina un mapping statico da indirizzo IP a fisico creato in precedenza nella cache ARP per l'istanza IP specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-492">This service finds and deletes a previously created static IP-to-physical address mapping in the ARP cache for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-493">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-493">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-494">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-494">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-495">**ip_address** Indirizzo IP mappato in modo statico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-495">**ip_address** IP address that was mapped statically.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-496">**physical_msw** Primi 16 bit (47-\* \* 32) dell'indirizzo fisico mappato in modo statico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-496">**physical_msw** Top 16 bits (47 - \*\*32) of the physical address that was mapped statically.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-497">**physical_lsw** Inferiore 32 bit (31-\* \* 0) dell'indirizzo fisico mappato in modo statico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-497">**physical_lsw** Lower 32 bits (31 - \*\*0) of the physical address that was mapped statically.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-498">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-498">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-499">Eliminazione di una voce statica ARP riuscita **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-499">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP static entry delete.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-500">La voce ARP statica **NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) non è stata trovata nella cache ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-500">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Static ARP entry was not found in the ARP cache.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-501">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore IP non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-501">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-503">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) questo componente non è stato abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-503">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

## <a name="nx_icmp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-527">nx_icmp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-527">nx_icmp_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-528">Abilita Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-528">Enable Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-529">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-529">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_icmp_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-530">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-530">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-531">Questo servizio Abilita il componente ICMP per l'istanza IP specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-531">This service enables the ICMP component for the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-532">Il componente ICMP è responsabile della gestione dei messaggi di errore Internet e delle richieste di ping e delle risposte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-532">The ICMP component is responsible for handling Internet error messages and ping requests and replies.</span></span> 

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-533">\*Questo servizio Abilita solo ICMP per il servizio IPv4. Per abilitare sia ICMPv4 che ICMPv6, le applicazioni devono usare il servizio \*\*nxd_icmp_enable\*\*\*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-533">*This service only enables ICMP for IPv4 service. To enable both ICMPv4 and ICMPv6, applications shall use the **nxd_icmp_enable** service*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-534">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-534">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-535">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-535">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-536">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-536">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-537">Abilitazione ICMP riuscita **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-537">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ICMP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-538">Il protocollo ICMP **NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) è già abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-538">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) ICMP is already enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-539">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore IP non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-539">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-540">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-540">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-541">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-541">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-542">Inizializzazione, thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-542">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-543">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-543">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-544">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-544">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-545">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-545">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable ICMP on the previously created IP Instance ip_0. */

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, ICMP is enabled. */
```

## <a name="nx_icmp_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-553">nx_icmp_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-553">nx_icmp_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-554">Recuperare informazioni sulle attività ICMP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-554">Retrieve information about ICMP activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-555">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-555">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_icmp_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *pings_sent,
    ULONG *ping_timeouts,
    ULONG *ping_threads_suspended,
    ULONG *ping_responses_received,
    ULONG *icmp_checksum_errors,
    ULONG *icmp_unhandled_messages);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-556">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-556">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-557">Questo servizio recupera informazioni sulle attività ICMP per l'istanza IP specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-557">This service retrieves information about ICMP activities for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]  
> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-558">*Se un puntatore di destinazione è NX_NULL, le informazioni specifiche non vengono restituite al chiamante*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-558">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-559">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-559">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-560">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-560">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-561">**pings_sent** Puntatore alla destinazione per il numero totale di ping inviati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-561">**pings_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of pings sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-562">**ping_timeouts** Puntatore alla destinazione per il numero totale di timeout del ping.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-562">**ping_timeouts** Pointer to destination for the total number of ping timeouts.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-563">**ping_threads_suspended** Puntatore alla destinazione del numero totale di thread sospesi nelle richieste di ping.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-563">**ping_threads_suspended** Pointer to destination of the total number of threads suspended on ping requests.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-564">**ping_responses_received** Puntatore alla destinazione del numero totale di risposte ping ricevute.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-564">**ping_responses_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of ping responses received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-565">**icmp_checksum_errors** Puntatore alla destinazione del numero totale di errori di checksum ICMP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-565">**icmp_checksum_errors** Pointer to destination of the total number of ICMP checksum errors.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-566">**icmp_unhandled_messages** Puntatore alla destinazione del numero totale di messaggi ICMP non gestiti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-566">**icmp_unhandled_messages** Pointer to destination of the total number of un-handled ICMP messages.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-567">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-567">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-568">Il recupero delle informazioni ICMP riuscite **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-568">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ICMP information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-569">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-569">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-570">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore IP non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-570">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-571">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) questo componente non è stato abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-571">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-572">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-572">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-573">Inizializzazione, thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-573">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-574">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-574">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-575">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-575">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-576">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-576">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve ICMP information from previously created IP
   instance ip_0. */
status = nx_icmp_info_get(&ip_0, &pings_sent, &ping_timeouts,
                          &ping_threads_suspended,
                          &ping_responses_received,
                          &icmp_checksum_errors,
                          &icmp_unhandled_messages);
/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, ICMP information was retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_icmp_ping"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-584">nx_icmp_ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-584">nx_icmp_ping</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-585">Invia richiesta ping all'indirizzo IP specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-585">Send ping request to specified IP address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-586">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-586">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_icmp_ping(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    CHAR *data, ULONG data_size,
    NX_PACKET **response_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-587">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-587">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-588">Questo servizio invia una richiesta ping all'indirizzo IP specificato e attende il periodo di tempo specificato per un messaggio di risposta ping.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-588">This service sends a ping request to the specified IP address and waits for the specified amount of time for a ping response message.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-589">Se non viene ricevuta alcuna risposta, viene restituito un errore.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-589">If no response is received, an error is returned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-590">In caso contrario, viene restituito l'intero messaggio di risposta nella variabile a cui punta response_ptr.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-590">Otherwise, the entire response message is returned in the variable pointed to by response_ptr.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-591">Per inviare una richiesta ping a una destinazione IPv6, le applicazioni devono usare il servizio \***nxd_icmp_ping** _ o _ \*_nxd_icmp_source_ping_\*\*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-591">To send a ping request to an IPv6 destination, applications shall use the ***nxd_icmp_ping** _ or _ *_nxd_icmp_source_ping_** service.</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-592">*Se viene restituito NX_SUCCESS, l'applicazione è responsabile del rilascio del pacchetto ricevuto dopo che non è più necessario*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-592">*If NX_SUCCESS is returned, the application is responsible for releasing the received packet after it is no longer needed*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-593">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-593">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-594">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-594">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-595">**ip_address** Indirizzo IP, in ordine byte host, per eseguire il ping.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-595">**ip_address** IP address, in host byte order, to ping.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-596">**dati** di Puntatore all'area dati per il messaggio ping.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-596">**data** Pointer to data area for ping message.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-597">**DATA_SIZE** Numero di byte nei dati ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-597">**data_size** Number of bytes in the ping data</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-598">**response_ptr** Puntatore al puntatore del pacchetto per restituire il messaggio di risposta ping in.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-598">**response_ptr** Pointer to packet pointer to return the ping response message in.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-599">**WAIT_OPTION** Definisce il numero di cicli del timer ThreadX per l'attesa di una risposta ping.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-599">**wait_option** Defines the number of ThreadX timer ticks to wait for a ping response.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-600">Le opzioni di attesa sono definite come segue:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-600">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-601">Opzione wait</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-601">Wait Option</span></span>            | <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-602">Valore</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-602">Value</span></span>                           |
| -----------------------|---------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-603">NX_NO_WAIT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-603">NX_NO_WAIT</span></span>             | <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-604">0x00000000</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-604">(0x00000000)</span></span>                    |
| <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-605">valore di timeout in cicli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-605">timeout value in ticks</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-606">(da 0x00000001 a 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-606">(0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-607">NX_WAIT_FOREVER</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-607">NX_WAIT_FOREVER</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-608">0xFFFFFFFF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-608">0xFFFFFFFF</span></span>                      |

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-609">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-609">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-610">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Ping riuscito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-610">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ping.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-611">Il puntatore del messaggio di risposta è stato inserito nella variabile a cui punta response_ptr.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-611">Response message pointer was placed in the variable pointed to by response_ptr.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-612">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) non è in grado di allocare un pacchetto di richieste ping.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-612">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) Unable to allocate a ping request packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-613">L'area dati specificata **NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) supera la dimensione predefinita del pacchetto per questa istanza IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-613">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Specified data area exceeds the default packet size for this IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-614">L'IP richiesto **NX_NO_RESPONSE** (0x29) non ha risposto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-614">**NX_NO_RESPONSE** (0x29) Requested IP did not respond.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-615">La sospensione richiesta **NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) è stata interrotta da una chiamata al tx_thread_wait_abort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-615">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-616">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) indirizzo IP non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-616">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-617">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) un puntatore IP o risposta non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-617">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or response pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-618">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-618">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-619">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) questo componente non è stato abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-619">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-620">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-620">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-621">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-621">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-622">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-622">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-623">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-623">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-624">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-624">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Issue a ping to IP address 1.2.3.5 from the previously created IP
   Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_icmp_ping(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,5), "abcd", 4,
                      &response_ptr, 10);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, a ping response was received from IP
   address 1.2.3.5 and the response packet is contained in the
   packet pointed to by response_ptr. It should have the same "abcd"
   four bytes of data. */
```

## <a name="nx_igmp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-632">nx_igmp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-632">nx_igmp_enable</span></span>


## <a name="nx_igmp_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-662">nx_igmp_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-662">nx_igmp_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-663">Recuperare informazioni sulle attività IGMP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-663">Retrieve information about IGMP activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-664">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-664">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_igmp_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *igmp_reports_sent,
    ULONG *igmp_queries_received,
    ULONG *igmp_checksum_errors,
    ULONG *current_groups_joined);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-665">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-665">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-666">Questo servizio recupera informazioni sulle attività IGMP per l'istanza IP specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-666">This service retrieves information about IGMP activities for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-667">*Se un puntatore di destinazione è NX_NULL, le informazioni specifiche non vengono restituite al chiamante*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-667">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-668">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-668">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-669">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-669">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-670">**igmp_reports_sent** Puntatore alla destinazione per il numero totale di report ICMP inviati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-670">**igmp_reports_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of ICMP reports sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-671">**igmp_queries_received** Puntatore alla destinazione per il numero totale di query ricevute dal router multicast.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-671">**igmp_queries_received** Pointer to destination for the total number of queries received by multicast router.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-672">**igmp_checksum_errors** Puntatore alla destinazione del numero totale di errori di checksum IGMP nei pacchetti di ricezione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-672">**igmp_checksum_errors** Pointer to destination of the total number of IGMP checksum errors on receive packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-673">**current_groups_joined** Puntatore alla destinazione del numero corrente di gruppi Uniti tramite questa istanza IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-673">**current_groups_joined** Pointer to destination of the current number of groups joined through this IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-674">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-674">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-675">Il recupero delle informazioni IGMP riuscite **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-675">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IGMP information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-676">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore IP non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-676">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-677">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-677">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-678">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) questo componente non è stato abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-678">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-679">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-679">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-680">Inizializzazione, thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-680">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-681">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-681">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-682">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-682">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-683">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-683">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve IGMP information from previously created IP Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_igmp_info_get(&ip_0, &igmp_reports_sent,
                          &igmp_queries_received,
                          &igmp_checksum_errors,
                          &current_groups_joined);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, IGMP information was retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_igmp_multicast_interface_join"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-753">nx_igmp_multicast_interface_join</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-753">nx_igmp_multicast_interface_join</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-754">Unisci istanza IP al gruppo multicast specificato tramite un'interfaccia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-754">Join IP instance to specified multicast group via an interface</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-755">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-755">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_igmp_multicast_interface_join(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG group_address,
    UINT interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-756">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-756">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-757">Questo servizio unisce un'istanza IP al gruppo multicast specificato tramite un'interfaccia di rete specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-757">This service joins an IP instance to the specified multicast group via a specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-758">Viene mantenuto un contatore interno per tenere traccia del numero di volte in cui lo stesso gruppo è stato aggiunto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-758">An internal counter is maintained to keep track of the number of times the same group has been joined.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-759">Dopo l'aggiunta al gruppo multicast, il componente IGMP consentirà la ricezione di pacchetti IP con questo indirizzo di gruppo tramite l'interfaccia di rete specificata e segnalerà anche ai router che questo IP è membro di questo gruppo multicast.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-759">After joining the multicast group, the IGMP component will allow reception of IP packets with this group address via the specified network interface and also report to routers that this IP is a member of this multicast group.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-760">I messaggi di join di appartenenza IGMP, di report e di uscita vengono inviati anche tramite l'interfaccia di rete specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-760">The IGMP membership join, report, and leave messages are also sent via the specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-761">Per aggiungere un gruppo multicast IPv4 senza inviare il report di appartenenza a gruppi IGMP, l'applicazione deve utilizzare il servizio ***nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-761">To join an IPv4 multicast group without sending IGMP group membership report, application shall use the service ***nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-762">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-762">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-763">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-763">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-764">**group_address** Indirizzo del gruppo multicast IP di classe D da unire in ordine byte host.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-764">**group_address** Class D IP multicast group address to join in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-765">**interface_index** Indice dell'interfaccia associata all'istanza di NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-765">**interface_index** Index of the Interface attached to the NetX Duo instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-766">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-766">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-767">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) il join del gruppo multicast è riuscito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-767">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multicast group join.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-768">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) non è possibile unire in join più gruppi multicast. è stato superato il limite massimo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-768">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) No more multicast groups can be joined, maximum exceeded.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-769">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore IP non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-769">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-770">L'indice del dispositivo **NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) punta a un'interfaccia di rete non valida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-770">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Device index points to an invalid network interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-771">L'indirizzo del gruppo multicast **NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) specificato non è un indirizzo di classe D valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-771">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Multicast group address provided is not a valid class D address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-772">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-772">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-773">Il supporto multicast IP **NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) non è abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-773">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) IP multicast support is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-774">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-774">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-775">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-775">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-776">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-776">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-777">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-777">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-778">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-778">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Previously created IP Instance joins the multicast group
   244.0.0.200, via the interface at index 1 in the IP interface
   list. */
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1
status = nx_igmp_multicast_interface_join
                                 (&ip IP_ADDRESS(244,0,0,200),
                                  INTERFACE_INDEX);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the IP instance has successfully joined
   the multicast group. */
```
