### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-793">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-793">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-794">Questo servizio lascia il gruppo multicast specificato tramite un'interfaccia di rete specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-794">This service leaves the specified multicast group via a specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-795">Viene mantenuto un contatore interno per tenere traccia del numero di volte in cui lo stesso gruppo è membro.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-795">An internal counter is maintained to keep track of the number of times the same group has been a member of.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-796">Dopo aver lasciato il gruppo multicast, il componente IGMP invierà il report di appartenenza appropriato e potrebbe lasciare il gruppo se non sono presenti membri da questo nodo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-796">After leaving the multicast group, the IGMP component will send out proper membership report, and may leave the group if there are no members from this node.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-797">Per lasciare un gruppo multicast IPv4 senza inviare il report di appartenenza a un gruppo IGMP, l'applicazione deve utilizzare il servizio ***nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-797">To leave an IPv4 multicast group without sending IGMP group membership report, application shall use the service ***nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-798">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-798">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-799">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-799">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-800">**group_address** Indirizzo del gruppo multicast IP di classe D da lasciare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-800">**group_address** Class D IP multicast group address to leave.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-801">L'indirizzo IP è nell'ordine dei byte dell'host.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-801">The IP address is in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-802">**interface_index** Indice dell'interfaccia associata all'istanza di NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-802">**interface_index** Index of the Interface attached to the NetX Duo instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-803">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-803">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-804">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) il join del gruppo multicast è riuscito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-804">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multicast group join.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-805">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Impossibile trovare l'indirizzo del gruppo multicast specificato nella tabella multicast locale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-805">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) The specified multicast group address cannot be found in the local multicast table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-806">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore IP non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-806">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-807">L'indice del dispositivo **NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) punta a un'interfaccia di rete non valida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-807">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Device index points to an invalid network interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-808">L'indirizzo del gruppo multicast **NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) specificato non è un indirizzo di classe D valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-808">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Multicast group address provided is not a valid class D address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-809">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-809">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-810">Il supporto multicast IP **NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) non è abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-810">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) IP multicast support is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-815">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-815">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Leave the multicast group 244.0.0.200. */
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1
status = nx_igmp_multicast_interface_leave
                                (&ip IP_ADDRESS(244,0,0,200),
                                 INTERFACE_INDEX);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the IP instance has successfully leaves
   the multicast group 244.0.0.200. */
```

## <a name="nx_igmp_multicast_join"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-827">nx_igmp_multicast_join</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-827">nx_igmp_multicast_join</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-828">Unisci istanza IP al gruppo multicast specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-828">Join IP instance to specified multicast group</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-829">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-829">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_igmp_multicast_join(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG group_address);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-830">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-830">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-831">Questo servizio unisce un'istanza IP al gruppo multicast specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-831">This service joins an IP instance to the specified multicast group.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-832">Viene mantenuto un contatore interno per tenere traccia del numero di volte in cui lo stesso gruppo è stato aggiunto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-832">An internal counter is maintained to keep track of the number of times the same group has been joined.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-833">Il driver viene indirizzato per l'invio di un report IGMP se si tratta della prima richiesta di join in rete che indica l'intenzione dell'host di partecipare al gruppo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-833">The driver is commanded to send an IGMP report if this is the first join request out on the network indicating the host's intention to join the group.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-834">Dopo l'Unione, il componente IGMP consentirà la ricezione di pacchetti IP con questo indirizzo di gruppo e report ai router che questo IP è membro di questo gruppo multicast.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-834">After joining, the IGMP component will allow reception of IP packets with this group address and report to routers that this IP is a member of this multicast group.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-835">Per aggiungere un gruppo multicast IPv4 senza inviare il report di appartenenza a gruppi IGMP, l'applicazione deve utilizzare il servizio ***nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-835">To join an IPv4 multicast group without sending IGMP group membership report, application shall use the service ***nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join***.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]  
> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-836">*Per aggiungere un gruppo multicast in un dispositivo non primario, usare il nx_igmp_multicast_interface_join di servizio **.***</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-836">*To join a multicast group on a non-primary device, use the service **nx_igmp_multicast_interface_join.***</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-837">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-837">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-838">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-838">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-839">**group_address** Indirizzo del gruppo multicast IP di classe D da unire.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-839">**group_address** Class D IP multicast group address to join.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-840">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-840">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-841">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) il join del gruppo multicast è riuscito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-841">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multicast group join.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-842">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) non è possibile unire in join più gruppi multicast. è stato superato il limite massimo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-842">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) No more multicast groups can be joined, maximum exceeded.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-843">L'indice del dispositivo **NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) punta a un'interfaccia di rete non valida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-843">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Device index points to an invalid network interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-844">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) indirizzo del gruppo IP non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-844">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP group address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-845">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore IP non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-845">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-846">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-846">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-847">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) questo componente non è stato abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-847">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-848">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-848">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-849">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-849">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-850">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-850">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-851">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-851">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-852">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-852">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Previously created IP Instance ip_0 joins the multicast group
   224.0.0.200. */
status = nx_igmp_multicast_join(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(224,0,0,200);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, this IP instance has successfully
   joined the multicast group 224.0.0.200. */
```

## <a name="nx_igmp_multicast_leave"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-865">nx_igmp_multicast_leave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-865">nx_igmp_multicast_leave</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-866">Genera l'istanza IP per uscire dal gruppo multicast specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-866">Cause IP instance to leave specified multicast group</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-867">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-867">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_igmp_multicast_leave(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG group_address);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-868">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-868">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-869">Questo servizio fa in modo che un'istanza IP lasci il gruppo multicast specificato, se il numero di equests di uscita corrisponde al numero di richieste di join.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-869">This service causes an IP instance to leave the specified multicast group, if the number of leave equests matches the number of join requests.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-870">In caso contrario, il conteggio interno dei join viene semplicemente decrementato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-870">Otherwise, the internal join count is simply decremented.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-871">Per lasciare un gruppo multicast IPv4 senza inviare il report di appartenenza a un gruppo IGMP, l'applicazione deve utilizzare il servizio ***nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-871">To leave an IPv4 multicast group without sending IGMP group membership report, application shall use the service ***nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-872">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-872">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-873">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-873">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-874">**group_address** Gruppo multicast da lasciare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-874">**group_address** Multicast group to leave.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-875">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-875">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-876">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) il join del gruppo multicast è riuscito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-876">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multicast group join.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-877">Impossibile trovare **NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) la richiesta di join precedente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-877">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Previous join request was not found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-878">L'indice del dispositivo **NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) punta a un'interfaccia di rete non valida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-878">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Device index points to an invalid network interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-879">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) indirizzo del gruppo IP non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-879">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP group address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-880">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore IP non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-880">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-881">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-881">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-882">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) questo componente non è stato abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-882">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-883">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-883">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-884">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-884">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-885">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-885">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-886">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-886">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-887">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-887">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Cause IP instance to leave the multicast group 224.0.0.200. */
status = nx_igmp_multicast_leave(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(224,0,0,200);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, this IP instance has successfully left
   the multicast group 224.0.0.200. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_address_change_notifiy"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-900">nx_ip_address_change_notifiy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-900">nx_ip_address_change_notifiy</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-901">Notifica all'applicazione se le modifiche all'indirizzo IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-901">Notify application if IP address changes</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-902">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-902">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_address_change_notify(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    VOID(*change_notify)(NX_IP *, VOID *),
    VOID *additional_info);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-903">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-903">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-904">Questo servizio registra una funzione di notifica dell'applicazione che viene chiamata ogni volta che viene modificato l'indirizzo IPv4.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-904">This service registers an application notification function that is called whenever the IPv4 address is changed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-905">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-905">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-906">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-906">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-907">**CHANGE_NOTIFY** Puntatore alla funzione di notifica della modifica IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-907">**change_notify** Pointer to IP change notification function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-908">Se questo parametro è NX_NULL, la notifica di modifica degli indirizzi IP è disabilitata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-908">If this parameter is NX_NULL, IP address change notification is disabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-909">**additional_info** Puntatore a informazioni aggiuntive facoltative fornite anche alla funzione di notifica quando viene modificato l'indirizzo IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-909">**additional_info** Pointer to optional additional information that is also supplied to the notification function when the IP address is changed.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-910">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-910">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-911">Notifica di modifica dell'indirizzo IP riuscita **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-911">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP address change notification.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-912">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore IP non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-912">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-913">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-913">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-914">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-914">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-915">Inizializzazione, thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-915">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-916">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-916">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-917">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-917">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-918">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-918">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Register the function "my_ip_changed" to be called whenever the
   IP address is changed. */
status = nx_ip_address_change_notify(&ip_0, my_ip_changed,
                                      NX_NULL);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the "my_ip_changed" function will be
   called whenever the IP address changes. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_address_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-943">nx_ip_address_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-943">nx_ip_address_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-944">Recuperare l'indirizzo IPv4 e la network mask</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-944">Retrieve IPv4 address and network mask</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-945">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-945">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_address_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *ip_address,
    ULONG *network_mask);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-946">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-946">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-947">Questo servizio recupera l'indirizzo IPv4 e la relativa subnet mask dell'interfaccia di rete primaria.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-947">This service retrieves IPv4 address and its subnet mask of the primary network interface.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]   
> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-948">\* Per ottenere informazioni sul dispositivo secondario, utilizzare il servizio \* \* nx_ip_interface_address_get \* \* \*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-948">\*To obtain information of the secondary device, use the service \*\*nx_ip_interface_address_get\*\*\*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-949">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-949">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-950">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-950">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-951">**ip_address** Puntatore alla destinazione per l'indirizzo IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-951">**ip_address** Pointer to destination for IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-952">**network_mask** Puntatore alla destinazione per network mask.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-952">**network_mask** Pointer to destination for network mask.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-953">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-953">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-954">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) indirizzo IP riuscito Get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-954">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP address get.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-955">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) indirizzo IP non valido o puntatore alla variabile restituita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-955">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or return variable pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-956">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-956">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-957">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-957">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-958">Inizializzazione, thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-958">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-959">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-959">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-960">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-960">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-961">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-961">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Get the IP address and network mask from the previously created
   IP Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_ip_address_get(&ip_0, &ip_address, &network_mask);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the variables ip_address and
   network_mask contain the IP and network mask respectively. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_address_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-986">nx_ip_address_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-986">nx_ip_address_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-987">Imposta indirizzo IPv4 e network mask</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-987">Set IPv4 address and network mask</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-988">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-988">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_address_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG network_mask);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-989">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-989">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-990">Questo servizio imposta l'indirizzo IPv4 e la network mask per l'interfaccia di rete primaria.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-990">This service sets IPv4 address and network mask for the primary network interface.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-991">\* Per impostare l'indirizzo IP e il network mask per il dispositivo secondario, utilizzare il servizio \* \* nx_ip_interface_address_set \* \* \*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-991">\*To set IP address and network mask for the secondary device, use the service \*\*nx_ip_interface_address_set\*\*\*.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-994">**ip_address** Nuovo indirizzo IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-994">**ip_address** New IP address.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-998">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) indirizzo IP non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-998">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1005">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1005">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Set the IP address and network mask to 1.2.3.4 and 0xFFFFFF00 for
   the previously created IP Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_ip_address_set(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,4),
                           0xFFFFFF00UL);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the IP instance now has an IP address of
   1.2.3.4 and a network mask of 0xFFFFFF00. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_auxiliary_packet_pool_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1030">nx_ip_auxiliary_packet_pool_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1030">nx_ip_auxiliary_packet_pool_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1031">Configurare un pool di pacchetti ausiliario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1031">Configure an auxiliary packet pool</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1032">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1032">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_auxiliary_packet_pool_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NX_PACKET_POOL *aux_pool);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1033">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1033">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1034">Questo servizio configura un pool di pacchetti ausiliario nell'istanza IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1034">This service configures an auxiliary packet pool in the IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1035">Per un sistema con vincoli di memoria, l'utente può aumentare l'efficienza della memoria creando il pool di pacchetti predefinito con le dimensioni del pacchetto MTU e creando un pool di pacchetti ausiliario con dimensioni di pacchetto inferiori per il thread IP per la trasmissione di pacchetti di piccole dimensioni con.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1035">For a memory-constrained system, the user may increase memory efficiency by creating the default packet pool with packet size of MTU, and creating an auxiliary packet pool with smaller packet size for the IP thread to transmit small packets with.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1036">Le dimensioni consigliate per il pool ausiliario sono pari a 256 byte, supponendo che IPv6 e IPsec siano entrambi abilitati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1036">The recommended packet size for the auxiliary pool is 256 bytes, assuming IPv6 and IPsec are both enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1037">Per impostazione predefinita, l'istanza IP non accetta il pool di pacchetti ausiliari.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1037">By default the IP instance does not accept the auxiliary packet pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1038">Per abilitare questa funzionalità, è necessario definire *NX_DUAL_PACKET_POOL_ENABLE* quando si compila la libreria NETX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1038">To enable this feature, *NX_DUAL_PACKET_POOL_ENABLE* must be defined when compiling the NetX Duo library.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1039">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1039">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1040">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1040">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1041">**aux_pool** Pool di pacchetti ausiliario da configurare per l'istanza IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1041">**aux_pool** The auxiliary packet pool to be configured for the IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1042">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1042">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1043">Set di indirizzi IP riusciti **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1043">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP address set.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1044">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0X4B) la funzionalità del pool di pacchetti duale non è compilata nella libreria.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1044">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) The dual packet pool feature is not compiled in the library.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1045">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore IP o puntatore al pool non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1045">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer or pool pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1046">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1046">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1047">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1047">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1048">Inizializzazione, thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1048">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1049">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1049">Preemption Possible</span></span>  

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1050">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1050">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1051">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1051">Example</span></span>

```c
#define SMALL_PAYLOAD_SIZE 256
NX_PACKET small_pool;

nx_packet_pool_create(&small_pool, "small pool", SMALL_PAYLOAD_SIZE,
                       small_pool_memory_ptr, small_pool_size);

/* Add the small packet pool to the IP instance. */
status = nx_ip_auxiliary_packet_pool_set(&ip_0, &small_pool);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the IP instance now is able to use the
   small pool for transmitting small datagram. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1061">nx_packet_pool_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1061">nx_packet_pool_info_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1062">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1062">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1063">nx_packet_release</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1063">nx_packet_release</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1064">nx_packet_transmit_release</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1064">nx_packet_transmit_release</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ip_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1065">nx_ip_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1065">nx_ip_create</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1066">Creare un'istanza IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1066">Create an IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1067">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1067">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_create(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    CHAR *name, ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG network_mask, 
    NX_PACKET_POOL *default_pool,
    VOID (*ip_network_driver)(NX_IP_DRIVER *),
    VOID *memory_ptr, 
    ULONG memory_size,
    UINT priority);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1068">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1068">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1069">Questo servizio crea un'istanza IP con l'indirizzo IP e il driver di rete specificati dall'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1069">This service creates an IP instance with the user supplied IP address and network driver.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1070">Inoltre, l'applicazione deve fornire un pool di pacchetti creato in precedenza per l'istanza IP da usare per l'allocazione dei pacchetti interna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1070">In addition, the application must supply a previously created packet pool for the IP instance to use for internal packet allocation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1071">Si noti che il driver di rete dell'applicazione fornito non viene chiamato fino a quando non viene eseguito il thread di questo indirizzo IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1071">Note that the supplied application network driver is not called until this IP's thread executes.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1072">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1072">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1073">**ip_ptr** Puntatore al blocco di controllo per creare una nuova istanza di IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1073">**ip_ptr** Pointer to control block to create a new IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1074">**nome** Nome della nuova istanza di IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1074">**name** Name of this new IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1075">**ip_address** Indirizzo IP per la nuova istanza di IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1075">**ip_address** IP address for this new IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1076">**network_mask** Maschera per delineare la parte di rete dell'indirizzo IP per la suddivisione in subnet e l'uso di super-reti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1076">**network_mask** Mask to delineate the network portion of the IP address for sub-netting and super-netting uses.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1077">**default_pool** Puntatore al blocco di controllo del pool di pacchetti NetX Duo creato in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1077">**default_pool** Pointer to control block of previously created NetX Duo packet pool.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1078">**ip_network_driver** Driver di rete fornito dall'utente utilizzato per inviare e ricevere pacchetti IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1078">**ip_network_driver** User-supplied network driver used to send and receive IP packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1079">**memory_ptr** Puntatore all'area di memoria per l'area dello stack del thread helper IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1079">**memory_ptr** Pointer to memory area for the IP helper thread’s stack area.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1080">**memory_size** Numero di byte nell'area di memoria per lo stack del thread helper IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1080">**memory_size** Number of bytes in the memory area for the IP helper thread’s stack.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1081">**priorità** di Priorità del thread helper IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1081">**priority** Priority of IP helper thread.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1082">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1082">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1083">Creazione dell'istanza IP riuscita **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1083">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP instance creation.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1084">**NX_NOT_IMPLEMENTED** (0X4A) NETX Duo Library non è configurato correttamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1084">**NX_NOT_IMPLEMENTED** (0x4A) NetX Duo library is configured incorrectly.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1085">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP non valido, puntatore alla funzione del driver di rete, pool di pacchetti o puntatore di memoria.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1085">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP, network driver function pointer, packet pool, or memory pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1086">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) la dimensione dello stack fornita è troppo piccola.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1086">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) The supplied stack size is too small.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1087">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1087">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1088">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0X21) l'indirizzo IP specificato non è valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1088">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) The supplied IP address is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1089">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0X21) la priorità del thread IP specificata non è valida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1089">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x21) The supplied IP thread priority is invalid.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1091">Inizializzazione, thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1091">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1094">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1094">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Create an IP instance with an IP address of 1.2.3.4 and a network
   mask of 0xFFFFFF00UL. The "ethernet_driver" specifies the entry
   point of the application specific network driver and the
   "stack_memory_ptr" specifies the start of a 1024 byte memory
   area that is used for this IP instance’s helper thread. */
status = nx_ip_create(&ip_0, "NetX IP Instance ip_0",
                      IP_ADDRESS(1, 2, 3, 4),
                      0xFFFFFF00UL, &pool_0, ethernet_driver,
                      stack_memory_ptr, 1024, 1);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the IP instance has been created. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1119">nx_ip_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1119">nx_ip_delete</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1121">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1121">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_delete(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1122">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1122">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1123">Questo servizio Elimina un'istanza IP creata in precedenza e rilascia tutte le risorse di sistema di proprietà dell'istanza IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1123">This service deletes a previously created IP instance and releases all of the system resources owned by the IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1124">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1124">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1128">**NX_SOCKETS_BOUND** (0x28) a questa istanza IP sono ancora associati socket UDP o TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1128">**NX_SOCKETS_BOUND** (0x28) This IP instance still has UDP or TCP sockets bound to it.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1129">Prima di eliminare l'istanza IP, è necessario che tutti i socket siano non associati ed eliminati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1129">All sockets must be unbound and deleted prior to deleting the IP instance.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1131">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1131">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ip_driver_direct_command"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1161">nx_ip_driver_direct_command</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1161">nx_ip_driver_direct_command</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1162">Invia comando al driver di rete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1162">Issue command to network driver</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1163">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1163">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_driver_direct_command
    (NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT command,
    ULONG *return_value_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1164">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1164">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1165">Questo servizio fornisce un'interfaccia diretta al driver dell'interfaccia di rete primaria dell'applicazione specificato durante la chiamata di ***nx_ip_create*** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1165">This service provides a direct interface to the application's primary network interface driver specified during the ***nx_ip_create*** call.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1166">I comandi specifici dell'applicazione possono essere utilizzati per fornire un valore numerico maggiore o uguale a NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1166">Application-specific commands can be used providing their numeric value is greater than or equal to NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1167">\*Per eseguire il comando per il dispositivo secondario, usare il servizio \*\*nx_ip_driver_interface_direct_command\*\*\*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1167">*To issue command for the secondary device, use the **nx_ip_driver_interface_direct_command** service*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1168">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1168">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1169">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1169">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1170">**comando** Codice di comando numerico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1170">**command** Numeric command code.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1171">I comandi standard vengono definiti come segue:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1171">Standard commands are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1172">NX_LINK_GET_STATUS (10)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1172">NX_LINK_GET_STATUS (10)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1173">NX_LINK_GET_SPEED (11)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1173">NX_LINK_GET_SPEED (11)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1174">NX_LINK_GET_DUPLEX_TYPE (12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1174">NX_LINK_GET_DUPLEX_TYPE (12)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1175">NX_LINK_GET_ERROR_COUNT (13)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1175">NX_LINK_GET_ERROR_COUNT (13)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1176">NX_LINK_GET_RX_COUNT (14)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1176">NX_LINK_GET_RX_COUNT (14)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1177">NX_LINK_GET_TX_COUNT (15)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1177">NX_LINK_GET_TX_COUNT (15)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1178">NX_LINK_GET_ALLOC_ERRORS (16)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1178">NX_LINK_GET_ALLOC_ERRORS (16)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1179">NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND (50)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1179">NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND (50)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1180">**return_value_ptr** Puntatore alla variabile restituita nel chiamante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1180">**return_value_ptr** Pointer to return variable in the caller.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1181">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1181">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1182">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) il comando diretto del driver di rete è riuscito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1182">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful network driver direct command.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1183">Comando del driver di rete non gestito o non implementato **NX_UNHANDLED_COMMAND** (0x44).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1183">**NX_UNHANDLED_COMMAND** (0x44) Unhandled or unimplemented network driver command.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1184">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) un indirizzo IP o un puntatore al valore restituito non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1184">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or return value pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1185">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1185">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1186">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) indice di interfaccia non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1186">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid interface index.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1187">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1187">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1188">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1188">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1189">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1189">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1190">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1190">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1191">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1191">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Make a direct call to the application-specific network driver
   for the previously created IP instance. For this example, the
   network driver is interrogated for the link status. */
status = nx_ip_driver_direct_command(&ip_0, NX_LINK_GET_STATUS,
                                     &link_status);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the link_status variable contains a
   NX_TRUE or NX_FALSE value representing the status of the
   physical link. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_driver_interface_direct_command"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1216">nx_ip_driver_interface_direct_command</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1216">nx_ip_driver_interface_direct_command</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1217">Invia comando al driver di rete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1217">Issue command to network driver</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1218">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1218">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_driver_interface_direct_command(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT command,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG *return_value_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1219">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1219">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1220">Questo servizio fornisce un comando diretto al driver di dispositivo di rete dell'applicazione nell'istanza di IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1220">This service provides a direct command to the application's network device driver in the IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1221">I comandi specifici dell'applicazione possono essere utilizzati per fornire un valore numerico maggiore o uguale a *NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1221">Application-specific commands can be used providing their numeric value is greater than or equal to *NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1222">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1222">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1223">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1223">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1224">**comando** Codice di comando numerico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1224">**command** Numeric command code.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1225">I comandi standard vengono definiti come segue:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1225">Standard commands are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1226">NX_LINK_GET_STATUS (10)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1226">NX_LINK_GET_STATUS (10)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1227">NX_LINK_GET_SPEED (11)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1227">NX_LINK_GET_SPEED (11)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1228">NX_LINK_GET_DUPLEX_TYPE (12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1228">NX_LINK_GET_DUPLEX_TYPE (12)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1229">NX_LINK_GET_ERROR_COUNT (13)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1229">NX_LINK_GET_ERROR_COUNT (13)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1230">NX_LINK_GET_RX_COUNT (14)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1230">NX_LINK_GET_RX_COUNT (14)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1231">NX_LINK_GET_TX_COUNT (15)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1231">NX_LINK_GET_TX_COUNT (15)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1232">NX_LINK_GET_ALLOC_ERRORS (16)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1232">NX_LINK_GET_ALLOC_ERRORS (16)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1233">NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND (50)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1233">NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND (50)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1234">**interface_index** Indice dell'interfaccia di rete a cui deve essere inviato il comando.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1234">**interface_index** Index of the network interface the command should be sent to.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1235">**return_value_ptr** Puntatore alla variabile restituita nel chiamante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1235">**return_value_ptr** Pointer to return variable in the caller.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1236">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1236">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1237">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) il comando diretto del driver di rete è riuscito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1237">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful network driver direct command.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1238">Comando del driver di rete non gestito o non implementato **NX_UNHANDLED_COMMAND** (0x44).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1238">**NX_UNHANDLED_COMMAND** (0x44) Unhandled or unimplemented network driver command.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1239">Indice di interfaccia **NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0X4C) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1239">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid interface index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1240">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) un indirizzo IP o un puntatore al valore restituito non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1240">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or return value pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1241">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1241">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1242">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1242">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1243">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1243">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1244">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1244">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1245">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1245">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1246">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1246">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Make a direct call to the application-specific network driver
   for the previously created IP instance. For this example, the
   network driver is interrogated for the link status. */

/* Set the interface index to the primary device. */
UINT interface_index = 0;

status = nx_ip_driver_interface_direct_command(&ip_0,
                                               NX_LINK_GET_STATUS,
                                               interface_index,
                                               &link_status);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the link_status variable contains a
   NX_TRUE or NX_FALSE value representing the status of the
   physical link. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_forwarding_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1271">nx_ip_forwarding_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1271">nx_ip_forwarding_disable</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1273">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1273">Prototype</span></span>

```c
UINT nx_ip_forwarding_disable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1274">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1274">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1275">Questo servizio Disabilita l'invio di pacchetti IP all'interno del componente IP NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1275">This service disables forwarding IP packets inside the NetX Duo IP component.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1276">Al momento della creazione dell'attività IP, questo servizio viene disabilitato automaticamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1276">On creation of the IP task, this service is automatically disabled.</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ip_forwarding_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1312">nx_ip_forwarding_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1312">nx_ip_forwarding_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1313">Abilita l'invio di pacchetti IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1313">Enable IP packet forwarding</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1314">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1314">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_forwarding_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1315">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1315">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1316">Questo servizio consente l'invio di pacchetti IP all'interno del componente IP NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1316">This service enables forwarding IP packets inside the NetX Duo IP component.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1317">Al momento della creazione dell'attività IP, questo servizio viene disabilitato automaticamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1317">On creation of the IP task, this service is automatically disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1318">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1318">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1319">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1319">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1320">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1320">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1321">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) abilitata per l'invio di indirizzi IP riuscita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1321">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP forwarding enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1322">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore IP non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1322">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1323">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1323">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1324">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1324">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1325">Inizializzazione, thread, timer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1325">Initialization, threads, timers</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1326">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1326">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1327">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1327">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1328">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1328">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable IP forwarding on this IP instance. */
status = nx_ip_forwarding_enable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, IP forwarding has been enabled on the
   previously created IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_fragment_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1353">nx_ip_fragment_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1353">nx_ip_fragment_disable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1354">Disabilitare la frammentazione di pacchetti IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1354">Disable IP packet fragmenting</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1355">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1355">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_fragment_disable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1356">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1356">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1357">Questo servizio Disabilita la funzionalità di rimontaggio e frammentazione di pacchetti IPv4 e IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1357">This service disables IPv4 and IPv6 packet fragmenting and reassembling functionality.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1358">Per i pacchetti in attesa di essere riassemblati, questo servizio rilascia questi pacchetti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1358">For packets waiting to be reassembled, this service releases these packets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1359">Al momento della creazione dell'attività IP, questo servizio viene disabilitato automaticamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1359">On creation of the IP task, this service is automatically disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1360">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1360">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1361">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1361">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1362">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1362">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1363">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) la disabilitazione del FRAMMENTo IP è riuscita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1363">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP fragment disable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1364">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore IP non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1364">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1365">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1365">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1366">La frammentazione IP **NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) non è abilitata nell'istanza IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1366">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) IP Fragmentation is not enabled on the IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1367">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1367">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1368">Inizializzazione, thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1368">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1369">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1369">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1370">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1370">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1371">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1371">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Disable IP fragmenting on this IP instance. */
status = nx_ip_fragment_disable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, disables IP fragmenting on the
   previously created IP instance. */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1398">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1398">Prototype</span></span>

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1399">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1399">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1400">Questo servizio Abilita la funzionalità di frammentazione e riassemblaggio di pacchetti IPv4 e IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1400">This service enables IPv4 and IPv6 packet fragmenting and reassembling functionality.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1401">Al momento della creazione dell'attività IP, questo servizio viene disabilitato automaticamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1401">On creation of the IP task, this service is automatically disabled.</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ip_gateway_address_clear"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1438">nx_ip_gateway_address_clear</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1438">nx_ip_gateway_address_clear</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1439">Cancellare l'indirizzo IPv4 del gateway</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1439">Clear the IPv4 gateway address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1440">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1440">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_gateway_address_clear(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1441">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1441">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1442">Questo servizio Cancella l'indirizzo del gateway IPv4 configurato nell'istanza di.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1442">This service clears the IPv4 gateway address configured in the instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1443">Per cancellare un valore predefinito IPv6 esterno dall'istanza IP, le applicazioni utilizzeranno il ***nxd_ipv6_default_router_delete*** del servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1443">To clear an IPv6 default outer from the IP instance, applications shall use the service ***nxd_ipv6_default_router_delete.***</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1444">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1444">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1445">**ip_ptr** Puntatore del blocco di controllo IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1445">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1446">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1446">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1447">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha cancellato correttamente l'indirizzo del gateway IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1447">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully cleared the IP gateway address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1448">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) blocco di controllo IP non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1448">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1449">Il servizio **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) non viene chiamato dall'inizializzazione del sistema o dal contesto del thread.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1449">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1450">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1450">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1451">Inizializzazione, thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1451">Initialization, threads</span></span>

```c

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the gateway address was successfully
   cleared from the IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_gateway_address_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1457">nx_ip_gateway_address_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1457">nx_ip_gateway_address_get</span></span>

```c
UINT nx_ip_gateway_address_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG *ip_address);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1460">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1460">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1461">Questo servizio recupera l'indirizzo IPv4 del gateway configurato nell'istanza IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1461">This service retrieves the IPv4 gateway address configured in the IP instance.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1463">**ip_ptr** Puntatore del blocco di controllo IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1463">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1464">**ip_address** Puntatore alla memoria in cui è archiviato l'indirizzo del gateway</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1464">**ip_address** Pointer to the memory where the gateway address is stored</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1467">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore a blocco di controllo IP o puntatore a indirizzo IP non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1467">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer or ip address pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1468">Impossibile trovare l'indirizzo del gateway **NX_NOT_FOUND** (0x4E)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1468">**NX_NOT_FOUND** (0x4E) Gateway address not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1469">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) S ervizio non viene chiamato dall'inizializzazione del sistema o dal contesto del thread.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1469">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) S ervice is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1470">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1470">Allowed From</span></span>

```c
   got. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_gateway_address_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1486">nx_ip_gateway_address_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1486">nx_ip_gateway_address_set</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1488">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1488">Prototype</span></span>

```c
UINT nx_ip_gateway_address_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG ip_address);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1489">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1489">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1490">Questo servizio imposta l'indirizzo IP del gateway IPv4.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1490">This service sets the IPv4 gateway IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1491">Tutto il traffico fuori rete viene indirizzato a questo gateway per la trasmissione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1491">All out-of-network traffic are routed to this gateway for transmission.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1492">Il gateway deve essere direttamente accessibile tramite una delle interfacce di rete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1492">The gateway must be directly accessible through one of the network interfaces.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1493">Per configurare l'indirizzo del gateway IPv6, usare il nxd_ipv6_default_router_add di servizio ***.***</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1493">To configure IPv6 gateway address, use the service ***nxd_ipv6_default_router_add.***</span></span> 

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1494">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1494">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1495">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1495">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1496">**ip_address** Indirizzo IP del gateway.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1496">**ip_address** IP address of the gateway.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1497">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1497">Return Values</span></span>
