## <a name="nx_ip_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1518">nx_ip_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1518">nx_ip_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1519">Recuperare informazioni sulle attività IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1519">Retrieve information about IP activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1520">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1520">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *ip_total_packets_sent,
    ULONG *ip_total_bytes_sent,
    ULONG *ip_total_packets_received,
    ULONG *ip_total_bytes_received,
    ULONG *ip_invalid_packets,
    ULONG *ip_receive_packets_dropped,
    ULONG *ip_receive_checksum_errors,
    ULONG *ip_send_packets_dropped,
    ULONG *ip_total_fragments_sent,
    ULONG *ip_total_fragments_received);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1521">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1521">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1522">Questo servizio recupera informazioni sulle attività IP per l'istanza IP specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1522">This service retrieves information about IP activities for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]  
> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1523">*Se un puntatore di destinazione è NX_NULL, le informazioni specifiche non vengono restituite al chiamante*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1523">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1524">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1524">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1525">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1525">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1526">**ip_total_packets_sent** Puntatore alla destinazione per il numero totale di pacchetti IP inviati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1526">**ip_total_packets_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of IP packets sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1527">**ip_total_bytes_sent** Puntatore alla destinazione per il numero totale di byte inviati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1527">**ip_total_bytes_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of bytes sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1528">**ip_total_packets_received** Puntatore alla destinazione del numero totale di pacchetti di ricezione IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1528">**ip_total_packets_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of IP receive packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1529">**ip_total_bytes_received** Puntatore alla destinazione del numero totale di byte IP ricevuti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1529">**ip_total_bytes_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of IP bytes received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1530">**ip_invalid_packets** Puntatore alla destinazione del numero totale di pacchetti IP non validi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1530">**ip_invalid_packets** Pointer to destination of the total number of invalid IP packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1531">**ip_receive_packets_dropped** Puntatore alla destinazione del numero totale di pacchetti di ricezione eliminati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1531">**ip_receive_packets_dropped** Pointer to destination of the total number of receive packets dropped.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1532">**ip_receive_checksum_errors** Puntatore alla destinazione del numero totale di errori di checksum nei pacchetti di ricezione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1532">**ip_receive_checksum_errors** Pointer to destination of the total number of checksum errors in receive packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1533">**ip_send_packets_dropped** Puntatore alla destinazione del numero totale di pacchetti di invio eliminati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1533">**ip_send_packets_dropped** Pointer to destination of the total number of send packets dropped.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1534">**ip_total_fragments_sent** Puntatore alla destinazione del numero totale di frammenti inviati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1534">**ip_total_fragments_sent** Pointer to destination of the total number of fragments sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1535">**ip_total_fragments_received** Puntatore alla destinazione del numero totale di frammenti ricevuti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1535">**ip_total_fragments_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of fragments received.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1536">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1536">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1537">Il recupero delle informazioni IP riuscite **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1537">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1538">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1538">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1539">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore IP non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1539">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1541">Inizializzazione, thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1541">Initialization, threads</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1543">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1543">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1544">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1544">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve IP information from previously created IP
   Instance 0. */
status = nx_ip_info_get(&ip_0,
                        &ip_total_packets_sent,
                        &ip_total_bytes_sent,
                        &ip_total_packets_received,
                        &ip_total_bytes_received,
                        &ip_invalid_packets,
                        &ip_receive_packets_dropped,
                        &ip_receive_checksum_errors,
                        &ip_send_packets_dropped,
                        &ip_total_fragments_sent,
                        &ip_total_fragments_received);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, IP information was retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_address_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1569">nx_ip_interface_address_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1569">nx_ip_interface_address_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1570">Recuperare l'indirizzo IP dell'interfaccia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1570">Retrieve interface IP address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1571">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1571">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_address_get (
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG *ip_address,
    ULONG *network_mask);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1572">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1572">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1573">Questo servizio recupera l'indirizzo IPv4 di un'interfaccia di rete specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1573">This service retrieves the IPv4 address of a specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1574">Per recuperare l'indirizzo IPv6, l'applicazione deve usare il servizio ***nxd_ipv6_address_get***</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1574">To retrieve IPv6 address, application shall use the service ***nxd_ipv6_address_get***</span></span>

> [!CAUTION]  
> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1575">*Il dispositivo specificato, se non il dispositivo primario, deve essere precedentemente collegato all'istanza IP*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1575">*The specified device, if not the primary device, must be previously attached to the IP instance*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1576">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1576">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1577">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1577">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1578">**interface_index** Indice dell'interfaccia, lo stesso valore dell'indice per l'interfaccia di rete collegata all'istanza IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1578">**interface_index** Interface index, the same value as the index to the network interface attached to the IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1579">**ip_address** Puntatore alla destinazione per l'indirizzo IP dell'interfaccia del dispositivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1579">**ip_address** Pointer to destination for the device interface IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1580">**network_mask** Puntatore alla destinazione per l'interfaccia del dispositivo network mask.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1580">**network_mask** Pointer to destination for the device interface network mask.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1581">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1581">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1582">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) indirizzo IP riuscito Get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1582">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP address get.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1583">L'interfaccia di rete specificata **NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) non è valida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1583">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Specified network interface is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1584">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1584">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1585">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore IP non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1585">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1586">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1586">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1587">Inizializzazione, thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1587">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1588">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1588">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1589">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1589">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1590">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1590">Example</span></span>

```c
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1

/* Get device IP address and network mask for the specified
   interface index 1 in IP instance list of interfaces). */
status = nx_ip_interface_address_get(ip_ptr,INTERFACE_INDEX,
                                     &ip_address,
                                     &network_mask);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the interface address was successfully
   retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_address_mapping_configure"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1604">nx_ip_interface_address_mapping_configure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1604">nx_ip_interface_address_mapping_configure</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1605">Configurare se è necessario il mapping degli indirizzi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1605">Configure whether address mapping is needed</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1606">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1606">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_address_mapping_configure(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    UINT mapping_needed);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1607">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1607">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1608">Questo servizio configura se è necessario l'indirizzo IP per il mapping degli indirizzi MAC per l'interfaccia di rete specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1608">This service configures whether IP address to MAC address mapping is needed for the specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1609">Questo servizio viene in genere chiamato dal driver di dispositivo dell'interfaccia per notificare allo stack IP se l'interfaccia sottostante richiede l'indirizzo IP per il mapping degli indirizzi di livello due (MAC).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1609">This service is typically called from the interface device driver to notify the IP stack whether the underlying interface requires IP address to layer two (MAC) address mapping.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1610">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1610">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1611">**ip_ptr** Puntatore del blocco di controllo IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1611">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1612">**interface_index** Indicizzare l'interfaccia di rete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1612">**interface_index** Index to the network interface</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1613">**mapping_needed** NX_TRUE--mapping degli indirizzi necessario NX_FALSE--mapping degli indirizzi non necessario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1613">**mapping_needed** NX_TRUE -- address mapping needed NX_FALSE -- address mapping not needed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1614">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1614">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1615">Configurazione di **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1615">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful configure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1616">L'indice del dispositivo **NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1616">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Device index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1617">Puntatore a blocco di controllo IP **NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1617">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1618">Il servizio **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) non viene chiamato dall'inizializzazione del sistema o dal contesto del thread.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1618">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1619">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1619">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1620">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1620">Thread</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1621">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1621">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1622">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1622">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1623">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1623">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
UCHAR mapping_needed = NX_TRUE;

/* Configure address mapping needed specified interface. */
status = nx_ip_interface_address_mapping_configure(&ip_0,
                                             PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                             mapping_needed);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the address mapping needed was
   successfully configured. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_address_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1637">nx_ip_interface_address_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1637">nx_ip_interface_address_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1638">Impostare l'indirizzo IP e la network mask dell'interfaccia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1638">Set interface IP address and network mask</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1639">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1639">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_address_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG network_mask);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1640">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1640">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1641">Questo servizio imposta l'indirizzo IPv4 e network mask per l'interfaccia IP specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1641">This service sets the IPv4 address and network mask for the specified IP interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1642">Per configurare l'indirizzo dell'interfaccia IPv6, l'applicazione deve utilizzare il ***nxd_ipv6_address_set*** del servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1642">To configure IPv6 interface address, application shall use the service ***nxd_ipv6_address_set***.</span></span> 
 
> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1643">*L'interfaccia specificata deve essere precedentemente collegata all'istanza IP*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1643">*The specified interface must be previously attached to the IP instance*.</span></span> 

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1644">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1644">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1645">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1645">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1646">**interface_index** Indice dell'interfaccia associata all'istanza di NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1646">**interface_index** Index of the interface attached to the NetX Duo instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1647">**ip_address** Nuovo indirizzo IP dell'interfaccia di rete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1647">**ip_address** New network interface IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1648">**network_mask** Nuova interfaccia network mask.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1648">**network_mask** New interface network mask.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1649">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1649">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1650">Set di indirizzi IP riusciti **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1650">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP address set.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1651">L'interfaccia di rete specificata **NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) non è valida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1651">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Specified network interface is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1652">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1652">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1653">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatori non validi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1653">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointers.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1654">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) indirizzo IP non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1654">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1655">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1655">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1656">Inizializzazione, thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1656">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1657">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1657">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1658">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1658">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1659">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1659">Example</span></span>

```c
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1

/* Set device IP address and network mask for the specified
   interface index 1 in IP instance list of interfaces). */
status = nx_ip_interface_address_set(ip_ptr, INTERFACE_INDEX,
                                     ip_address,
                                     network_mask);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the interface IP address and mask was
   successfully set. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_attach"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1673">nx_ip_interface_attach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1673">nx_ip_interface_attach</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1674">Collegare l'interfaccia di rete all'istanza IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1674">Attach network interface to IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1675">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1675">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_attach(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    CHAR *interface_name,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG network_mask,
    VOID(*ip_link_driver)(struct NX_IP_DRIVER_STRUCT *));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1676">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1676">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1677">Questo servizio aggiunge un'interfaccia di rete fisica all'interfaccia IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1677">This service adds a physical network interface to the IP interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1678">Si noti che l'istanza IP viene creata con l'interfaccia primaria, quindi ogni interfaccia aggiuntiva è secondaria all'interfaccia primaria.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1678">Note the IP instance is created with the primary interface so each additional interface is secondary to the primary interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1679">Il numero totale di interfacce di rete collegate all'istanza IP (inclusa l'interfaccia primaria) non può superare **NX_MAX_PHYSICAL_INTERFACES**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1679">The total number of network interfaces attached to the IP instance (including the primary interface) cannot exceed **NX_MAX_PHYSICAL_INTERFACES**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1680">Se il thread IP non è ancora in esecuzione, le interfacce secondarie verranno inizializzate come parte del processo di avvio del thread IP che inizializza tutte le interfacce fisiche.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1680">If the IP thread has not been running yet, the secondary interfaces will be initialized as part of the IP thread startup process that initializes all physical interfaces.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1681">Se il thread IP non è ancora in esecuzione, l'interfaccia secondaria viene inizializzata come parte del servizio ***nx_ip_interface_attach*** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1681">If the IP thread is not running yet, the secondary interface is initialized as part of the ***nx_ip_interface_attach*** service.</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1682">*ip_ptr deve puntare a una struttura IP NETX Duo valida. Per il numero di interfacce di rete per l'istanza IP, è necessario configurare **NX_MAX_PHYSICAL_INTERFACES** . Il valore predefinito è uno*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1682">*ip_ptr must point to a valid NetX Duo IP structure. **NX_MAX_PHYSICAL_INTERFACES** must be configured for the number of network interfaces for the IP instance. The default value is one*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1683">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1683">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1684">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1684">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1685">**INTERFACE_NAME** Puntatore alla stringa del nome di interfaccia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1685">**interface_name** Pointer to interface name string.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1686">**ip_address** Indirizzo IP del dispositivo nell'ordine dei byte dell'host.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1686">**ip_address** Device IP address in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1687">**network_mask** Network mask del dispositivo nell'ordine dei byte dell'host.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1687">**network_mask** Device network mask in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1688">**ip_link_driver** Driver Ethernet per l'interfaccia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1688">**ip_link_driver** Ethernet driver for the interface.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1690">La voce **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) viene aggiunta alla tabella di routing statica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1690">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Entry is added to static routing table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1691">Numero massimo di interfacce **NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1691">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) Max number of interfaces.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1692">Viene superato NX_MAX_PHYSICAL_INTERFACES.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1692">NX_MAX_PHYSICAL_INTERFACES is exceeded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1693">Se IPv6 è abilitato, questo errore può indicare anche che il driver potrebbe non disporre di risorse sufficienti per gestire le operazioni multicast IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1693">If IPv6 is enabled, this error may also indicate that the driver may not have enough resource to handle IPv6 multicast operations.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1694">**NX_DUPLICATED_ENTRY** (0X52) l'indirizzo IP specificato è già in uso in questa istanza IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1694">**NX_DUPLICATED_ENTRY** (0x52) The supplied IP address is already used on this IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1695">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1695">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1702">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1702">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Attach secondary device for device IP address 192.168.1.68 with
   the specified Ethernet driver. */
status = nx_ip_interface_attach(ip_ptr, “secondary_port”,
                                IP_ADDRESS(192,168,1,68),
                                0xFFFFFF00UL,
                                nx_etherDriver);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the interface was successfully added to
   the IP instance interface table. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_capability_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1716">nx_ip_interface_capability_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1716">nx_ip_interface_capability_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1717">Ottenere la funzionalità hardware dell'interfaccia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1717">Get interface hardware capability</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1718">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1718">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_capability_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG *interface_capability_flag);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1719">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1719">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1720">Questo servizio recupera il flag di funzionalità dall'interfaccia di rete specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1720">This service retrieves the capability flag from the specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1721">Per usare questo servizio, è necessario compilare la libreria NetX Duo con l'opzione ***NX_ENABLE_INTERFACE_CAPABILITY*** abilitata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1721">To use this service, the NetX Duo library must be built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_INTERFACE_CAPABILITY*** enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1722">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1722">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1723">**ip_ptr** Puntatore del blocco di controllo IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1723">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1724">**interface_index** Indice dell'interfaccia di rete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1724">**interface_index** Index of the network interface</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1725">**interface_capability_flag** Puntatore allo spazio di memoria per il flag funzionalità</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1725">**interface_capability_flag** Pointer to memory space for the capability flag</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1726">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1726">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1727">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha ottenuto correttamente le informazioni sulla funzionalità di interfaccia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1727">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully obtained interface capability information.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1728">La funzionalità della funzionalità dell'interfaccia **NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) non è supportata in questa compilazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1728">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) Interface capability feature is not supported in this build.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1729">Indice dell'interfaccia **NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1729">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1730">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore a blocchi di controllo IP non valido o puntatore al flag di funzionalità non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1730">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer or Invalid capability flag pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1731">Il servizio **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) non viene chiamato dall'inizializzazione del sistema o dal contesto del thread.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1731">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1732">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1732">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1733">Inizializzazione, thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1733">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1734">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1734">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1735">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1735">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1736">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1736">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
ULONG       capability_flag;

/* Get the hardware capability flag of specified interface. */
status = nx_ip_interface_capability_get(&ip_0,
                                        PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                        &capability_flag);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the capability flag from the primary
   interface was successfully retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_capability_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1750">nx_ip_interface_capability_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1750">nx_ip_interface_capability_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1751">Imposta il flag funzionalità hardware</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1751">Set the hardware capability flag</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1752">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1752">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_capability_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG interface_capability_flag);
```                           
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1753">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1753">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1754">Questo servizio viene utilizzato dal driver di dispositivo di rete per configurare il flag funzionalità per un'interfaccia di rete specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1754">This service is used by the network device driver to configure the capability flag for a specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1755">Per usare questo servizio, è necessario compilare la libreria NetX Duo con l'opzione ***NX_ENABLE_INTERFACE_CAPABILITY*** definita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1755">To use this service, the NetX Duo library must be compiled with the option ***NX_ENABLE_INTERFACE_CAPABILITY*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1756">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1756">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1757">**ip_ptr** Puntatore del blocco di controllo IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1757">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1758">**interface_index** Indice dell'interfaccia di rete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1758">**interface_index** Index of network interface</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1759">**interface_capability_flag** Flag funzionalità per l'output</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1759">**interface_capability_flag** Capability flag for output</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1760">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1760">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1761">Il flag di capacità hardware dell'interfaccia è stato impostato **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1761">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set interface hardware capability flag.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1762">La funzionalità della funzionalità dell'interfaccia **NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) non è supportata in questa compilazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1762">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) Interface capability feature is not supported in this build.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1763">Indice dell'interfaccia **NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1763">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1764">Puntatore a blocco di controllo IP **NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1764">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1765">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) S ervizio non viene chiamato dall'inizializzazione del sistema o dal contesto del thread.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1765">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) S ervice is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1766">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1766">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1767">Inizializzazione, thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1767">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1768">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1768">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1769">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1769">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1770">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1770">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
ULONG capability_flag = \
                 NX_INTERFACE_CAPABILITY_IPV4_TX_CHECKSUM |\
                 NX_INTERFACE_CAPABILITY_IPV4_RX_CHECKSUM;
UINT device_index = 0;

/* Set the hardware capability flag of specified interface. */
status = nx_ip_interface_capability_set(&ip_0,
                                        PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                        capability_flag);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the hardware capability flag was
   successfully set. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_detach"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1784">nx_ip_interface_detach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1784">nx_ip_interface_detach</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1785">Scollega l'interfaccia specificata dall'istanza IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1785">Detach the specified interface from the IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1786">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1786">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_address_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    UINT index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1787">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1787">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1788">Questo servizio scollega l'interfaccia IP specificata dall'istanza IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1788">This service detaches the specified IP interface from the IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1789">Una volta scollegata un'interfaccia, tutti i socket TCP connessi chiusi e le voci della cache ND e ARP per questa interfaccia vengono rimossi dalle rispettive tabelle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1789">Once an interface is detached, all connected TCP sockets closed, and ND cache and ARP entries for this interface are removed from their respective tables.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1790">Le appartenenze IGMP per questa interfaccia vengono rimosse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1790">IGMP memberships for this interface are removed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1791">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1791">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1792">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1792">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1793">**Indice** di Indice dell'interfaccia da rimuovere.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1793">**index** Index of the interface to be removed.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1794">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1794">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1795">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha rimosso correttamente un'interfaccia fisica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1795">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully removed a physical interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1796">L'interfaccia di rete specificata **NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) non è valida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1796">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Specified network interface is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1797">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatori non validi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1797">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointers.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1798">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1798">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1799">Inizializzazione, thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1799">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1800">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1800">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1801">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1801">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1802">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1802">Example</span></span>

```c
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1

/* Detach interface 1. */
status = nx_ip_interface_detach(&IP_0, INTERFACE_INDEX);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the interface is successfully detached
   from the IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1816">nx_ip_interface_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1816">nx_ip_interface_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1817">Recuperare i parametri dell'interfaccia di rete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1817">Retrieve network interface parameters</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1818">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1818">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    CHAR **interface_name,
    ULONG *ip_address,
    ULONG *network_mask,
    ULONG *mtu_size,
    ULONG *physical_address_msw,
    ULONG *physical_address_lsw);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1819">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1819">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1820">Questo servizio recupera informazioni sui parametri di rete per l'interfaccia di rete specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1820">This service retrieves information on network parameters for the specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1821">Tutti i dati vengono recuperati nell'ordine dei byte dell'host.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1821">All data are retrieved in host byte order.</span></span> 

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1822">*ip_ptr deve puntare a una struttura IP NETX Duo valida. L'interfaccia specificata, se non l'interfaccia primaria, deve essere precedentemente collegata all'istanza IP*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1822">*ip_ptr must point to a valid NetX Duo IP structure. The specified interface, if not the primary interface, must be previously attached to the IP instance*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1823">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1823">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1824">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1824">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1825">**interface_index** Indice che specifica l'interfaccia di rete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1825">**interface_index** Index specifying network interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1826">**INTERFACE_NAME** Puntatore al buffer che include il nome dell'interfaccia di rete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1826">**interface_name** Pointer to the buffer that holds the name of the network interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1827">**ip_address** Puntatore alla destinazione per l'indirizzo IP dell'interfaccia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1827">**ip_address** Pointer to the destination for the IP address of the interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1828">**network_mask** Puntatore alla destinazione per network mask.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1828">**network_mask** Pointer to destination for network mask.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1829">**mtu_size** Puntatore alla destinazione per l'unità di trasferimento massima per questa interfaccia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1829">**mtu_size** Pointer to destination for maximum transfer unit for this interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1830">**physical_address_msw** Puntatore alla destinazione per i primi 16 bit dell'indirizzo MAC del dispositivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1830">**physical_address_msw** Pointer to destination for top 16 bits of the device MAC address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1831">**physical_address_lsw** Puntatore alla destinazione per i 32 bit inferiori dell'indirizzo MAC del dispositivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1831">**physical_address_lsw** Pointer to destination for lower 32 bits of the device MAC address.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1832">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1832">Return Values</span></span>   

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1833">Sono state ottenute le informazioni sull'interfaccia **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1833">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Interface information has been obtained.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1834">L'input del puntatore **NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non è valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1834">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer input.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1835">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) puntatore IP non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1835">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1836">Il servizio **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) non viene chiamato dall'inizializzazione del sistema o dal contesto del thread.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1836">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1837">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1837">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1838">Inizializzazione, thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1838">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1839">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1839">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1840">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1840">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1841">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1841">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve interface parameters for the specified interface (index
   1 in IP instance list of interfaces). */
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1
status = nx_ip_interface_info_get(ip_ptr, INTERFACE_INDEX,
                                  &name_ptr, &ip_address,
                                  &network_mask,
                                  &mtu_size,
                                  &physical_address_msw,
                                  &physical_address_lsw);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the interface information is
   successfully retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_mtu_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1855">nx_ip_interface_mtu_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1855">nx_ip_interface_mtu_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1856">Impostare il valore MTU di un'interfaccia di rete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1856">Set the MTU value of a network interface</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1857">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1857">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_mtu_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG mtu_size);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1858">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1858">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1859">Questo servizio viene usato dal driver di dispositivo per configurare il valore MTU IP per l'interfaccia di rete specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1859">This service is used by the device driver to configure the IP MTU value for the specified network interface.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1860">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1860">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1861">**ip_ptr** Puntatore del blocco di controllo IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1861">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1862">**interface_index** Indicizzare l'interfaccia di rete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1862">**interface_index** Index to the network interface</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1863">**mtu_size** Dimensioni MTU IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1863">**mtu_size** IP MTU size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1864">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1864">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1865">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha impostato correttamente il valore MTU</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1865">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set MTU value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1866">Indice dell'interfaccia **NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1866">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1867">Puntatore a blocco di controllo IP **NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1867">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1868">Il servizio **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) non viene chiamato dall'inizializzazione del sistema o dal contesto del thread.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1868">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1869">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1869">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1870">Inizializzazione, thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1870">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1871">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1871">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1872">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1872">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1873">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1873">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
ULONG       mtu_size = 1500;

/* Set the MTU size of specified interface. */
status = nx_ip_interface_mtu_set(&ip_0,
                                 PRIMARY_INTERFACE, mtu_size);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the MTU size was successfully set. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_physical_address_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1887">nx_ip_interface_physical_address_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1887">nx_ip_interface_physical_address_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1888">Ottenere l'indirizzo fisico di un dispositivo di rete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1888">Get the physical address of a network device</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1889">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1889">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_physical_address_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG *physical_msw,
    ULONG *physical_lsw);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1890">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1890">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1891">Questo servizio recupera l'indirizzo fisico di un'interfaccia di rete dall'istanza IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1891">This service retrieves the physical address of a network interface from the IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1892">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1892">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1893">**ip_ptr** Puntatore del blocco di controllo IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1893">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1894">**interface_index** Indice dell'interfaccia di rete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1894">**interface_index** Index of the network interface</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1895">**physical_msw** Puntatore alla destinazione per i primi 16 bit dell'indirizzo MAC del dispositivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1895">**physical_msw** Pointer to destination for top 16 bits of the device MAC address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1896">**physical_lsw** Puntatore alla destinazione per i 32 bit inferiori dell'indirizzo MAC del dispositivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1896">**physical_lsw** Pointer to destination for lower 32 bits of the device MAC address</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1897">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1897">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1898">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Get riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1898">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1899">Indice dell'interfaccia **NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1899">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1900">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore a blocco di controllo IP o puntatore a indirizzo fisico non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1900">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer or physical address pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1901">Il servizio **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) non viene chiamato dall'inizializzazione del sistema o dal contesto del thread.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1901">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1902">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1902">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1903">Inizializzazione, thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1903">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1904">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1904">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1905">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1905">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1906">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1906">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
ULONG   physical_msw;
ULONG   physical_lsw;

/* Get the physical address of specified interface. */
status = nx_ip_interface_physical_address_get(&ip_0,
                                              PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                              &physical_msw,
                                              &physical_lsw);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the physical address was successfully
   retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_physical_address_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1920">nx_ip_interface_physical_address_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1920">nx_ip_interface_physical_address_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1921">Imposta l'indirizzo fisico per un'interfaccia di rete specificata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1921">Set the physical address for a specified network interface</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1922">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1922">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_physical_address_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG physical_msw,
    ULONG physical_lsw,
    UINT update_driver);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1923">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1923">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1924">Questo servizio viene usato dall'applicazione o da un driver di dispositivo per configurare l'indirizzo fisico dell'indirizzo MAC dell'interfaccia di rete specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1924">This service is used by the application or a device driver to configure the physical address of the MAC address of the specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1925">Il nuovo indirizzo MAC viene applicato al blocco di controllo della struttura dell'interfaccia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1925">The new MAC address is applied to the control block of the interface structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1926">Se viene impostato il flag di ***update_driver*** , viene emesso un comando a livello di driver in modo che il driver di dispositivo sia in grado di aggiornare il proprio indirizzo Mac programmato nel controller Ethernet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1926">If the ***update_driver*** flag is set, a driver-level command is issued so the device driver is able to update its MAC address programmed into the Ethernet controller.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1927">In una situazione tipica, questo servizio viene chiamato dal driver di dispositivo di interfaccia durante la fase di inizializzazione per notificare lo stack IP del relativo indirizzo MAC.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1927">In a typical situation, this service is called from the interface device driver during initialization phase to notify the IP stack of its MAC address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1928">In questo caso, il flag di ***update_driver*** non deve essere impostato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1928">In this case, the ***update_driver*** flag should not be set.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1929">Questa routine può essere chiamata anche dall'applicazione utente per riconfigurare l'indirizzo MAC dell'interfaccia in fase di esecuzione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1929">This routine can also be called from user application to reconfigure the interface MAC address at run time.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1930">In questo caso di utilizzo, è necessario impostare il flag di ***update_driver*** , in modo che il nuovo indirizzo Mac possa essere applicato al driver di dispositivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1930">In this use case, the ***update_driver*** flag should be set, so the new MAC address can be applied to the device driver.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1931">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1931">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1932">**ip_ptr** Puntatore del blocco di controllo IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1932">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1933">**interface_index** Indicizzare l'interfaccia di rete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1933">**interface_index** Index to the network interface</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1934">**physical_msw** Puntatore alla destinazione per i primi 16 bit dell'indirizzo MAC del dispositivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1934">**physical_msw** Pointer to destination for top 16 bits of the device MAC address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1935">**physical_lsw** Puntatore alla destinazione per i 32 bit inferiori dell'indirizzo MAC del dispositivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1935">**physical_lsw** Pointer to destination for lower 32 bits of the device MAC address</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1936">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1936">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1937">Set di **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1937">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1938">Comando **NX_UNHANDLED_COMMAND** (0x4B) non riconosciuto dal driver</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1938">**NX_UNHANDLED_COMMAND** (0x4B) Command not recognized by the driver</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1939">Indice dell'interfaccia **NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1939">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1940">Puntatore a blocco di controllo IP **NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1940">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1941">Il servizio **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) non viene chiamato dall'inizializzazione del sistema o dal contesto del thread.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1941">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1942">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1942">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1943">Inizializzazione, thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1943">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1944">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1944">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1945">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1945">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1946">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1946">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
ULONG       physical_msw = 0x00CF;
ULONG       physical_lsw = 0x01020304;

/* Set the physical address of specified device. */
status = nx_ip_interface_physical_address_set(&ip_0,
                                              PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                              physical_msw,
                                              physical_lsw,
                                              NX_TRUE);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the physical address was successfully
   set. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_status_check"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1960">nx_ip_interface_status_check</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1960">nx_ip_interface_status_check</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1961">Controllare lo stato di un'istanza IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1961">Check status of an IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1962">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1962">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_status_check(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index
    ULONG needed_status,
    ULONG *actual_status,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1963">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1963">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1964">Questo servizio controlla ed eventualmente attende lo stato specificato dell'interfaccia di rete di un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1964">This service checks and optionally waits for the specified status of the network interface of a previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1965">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1965">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1966">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1966">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1967">**interface_index** Numero di indice dell'interfaccia needed_status stato IP richiesto, definito nel formato mappa di bit, come indicato di seguito:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1967">**interface_index** Interface index number needed_status IP status requested, defined in bit-map form as follows:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1968">**NX_IP_INITIALIZE_DONE** (0x0001)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1968">**NX_IP_INITIALIZE_DONE** (0x0001)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1969">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_RESOLVED** (0x0002)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1969">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_RESOLVED** (0x0002)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1970">**NX_IP_LINK_ENABLED** (0x0004)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1970">**NX_IP_LINK_ENABLED** (0x0004)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1971">**NX_IP_ARP_ENABLED** (0x0008)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1971">**NX_IP_ARP_ENABLED** (0x0008)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1972">**NX_IP_UDP_ENABLED** (0x0010)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1972">**NX_IP_UDP_ENABLED** (0x0010)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1973">**NX_IP_TCP_ENABLED** (0x0020)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1973">**NX_IP_TCP_ENABLED** (0x0020)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1974">**NX_IP_IGMP_ENABLED** (0x0040)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1974">**NX_IP_IGMP_ENABLED** (0x0040)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1975">**NX_IP_RARP_COMPLETE** (0x0080)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1975">**NX_IP_RARP_COMPLETE** (0x0080)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1976">**NX_IP_INTERFACE_LINK_ENABLED** (0x0100)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1976">**NX_IP_INTERFACE_LINK_ENABLED** (0x0100)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1977">**actual_status** Puntatore alla destinazione del set di bit effettivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1977">**actual_status** Pointer to destination of actual bits set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1978">wait_option definisce il comportamento del servizio se i bit di stato richiesti non sono disponibili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1978">wait_option Defines how the service behaves if the requested status bits are not available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1979">Le opzioni di attesa sono definite come segue:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1979">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1980">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1980">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1984">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Verifica stato IP riuscito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1984">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP status check.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1989">Il Interface_index **NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) non è compreso nell'intervallo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1989">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface_index is out of range.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1990">oppure l'interfaccia non è valida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1990">or the interface is not valid.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-1995">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-1995">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Wait 10 ticks for the link up status on the previously created IP
   instance. */
status = nx_ip_interface_status_check(&ip_0, 1, NX_IP_LINK_ENABLED,
                                      &actual_status, 10);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the secondary link for the specified IP
   instance is up. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_link_status_change_notify_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2009">nx_ip_link_status_change_notify_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2009">nx_ip_link_status_change_notify_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2010">Impostare la funzione di callback notifica modifica stato collegamento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2010">Set the link status change notify callback function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2011">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2011">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_link_status_change_notify_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    VOID(*link_status_change_notify)(NX_IP *ip_ptr, UINT interface_index, UINT link_up));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2012">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2012">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2013">Questo servizio configura la funzione di callback notifica modifica stato collegamento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2013">This service configures the link status change notify callback function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2014">La routine di *link_status_change_notify* fornita dall'utente viene richiamata quando viene modificato lo stato dell'interfaccia primaria o secondaria, ad esempio se viene modificato l'indirizzo IP. Se *link_status_change_notify* è null, la funzionalità di callback notifica modifica stato collegamento è disabilitata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2014">The user-supplied *link_status_change_notify* routine is invoked when either the primary or secondary interface status is changed (such as IP address is changed.) If *link_status_change_notify* is NULL, the link status change notify callback feature is disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2015">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2015">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2016">**ip_ptr** Puntatore del blocco di controllo IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2016">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2017">**link_status_change_notify** Funzione di callback fornita dall'utente da chiamare su una modifica all'interfaccia fisica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2017">**link_status_change_notify** User-supplied callback function to be called upon a change to the physical interface.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2018">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2018">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2019">Set di **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2019">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2020">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore a blocco di controllo IP non valido o nuovo puntatore a indirizzo fisico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2020">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer or new physical address pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2021">Il servizio **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) non viene chiamato dall'inizializzazione del sistema o dal contesto del thread.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2021">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2022">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2022">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2023">Inizializzazione, thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2023">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2024">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2024">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2025">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2025">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2026">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2026">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Configure a callback function to be used when the physical
   interface status is changed. */
status = nx_ip_link_status_change_notify_set(&ip_0,
                                             my_change_cb);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the link status change notify function
   is set. */
```
