## <a name="nx_ip_max_payload_size_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2040">nx_ip_max_payload_size_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2040">nx_ip_max_payload_size_find</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2041">Calcolo del payload massimo dei dati del pacchetto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2041">Compute maximum packet data payload</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2042">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2042">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_max_payload_size_find(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *dest_address,
    UINT if_index,
    UINT src_port,
    UINT dest_port,
    ULONG protocol,
    ULONG *start_offset_ptr,
    ULONG *payload_length_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2043">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2043">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2044">Questo servizio rileva la dimensione massima del payload dell'applicazione che non richiede la frammentazione IP per raggiungere la destinazione. ad esempio, il payload è inferiore alle dimensioni MTU dell'interfaccia locale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2044">This service finds the maximum application payload size that will not require IP fragmentation to reach the destination; e.g., payload is at or below the local interface MTU size.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2045">(oppure il valore MTU del percorso ottenuto tramite l'individuazione MTU del percorso IPv6).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2045">(or the Path MTU value obtained via IPv6 Path MTU discovery).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2046">L'intestazione IP e la dimensione superiore dell'intestazione dell'applicazione (TCP o UDP) vengono sottratte dal payload totale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2046">IP header and upper application header size (TCP or UDP) are subtracted from the total payload.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2047">Se il criterio di sicurezza IPsec NetX duo si applica a questo endpoint, vengono sottratte anche le intestazioni IPsec (ESP/AH) e il sovraccarico associato, ad esempio il vettore iniziale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2047">If NetX Duo IPsec Security Policy applies to this end-point, the IPsec headers (ESP/AH) and associated overhead, such as Initial Vector, are also subtracted from the MTU.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2048">Questo servizio è applicabile per i pacchetti IPv4 e IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2048">This service is applicable for both IPv4 and IPv6 packets.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2049">Il parametro *if_index* specifica l'interfaccia da utilizzare per l'invio del pacchetto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2049">The parameter *if_index* specifies the interface to use for sending out the packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2050">Per un sistema multihome, il chiamante deve specificare il *if_index* parametro se la destinazione è un indirizzo broadcast (solo IPv4), multicast o IPv6 collegamento locale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2050">For a multihome system, the caller needs to specify the *if_index* parameter if the destination is a broadcast (IPv4 only), multicast, or IPv6 link-local address.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2051">Questo servizio restituisce due valori al chiamante:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2051">This service returns two values to the caller:</span></span>

1) <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2052">start_offset_ptr: posizione dopo le intestazioni TCP/UDP/IP/IPsec.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2052">start_offset_ptr: This is the location after the TCP/UDP/IP/IPsec headers;</span></span>
2) <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2053">payload_length_ptr: la quantità di applicazioni dati può essere trasferita senza superare la MTU.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2053">payload_length_ptr: the amount of data application may transfer without exceeding MTU.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2054">Non esiste un servizio NetX equivalente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2054">There is no equivalent NetX service.</span></span>

### <a name="restrictions"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2055">Restrizioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2055">Restrictions</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2056">L'istanza IP deve essere creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2056">The IP instance must be previously created.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2057">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2057">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2058">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a istanza IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2058">**ip_ptr** Pointer to IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2059">**dest_address** Puntatore all'indirizzo di destinazione del pacchetto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2059">**dest_address** Pointer to packet destination address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2060">**if_index** Indica l'indice dell'interfaccia da utilizzare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2060">**if_index** Indicates the index of the interface to use</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2061">**src_port** Numero di porta di origine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2061">**src_port** Source port number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2062">**dest_port** Numero di porta di destinazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2062">**dest_port** Destination port number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2063">**protocollo** di Protocollo di livello superiore da usare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2063">**protocol** Upper layer protocol to be used</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2064">**start_offset_ptr** Puntatore all'inizio dei dati per il payload del pacchetto massimo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2064">**start_offset_ptr** Pointer to the start of data for maximum packet payload</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2065">**payload_length_ptr** Puntatore a dimensioni del payload escluse le intestazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2065">**payload_length_ptr** Pointer to payload size excluding headers</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2066">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2066">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2067">Il payload **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) è stato calcolato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2067">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Payload successfully computed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2068">L'indice dell'interfaccia **NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) non è valido oppure l'interfaccia non è valida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2068">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is invalid, or the interface is not valid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2069">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) indirizzo IP non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2069">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2070">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore IP non valido o indirizzo di destinazione non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2070">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer, or invalid destination address</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2072">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) protocollo non valido (non UDP o TCP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2072">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) Invalid protocol (not UDP or TCP)</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2078">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2078">Example</span></span>

```c
/* The following example determines the maximum payload for UDP
   packet to remote host. */
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
status = nx_ip_max_payload_size_find(&ip_0,
                                     &dest_ipv6_address,
                                     PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                     source_port,
                                     dest_port, NX_PROTOCOL_UDP,
                                     &start_offset,
                                     &payload_length);

/* A return value of NX_SUCCESS indicates the packet payload
   payload_length starting at the offset start_offset is
   successfully computed. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_raw_packet_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2103">nx_ip_raw_packet_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2103">nx_ip_raw_packet_disable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2104">Disabilitare l'invio/ricezione di pacchetti non elaborati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2104">Disable raw packet sending/receiving</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2105">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2105">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_raw_packet_disable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2106">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2106">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2107">Questo servizio Disabilita la trasmissione e la ricezione di pacchetti IP non elaborati per questa istanza IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2107">This service disables transmission and reception of raw IP packets for this IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2108">Se il servizio pacchetti non elaborati è stato precedentemente abilitato e sono presenti pacchetti non elaborati nella coda di ricezione, il servizio rilascerà tutti i pacchetti non elaborati ricevuti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2108">If the raw packet service was previously enabled, and there are raw packets in the receive queue, this service will release any received raw packets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2109">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2109">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2110">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2110">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2111">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2111">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2112">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) la disabilitazione del pacchetto non elaborato IP è riuscita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2112">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP raw packet disable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2113">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore IP non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2113">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2114">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2114">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2115">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2115">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2116">Inizializzazione, thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2116">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2117">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2117">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2118">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2118">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2119">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2119">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Disable raw packet sending/receiving for this IP instance. */
status = nx_ip_raw_packet_disable(&ip_0);
/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, raw IP packet sending/receiving has
   been disabled for the previously created IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_raw_packet_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2129">nx_ip_raw_packet_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2129">nx_ip_raw_packet_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2130">Abilita elaborazione pacchetti non elaborati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2130">Enable raw packet processing</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2131">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2131">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_raw_packet_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2132">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2132">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2133">Questo servizio consente la trasmissione e la ricezione di pacchetti IP non elaborati per questa istanza IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2133">This service enables transmission and reception of raw IP packets for this IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2134">I pacchetti TCP, UDP, ICMP e IGMP in ingresso vengono ancora elaborati da NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2134">Incoming TCP, UDP, ICMP, and IGMP packets are still processed by NetX Duo.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2135">I pacchetti con tipi di protocollo di livello superiore sconosciuti vengono elaborati dalla routine di ricezione dei pacchetti non elaborati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2135">Packets with unknown upper layer protocol types are processed by raw packet reception routine.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2136">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2136">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2137">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2137">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2138">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2138">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2139">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) abilitata per i pacchetti non elaborati IP riusciti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2139">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP raw packet enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2140">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore IP non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2140">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2141">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2141">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2142">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2142">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2143">Inizializzazione, thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2143">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2144">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2144">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2145">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2145">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2146">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2146">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable raw packet sending/receiving for this IP instance. */
status = nx_ip_raw_packet_enable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, raw IP packet sending/receiving has
   been enabled for the previously created IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_raw_packet_filter_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2156">nx_ip_raw_packet_filter_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2156">nx_ip_raw_packet_filter_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2157">Imposta filtro pacchetti IP non elaborato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2157">Set raw IP packet filter</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2158">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2158">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_raw_packet_filter_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT (*raw_packet_filter)(NX_IP *, ULONG, NX_PACKET *));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2159">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2159">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2160">Questo servizio configura il filtro dei pacchetti non elaborati IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2160">This service configures the IP raw packet filter.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2161">La funzione di filtro dei pacchetti non elaborati, implementata dall'applicazione utente, consente a un'applicazione di ricevere pacchetti non elaborati in base ai criteri forniti dall'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2161">The raw packet filter function, implemented by user application, allows an application to receive raw packets based on user-supplied criteria.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2162">Si noti che NetX Duo BSD wrapper layer usa la funzionalità di filtro dei pacchetti non elaborati per gestire il socket non elaborato nel livello BSD.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2162">Note that NetX Duo BSD wrapper layer uses the raw packet filter feature to handle raw socket in the BSD layer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2163">Per usare questo servizio, è necessario compilare la libreria NetX Duo con l'opzione ***NX_ENABLE_IP_RAW_PACKET_FILTER*** definita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2163">To use this service, the NetX Duo library must be built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_IP_RAW_PACKET_FILTER*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2164">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2164">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2165">**ip_ptr** Puntatore del blocco di controllo IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2165">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2166">**raw_packet_filter** Puntatore a funzione del filtro pacchetti non elaborati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2166">**raw_packet_filter** Function pointer of the raw packet filter</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2167">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2167">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2168">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha impostato correttamente la routine di filtro dei pacchetti non elaborati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2168">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the raw packet filter routine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2169">Il supporto per i pacchetti non elaborati **NX_NOT_SUPPORT** (0x4B) non è disponibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2169">**NX_NOT_SUPPORT** (0x4B) Raw packet support is not available</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2170">Puntatore a blocco di controllo IP **NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2170">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2171">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2171">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2172">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2172">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2173">Inizializzazione, thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2173">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2174">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2174">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2175">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2175">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2176">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2176">Example</span></span>

```c
UINT raw_packet_filter(NX_IP *ip_ptr, ULONG protocol,
                       NX_PACKET *packet_ptr)
{

/* Simply filter protocol. */
if(protocol == NX_IP_RAW)
   return NX_SUCCESS;
else
   return NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL;
}

void raw_packet_thread_entry(ULONG id)
{

/* Set the raw packet filter of IP instance. */
status = nx_ip_raw_packet_filter_set(&ip_0,
                                     raw_packet_filter);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the raw packet filter of IP instance
   was successfully set. */
}
```

## <a name="nx_ip_raw_packet_receive"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2186">nx_ip_raw_packet_receive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2186">nx_ip_raw_packet_receive</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2187">Ricevi pacchetto IP non elaborato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2187">Receive raw IP packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2188">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2188">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_raw_packet_receive(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NX_PACKET **packet_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2189">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2189">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2190">Questo servizio riceve un pacchetto IP non elaborato dall'istanza IP specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2190">This service receives a raw IP packet from the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2191">Se nella coda di ricezione di pacchetti non elaborati sono presenti pacchetti IP, il primo pacchetto (meno recente) viene restituito al chiamante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2191">If there are IP packets on the raw packet receive queue, the first (oldest) packet is returned to the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2192">In caso contrario, se non sono disponibili pacchetti, il chiamante potrebbe sospendere come specificato dall'opzione wait.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2192">Otherwise, if no packets are available, the caller may suspend as specified by the wait option.</span></span>

> [!CAUTION]   
> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2193">*Se viene restituito NX_SUCCESS, l'applicazione è responsabile del rilascio del pacchetto ricevuto quando non è più necessario*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2193">*If NX_SUCCESS, is returned, the application is responsible for releasing the received packet when it is no longer needed*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2194">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2194">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2195">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2195">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2196">**packet_ptr** Puntatore al puntatore in cui inserire il pacchetto IP non elaborato ricevuto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2196">**packet_ptr** Pointer to pointer to place the received raw IP packet in.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2197">**WAIT_OPTION** Definisce il comportamento del servizio se i pacchetti non sono disponibili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2197">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if packets are not available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2198">Le opzioni di attesa sono definite come segue:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2198">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2199">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2199">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2200">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2200">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2201">**valore di timeout in cicli (da 0x00000001 a** 0xfffffffe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2201">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2202">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2202">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2203">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) la ricezione di pacchetti non elaborati IP riuscita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2203">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP raw packet receive.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2204">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) non è disponibile alcun pacchetto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2204">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) No packet was available.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2205">La sospensione richiesta **NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) è stata interrotta da una chiamata al tx_thread_wait_abort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2205">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2206">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) questo componente non è stato abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2206">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2207">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) indirizzo IP non valido o puntatore al pacchetto restituito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2207">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or return packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2208">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questo servizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2208">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2209">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2209">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2210">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2210">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2211">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2211">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2212">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2212">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2213">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2213">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Receive a raw IP packet for this IP instance, wait for a maximum
   of 4 timer ticks. */
status = nx_ip_raw_packet_receive(&ip_0, &packet_ptr, 4);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the raw IP packet pointer is in the
   variable packet_ptr. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2217">nx_ip_raw_packet_filter_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2217">nx_ip_raw_packet_filter_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2218">nx_ip_raw_packet_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2218">nx_ip_raw_packet_send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2219">nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2219">nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2220">nx_ip_raw_receive_queue_max_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2220">nx_ip_raw_receive_queue_max_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2221">nxd_ip_raw_packet_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2221">nxd_ip_raw_packet_send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2222">nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2222">nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ip_raw_packet_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2223">nx_ip_raw_packet_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2223">nx_ip_raw_packet_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2224">Invia pacchetto IP non elaborato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2224">Send raw IP packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2225">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2225">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_raw_packet_send(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG destination_ip,
    ULONG type_of_service);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2226">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2226">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2227">Questo servizio invia un pacchetto IPv4 non elaborato all'indirizzo IP di destinazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2227">This service sends a raw IPv4 packet to the destination IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2228">Si noti che questa routine viene restituita immediatamente e non è quindi noto se il pacchetto IP è stato effettivamente inviato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2228">Note that this routine returns immediately, and it is therefore not known whether the IP packet has actually been sent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2229">Il driver di rete sarà responsabile del rilascio del pacchetto al termine della trasmissione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2229">The network driver will be responsible for releasing the packet when the transmission is complete.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2230">Per un sistema multihome, NetX Duo usa l'indirizzo IP di destinazione per trovare un'interfaccia di rete appropriata e usa l'indirizzo IP dell'interfaccia come indirizzo di origine.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2230">For a multihome system, NetX Duo uses the destination IP address to find an appropriate network interface and uses the IP address of the interface as the source address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2231">Se l'indirizzo IP di destinazione è broadcast o multicast, viene utilizzata la prima interfaccia valida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2231">If the destination IP address is broadcast or multicast, the first valid interface is used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2232">In questo caso, le applicazioni usano la ***nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send*** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2232">Applications use the ***nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send*** in this case.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2233">Per inviare un pacchetto IPv6 non elaborato, l'applicazione deve usare il servizio ***nxd_ip_raw_packet_send,** _ o _ *_nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send._**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2233">To send a raw IPv6 packet, application shall use the service ***nxd_ip_raw_packet_send,** _ or _ *_nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send._**</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2234">*A meno che non venga restituito un errore, l'applicazione non deve rilasciare il pacchetto dopo questa chiamata. Questa operazione causerà risultati imprevedibili perché il driver di rete rilascerà il pacchetto dopo la trasmissione*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2234">*Unless an error is returned, the application should not release the packet after this call. Doing so will cause unpredictable results because the network driver will release the packet after transmission*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2235">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2235">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2236">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2236">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2237">**packet_ptr** Puntatore al pacchetto IP non elaborato da inviare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2237">**packet_ptr** Pointer to the raw IP packet to send.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2238">**destination_ip** Indirizzo IP di destinazione, che può essere un indirizzo IP host specifico, una trasmissione di rete, un ciclo interno o un indirizzo multicast.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2238">**destination_ip** Destination IP address, which can be a specific host IP address, a network broadcast, an internal loop-back, or a multicast address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2239">**Type_of_Service** Definisce il tipo di servizio per la trasmissione. i valori validi sono i seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2239">**type_of_service** Defines the type of service for the transmission, legal values are as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2240">**NX_IP_NORMAL** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2240">**NX_IP_NORMAL** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2241">**NX_IP_MIN_DELAY** (0x00100000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2241">**NX_IP_MIN_DELAY** (0x00100000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2242">**NX_IP_MAX_DATA** (0x00080000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2242">**NX_IP_MAX_DATA** (0x00080000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2243">**NX_IP_MAX_RELIABLE** (0x00040000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2243">**NX_IP_MAX_RELIABLE** (0x00040000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2244">**NX_IP_MIN_COST** (0x00020000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2244">**NX_IP_MIN_COST** (0x00020000)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2245">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2245">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2246">È stata avviata l'operazione di invio di pacchetti non elaborati non elaborati (0x00) **NX_SUCCESS**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2246">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP raw packet send initiated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2247">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) indirizzo IP non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2247">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2248">La funzionalità IP raw **NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) non è abilitata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2248">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Raw IP feature is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2249">Il tipo di servizio **NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0X0A) non è valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2249">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0A) Invalid type of service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2250">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) spazio insufficiente per anteporre un'intestazione IP al pacchetto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2250">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Not enough room to prepend an IP header on the packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2251">Il puntatore di aggiunta del pacchetto **NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) non è valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2251">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Packet append pointer is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2252">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) un puntatore IP o di pacchetto non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2252">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2253">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2253">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2254">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2254">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2255">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2255">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2256">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2256">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2257">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2257">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2258">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2258">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Send a raw IP packet to IP address 1.2.3.5. */
status = nx_ip_raw_packet_send(&ip_0, packet_ptr,
                               IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,5),
                               NX_IP_NORMAL);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the raw IP packet pointed to by
   packet_ptr has been sent. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2269">nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2269">nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2270">Invia pacchetto IP non elaborato tramite l'interfaccia di rete specificata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2270">Send raw IP packet through specified network interface</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2271">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2271">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG destination_ip,
    UINT address_index,
    ULONG type_of_service);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2272">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2272">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2273">Questo servizio invia un pacchetto IP non elaborato all'indirizzo IP di destinazione utilizzando l'indirizzo IPv4 locale specificato come indirizzo di origine e tramite l'interfaccia di rete associata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2273">This service sends a raw IP packet to the destination IP address using the specified local IPv4 address as the source address, and through the associated network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2274">Si noti che questa routine restituisce immediatamente un risultato e, pertanto, non è noto se il pacchetto IP è effettivamente stato inviato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2274">Note that this routine returns immediately, and it is, therefore, not known if the IP packet has actually been sent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2275">Il driver di rete sarà responsabile del rilascio del pacchetto al termine della trasmissione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2275">The network driver will be responsible for releasing the packet when the transmission is complete.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2276">Questo servizio differisce da altri servizi in quanto non esiste alcun modo per sapere se il pacchetto è stato effettivamente inviato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2276">This service differs from other services in that there is no way of knowing if the packet was actually sent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2277">Potrebbe andare persa in Internet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2277">It could get lost on the Internet.</span></span>

> [!CAUTION]  
> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2278">*Si noti che è necessario abilitare l'elaborazione di indirizzi IP non elaborati*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2278">*Note that raw IP processing must be enabled*.</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2279">*Questo servizio è simile a **nx_ip_raw_packet_send,** ad eccezione del fatto che questo servizio consente a un'applicazione di inviare un pacchetto IPv4 non elaborato da un'interfaccia fisica specificata*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2279">*This service is similar to **nx_ip_raw_packet_send,** except that this service allows an application to send raw IPv4 packet from a specified physical interfaces*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2280">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2280">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2281">**ip_ptr** Puntatore all'attività IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2281">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP task.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2282">**packet_ptr** Puntatore al pacchetto da trasmettere.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2282">**packet_ptr** Pointer to packet to transmit.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2283">**destination_ip** Indirizzo IP per l'invio del pacchetto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2283">**destination_ip** IP address to send packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2284">**address_index** Indice dell'indirizzo dell'interfaccia su cui inviare il pacchetto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2284">**address_index** Index of the address of the interface to send packet out on.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2285">**Type_of_Service** Tipo di servizio per il pacchetto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2285">**type_of_service** Type of service for packet.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2286">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2286">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2287">Il pacchetto **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) è stato trasmesso correttamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2287">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Packet successfully transmitted.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2288">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0X21) non è disponibile alcuna interfaccia in uscita adatta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2288">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) No suitable outgoing interface available.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2289">L'elaborazione dei pacchetti IP non elaborati **NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) non è abilitata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2289">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Raw IP packet processing not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2290">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2290">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2291">L'input del puntatore **NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non è valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2291">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer input.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2292">Il tipo di servizio specificato **NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0X0A) non è valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2292">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0A) Invalid type of service specified.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2293">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) puntatore a anteporre il pacchetto non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2293">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Invalid packet prepend pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2294">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) puntatore a anteporre il pacchetto non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2294">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Invalid packet prepend pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2295">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) è stato specificato un indice di interfaccia non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2295">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid interface index specified.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2296">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2296">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2297">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2297">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2298">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2298">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2299">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2299">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2300">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2300">Example</span></span>

```c
#define ADDRESS_IDNEX 1

/* Send packet out on interface 1 with normal type of service. */
status = nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send(ip_ptr, packet_ptr,
                                      destination_ip,
                                      ADDRESS_INDEX,
                                      NX_IP_NORMAL);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the packet was successfully
   transmitted. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_raw_receive_queue_max_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2310">nx_ip_raw_receive_queue_max_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2310">nx_ip_raw_receive_queue_max_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2311">Imposta dimensione massima coda di ricezione non elaborata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2311">Set maximum raw receive queue size</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2312">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2312">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_raw_receive_queue_max_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG queue_max);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2313">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2313">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2314">Questo servizio configura la profondità massima della coda di ricezione pacchetti non elaborati IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2314">This service configures the maximum depth of the IP raw packet receive queue.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2315">Si noti che la coda di ricezione di pacchetti non elaborati IP è condivisa con i pacchetti IPv4 e IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2315">Note that the IP raw packet receive queue is shared with both IPv4 and IPv6 packets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2316">Quando la coda di ricezione pacchetti non elaborati raggiunge la profondità massima di userconfigured, i pacchetti non elaborati appena ricevuti vengono eliminati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2316">When the raw packet receive queue reaches the userconfigured maximum depth, newly received raw packets are dropped.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2317">La profondità della coda di ricezione pacchetti non elaborati IP predefinita è 20.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2317">The default IP raw packet receive queue depth is 20.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2318">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2318">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2319">**ip_ptr** Puntatore del blocco di controllo IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2319">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2320">**queue_max** Nuovo valore per le dimensioni della coda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2320">**queue_max** New value for the queue size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2321">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2321">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2322">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha impostato correttamente la profondità massima della coda di ricezione non elaborata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2322">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set raw receive queue maximum depth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2323">Puntatore a blocco di controllo IP **NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2323">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2324">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2324">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2325">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2325">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2326">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2326">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2327">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2327">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2328">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2328">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2329">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2329">Example</span></span>

```c
ULONG queue_max = 10;

/* Set the maximum size of the IP raw packet receive queue. */
status = nx_ip_raw_receive_queue_max_set (&ip_0,
                                          queue_max);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the maximum size of the IP raw packet
   receive queue was successfully set. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_static_route_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2339">nx_ip_static_route_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2339">nx_ip_static_route_add</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2340">Aggiungere una route statica alla tabella di routing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2340">Add static route to the routing table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2341">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2341">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_static_route_add(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG network_address,
    ULONG net_mask,
    ULONG next_hop);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2342">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2342">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2343">Questo servizio aggiunge una voce alla tabella di routing statica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2343">This service adds an entry to the static routing table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2344">Si noti che l'indirizzo di *next_hop* deve essere direttamente accessibile da uno dei dispositivi di rete locali.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2344">Note that the *next_hop* address must be directly accessible from one of the local network devices.</span></span>

> [!CAUTION]  
> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2345">*Si noti che ip_ptr necessario puntare a una struttura IP NETX Duo valida e che la libreria NETX Duo deve essere compilata con NX_ENABLE_IP_STATIC_ROUTING definito per l'utilizzo di questo servizio. Per impostazione predefinita, NetX Duo viene compilato senza NX_ENABLE_IP_STATIC_ROUTING definito*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2345">*Note that ip_ptr must point to a valid NetX Duo IP structure and the NetX Duo library must be built with NX_ENABLE_IP_STATIC_ROUTING defined to use this service. By default NetX Duo is built without NX_ENABLE_IP_STATIC_ROUTING defined*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2346">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2346">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2347">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2347">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2348">**Network_Address** Indirizzo di rete di destinazione, in ordine byte host</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2348">**network_address** Target network address, in host byte order</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2349">**net_mask** Network mask di destinazione, in ordine byte host</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2349">**net_mask** Target network mask, in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2350">**next_hop** Indirizzo hop successivo per la rete di destinazione, in ordine byte host</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2350">**next_hop** Next hop address for the target network, in host byte order</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2351">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2351">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2352">La voce **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) viene aggiunta alla tabella di routing statica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2352">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Entry is added to the static routing table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2353">La tabella di routing statica **NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) è piena.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2353">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Static routing table is full.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2354">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0X4B) questa funzionalità non è compilata in.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2354">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) This feature is not compiled in.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2355">L'hop successivo **NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) non è direttamente accessibile tramite interfacce locali.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2355">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Next hop is not directly accessible via local interfaces.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2356">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2356">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2357">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ip_ptr puntatore non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2357">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid ip_ptr pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2358">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2358">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2359">Inizializzazione, thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2359">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2360">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2360">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2361">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2361">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2362">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2362">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Specify the next hop for 192.168.1.68 through the gateway
   192.168.1.1. */
status = nx_ip_static_route_add(ip_ptr, IP_ADDRESS(192,168,1,0),
                                0xFFFFFF00UL,
                                IP_ADDRESS(192,168,1,1));

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the route was successfully added to the
   static routing table. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_static_route_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2374">nx_ip_static_route_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2374">nx_ip_static_route_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2375">Elimina route statica dalla tabella di routing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2375">Delete static route from routing table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2376">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2376">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_static_route_delete(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG network_address,
    ULONG net_mask);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2377">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2377">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2378">Questo servizio Elimina una voce dalla tabella di routing statica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2378">This service deletes an entry from the static routing table.</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2379">*Si noti che ip_ptr necessario puntare a una struttura IP NETX Duo valida e che la libreria NETX Duo deve essere compilata con NX_ENABLE_IP_STATIC_ROUTING definito per l'utilizzo di questo servizio. Per impostazione predefinita, NetX Duo viene compilato senza NX_ENABLE_IP_STATIC_ROUTING definito*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2379">*Note that ip_ptr must point to a valid NetX Duo IP structure and the NetX Duo library must be built with NX_ENABLE_IP_STATIC_ROUTING defined to use this service. By default NetX Duo is built without NX_ENABLE_IP_STATIC_ROUTING defined*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2380">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2380">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2381">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2381">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2382">**Network_Address** Indirizzo di rete di destinazione, in ordine byte host.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2382">**network_address** Target network address, in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2383">**net_mask** Network mask di destinazione, in ordine byte host.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2383">**net_mask** Target network mask, in host byte order.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2384">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2384">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2385">L'eliminazione di **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) dalla tabella di routing statica è riuscita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2385">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful deletion from the static routing table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2386">Impossibile trovare la voce **NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0x43) nella tabella di routing.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2386">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0x43) Entry cannot be found in the routing table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2387">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0X4B) questa funzionalità non è compilata in.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2387">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) This feature is not compiled in.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2388">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ip_ptr puntatore non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2388">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid ip_ptr pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2389">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2389">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2390">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2390">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2391">Inizializzazione, thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2391">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2392">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2392">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2393">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2393">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2394">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2394">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Remove the static route for 192.168.1.68 from the routing
   table.*/
status = nx_ip_static_route_delete(ip_ptr,
                                   IP_ADDRESS(192,168,1,0),
                                   0xFFFFFF00UL,);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the route was successfully removed from
   the static routing table. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_status_check"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2406">nx_ip_status_check</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2406">nx_ip_status_check</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2407">Controllare lo stato di un'istanza IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2407">Check status of an IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2408">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2408">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_status_check(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG needed_status,
    ULONG *actual_status,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2409">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2409">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2410">Questo servizio controlla ed eventualmente attende lo stato specificato dell'interfaccia di rete primaria di un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2410">This service checks and optionally waits for the specified status of the primary network interface of a previously created IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2411">Per ottenere lo stato sulle interfacce secondarie, le applicazioni devono utilizzare il servizio ***nx_ip_interface_status_check.***</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2411">To obtain status on secondary interfaces, applications shall use the service ***nx_ip_interface_status_check.***</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2412">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2412">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2413">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2413">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2414">**needed_status** Stato IP richiesto, definito in formato mappa di bit, come indicato di seguito:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2414">**needed_status** IP status requested, defined in bit-map form as follows:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2415">**NX_IP_INITIALIZE_DONE** (0x0001)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2415">**NX_IP_INITIALIZE_DONE** (0x0001)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2416">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_RESOLVED** (0x0002)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2416">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_RESOLVED** (0x0002)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2417">**NX_IP_LINK_ENABLED** (0x0004)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2417">**NX_IP_LINK_ENABLED** (0x0004)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2418">**NX_IP_ARP_ENABLED** (0x0008)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2418">**NX_IP_ARP_ENABLED** (0x0008)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2419">**NX_IP_UDP_ENABLED** (0x0010)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2419">**NX_IP_UDP_ENABLED** (0x0010)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2420">**NX_IP_TCP_ENABLED** (0x0020)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2420">**NX_IP_TCP_ENABLED** (0x0020)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2421">**NX_IP_IGMP_ENABLED** (0x0040)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2421">**NX_IP_IGMP_ENABLED** (0x0040)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2422">**NX_IP_RARP_COMPLETE** (0x0080)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2422">**NX_IP_RARP_COMPLETE** (0x0080)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2423">**NX_IP_INTERFACE_LINK_ENABLED** (0x0100)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2423">**NX_IP_INTERFACE_LINK_ENABLED** (0x0100)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2424">**actual_status** Puntatore alla destinazione del set di bit effettivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2424">**actual_status** Pointer to destination of actual bits set.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2425">**WAIT_OPTION** Definisce il comportamento del servizio se i bit di stato richiesti non sono disponibili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2425">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if the requested status bits are not available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2426">Le opzioni di attesa sono definite come segue:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2426">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2427">**NX_NO_WAIT** 0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2427">**NX_NO_WAIT** 0x00000000)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2428">**valore di timeout in cicli (da 0x00000001 a** 0xfffffffe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2428">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2429">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** 0xFFFFFFFF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2429">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** 0xFFFFFFFF</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2430">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2430">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2431">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Verifica stato IP riuscito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2431">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP status check.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2432">La richiesta di stato **NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0x43) non è stata soddisfatta entro il timeout specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2432">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0x43) Status request was not satisfied within the timeout specified.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2433">Il puntatore IP **NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) è o è diventato non valido oppure il puntatore di stato effettivo non è valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2433">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP pointer is or has become invalid, or actual status pointer is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2434">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0A) opzione di stato necessaria non valida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2434">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0a) Invalid needed status option.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2435">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2435">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2436">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2436">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2437">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2437">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2438">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2438">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2439">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2439">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2440">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2440">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Wait 10 ticks for the link up status on the previously created IP
   instance. */
status = nx_ip_status_check(&ip_0, NX_IP_LINK_ENABLED,
                            &actual_status, 10);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the link for the specified IP instance
   is up. */
```

## <a name="nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2465">nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2465">nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2466">Unisci istanza IP al gruppo multicast specificato tramite un'interfaccia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2466">Join IP instance to specified multicast group via an interface</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2467">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2467">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG group_address,
    UINT interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2468">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2468">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2469">Questo servizio unisce un'istanza IP al gruppo multicast specificato tramite un'interfaccia di rete specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2469">This service joins an IP instance to the specified multicast group via a specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2470">Una volta che l'istanza IP è stata aggiunta a un gruppo multicast, la logica di ricezione IP inizia a inoltrare i pacchetti di dati dal gruppo Give multicast al livello superiore.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2470">Once the IP instance joins a multicast group, the IP receive logic starts to forward data packets from the give multicast group to the upper layer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2471">Si noti che questo servizio viene unito a un gruppo multicast senza inviare report IGMP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2471">Note that this service joins a multicast group without sending IGMP reports.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2472">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2472">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2473">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2473">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2474">**group_address** Indirizzo del gruppo multicast IP di classe D da unire in ordine byte host.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2474">**group_address** Class D IP multicast group address to join in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2475">**interface_index** Indice dell'interfaccia associata all'istanza di NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2475">**interface_index** Index of the Interface attached to the NetX Duo instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2476">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2476">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2477">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) il join del gruppo multicast è riuscito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2477">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multicast group join.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2478">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) non è possibile unire in join più gruppi multicast. è stato superato il limite massimo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2478">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) No more multicast groups can be joined, maximum exceeded.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2479">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore non valido a un'istanza IP o l'istanza IP non è valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2479">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer to IP instance, or the IP instance is invalid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2480">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2480">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2481">**NX_NOT_EANABLED** (0X14) IGMP non è abilitato in questa istanza IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2481">**NX_NOT_EANABLED** (0x14) IGMP is not enabled in this IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2482">L'indirizzo del gruppo multicast **NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) specificato non è un indirizzo di classe D valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2482">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Multicast group address provided is not a valid class D address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2483">L'indice del dispositivo **NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) punta a un'interfaccia di rete non valida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2483">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Device index points to an invalid network interface.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2484">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2484">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2485">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2485">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2486">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2486">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2487">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2487">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2488">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2488">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Previously created IP Instance joins the multicast group
   224.0.0.200, via the interface at index 1 in the IP interface
   list. */
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1
status = nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join
                                 (&ip IP_ADDRESS(224,0,0,200),
                                  INTERFACE_INDEX);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the IP instance has successfully joined
   the multicast group. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2495">nx_igmp_multicast_interface_leave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2495">nx_igmp_multicast_interface_leave</span></span>
