- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2499">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2499">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2500">nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2500">nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2501">Lascia il gruppo multicast specificato tramite un'interfaccia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2501">Leave specified multicast group via an interface</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2502">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2502">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG group_address,
    UINT interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2503">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2503">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2504">Questo servizio lascia il gruppo multicast specificato tramite un'interfaccia di rete specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2504">This service leaves the specified multicast group via a specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2505">Dopo aver lasciato il gruppo, il servizio non attiverà i messaggi IGMP generati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2505">After leaving the group, this service does not trigger IGMP messages being generated.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2506">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2506">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2507">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2507">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2508">**group_address** Indirizzo del gruppo multicast IP di classe D da lasciare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2508">**group_address** Class D IP multicast group address to leave.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2509">L'indirizzo IP è nell'ordine dei byte dell'host.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2509">The IP address is in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2510">**interface_index** Indice dell'interfaccia associata all'istanza di NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2510">**interface_index** Index of the Interface attached to the NetX Duo instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2511">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2511">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2512">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) il join del gruppo multicast è riuscito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2512">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multicast group join.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2513">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Impossibile trovare l'indirizzo del gruppo multicast specificato nella tabella multicast locale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2513">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) The specified multicast group address cannot be found in the local multicast table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2514">L'indice del dispositivo **NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) punta a un'interfaccia di rete non valida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2514">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Device index points to an invalid network interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2515">L'indirizzo del gruppo multicast **NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) specificato non è un indirizzo di classe D valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2515">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Multicast group address provided is not a valid class D address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2516">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2516">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2517">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore non valido a un'istanza IP o l'istanza IP non è valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2517">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer to IP instance, or the IP instance is invalid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2518">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2518">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2519">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2519">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2520">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2520">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2521">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2521">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2522">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2522">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Leave the multicast group 224.0.0.200. */
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1
status = nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave
                                (&ip, IP_ADDRESS(224,0,0,200),
                                 INTERFACE_INDEX);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the IP instance has successfully leaves
   the multicast group 244.0.0.200. */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_allocate"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2535">nx_packet_allocate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2535">nx_packet_allocate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2536">Alloca pacchetto dal pool specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2536">Allocate packet from specified pool</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2537">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2537">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_allocate(
    NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr,
    NX_PACKET **packet_ptr,
    ULONG packet_type,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2538">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2538">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2539">Questo servizio alloca un pacchetto dal pool specificato e regola il puntatore anteposto nel pacchetto in base al tipo di pacchetto specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2539">This service allocates a packet from the specified pool and adjusts the prepend pointer in the packet according to the type of packet specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2540">Se non è disponibile alcun pacchetto, il servizio viene sospeso in base all'opzione wait specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2540">If no packet is available, the service suspends according to the supplied wait option.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2541">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2541">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2542">**pool_ptr** Puntatore al pool di pacchetti creato in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2542">**pool_ptr** Pointer to previously created packet pool.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2543">**packet_ptr** Puntatore al puntatore del puntatore del pacchetto allocato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2543">**packet_ptr** Pointer to the Pointer of the allocated packet Pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2544">**packet_type** Definisce il tipo di pacchetto richiesto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2544">**packet_type** Defines the type of packet requested.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2545">Per un elenco dei tipi di pacchetti supportati, vedere "pool di pacchetti" nella pagina 63 del capitolo 3.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2545">See “Packet Pools” on page 63 in Chapter 3 for a list of supported packet types.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2546">**WAIT_OPTION** Definisce il tempo di attesa in cicli se non sono disponibili pacchetti nel pool di pacchetti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2546">**wait_option** Defines the wait time in ticks if there are no packets available in the packet pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2547">Le opzioni di attesa sono definite come segue:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2547">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2548">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2548">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2549">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2549">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2550">**valore di timeout in cicli (da 0x00000001 a** 0xfffffffe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2550">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2551">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2551">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2552">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) allocare il pacchetto correttamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2552">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet allocate.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2553">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) non è disponibile alcun pacchetto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2553">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) No packet available.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2554">La sospensione richiesta **NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) è stata interrotta da una chiamata al tx_thread_wait_abort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2554">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2555">Le dimensioni del pacchetto **NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (irreversibile 0x4D) non supportano il protocollo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2555">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Packet size cannot support protocol.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2556">Il tipo di pacchetto **NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0X0A) non è valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2556">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0A) Invalid packet type.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2557">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) il pool o il puntatore di ritorno al pacchetto non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2557">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pool or packet return pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2558">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) opzione di attesa non valida da un thread non.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2558">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid wait option from nonthread.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2559">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2559">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2560">Inizializzazione, thread, timer e ISRs (driver di rete dell'applicazione).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2560">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs (application network drivers).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2561">L'opzione wait deve essere *NX_NO_WAIT* quando viene usata in ISR o nel contesto del timer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2561">Wait option must be *NX_NO_WAIT* when used in ISR or in timer context.</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2562">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2562">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2563">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2563">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2564">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2564">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Allocate a new UDP packet from the previously created packet pool
   and suspend for a maximum of 5 timer ticks if the pool is
   empty. */
status = nx_packet_allocate(&pool_0, &packet_ptr,
                            NX_UDP_PACKET, 5);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the newly allocated packet pointer is
   found in the variable packet_ptr. */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_copy"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2578">nx_packet_copy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2578">nx_packet_copy</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2579">Copia pacchetto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2579">Copy packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2580">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2580">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_copy(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NX_PACKET **new_packet_ptr,
    NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2581">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2581">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2582">Questo servizio Copia le informazioni del pacchetto fornito in uno o più nuovi pacchetti allocati dal pool di pacchetti fornito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2582">This service copies the information in the supplied packet to one or more new packets that are allocated from the supplied packet pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2583">In caso di esito positivo, il puntatore al nuovo pacchetto viene restituito nella destinazione a cui punta **new_packet_ptr**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2583">If successful, the pointer to the new packet is returned in destination pointed to by **new_packet_ptr**.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2584">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2584">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2585">**packet_ptr** Puntatore al pacchetto di origine.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2585">**packet_ptr** Pointer to the source packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2586">**new_packet_ptr** Puntatore alla destinazione di dove restituire il puntatore alla nuova copia del pacchetto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2586">**new_packet_ptr** Pointer to the destination of where to return the pointer to the new copy of the packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2587">**pool_ptr** Puntatore al pool di pacchetti creato in precedenza usato per allocare uno o più pacchetti per la copia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2587">**pool_ptr** Pointer to the previously created packet pool that is used to allocate one or more packets for the copy.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2588">**WAIT_OPTION** Definisce il modo in cui il servizio resta in attesa se non sono disponibili pacchetti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2588">**wait_option** Defines how the service waits if there are no packets available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2589">Le opzioni di attesa sono definite come segue:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2589">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2590">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2590">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2591">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2591">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2592">**valore di timeout in cicli (da 0x00000001 a** 0xfffffffe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2592">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2593">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2593">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2594">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) copia di pacchetti riuscita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2594">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet copy.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2595">Il pacchetto **NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) non è disponibile per la copia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2595">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) Packet not available for copy.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2596">Il pacchetto o la copia di origine vuota **NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) non è riuscito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2596">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) Empty source packet or copy failed.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2597">La sospensione richiesta **NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) è stata interrotta da una chiamata al tx_thread_wait_abort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2597">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2598">Le dimensioni del pacchetto **NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (irreversibile 0x4D) non supportano il protocollo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2598">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Packet size cannot support protocol.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2599">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) un pool, un pacchetto o un puntatore di destinazione non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2599">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pool, packet, or destination pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2600">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) puntatore a anteporre il pacchetto non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2600">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Invalid packet prepend pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2601">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) puntatore di Accodamento pacchetti non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2601">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Invalid packet append pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2602">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) è stata specificata un'opzione Wait nell'inizializzazione o in un ISR.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2602">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) A wait option was specified in initialization or in an ISR.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2603">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2603">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2604">Inizializzazione, thread, timer e ISRs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2604">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2605">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2605">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2606">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2606">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2607">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2607">Example</span></span>

```c
NX_PACKET *new_copy_ptr;

/* Copy packet pointed to by "old_packet_ptr" using packets from
   previously created packet pool_0. */
status = nx_packet_copy(old_packet, &new_copy_ptr, &pool_0, 20);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, new_copy_ptr points to the packet copy. */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_data_append"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2621">nx_packet_data_append</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2621">nx_packet_data_append</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2622">Accoda dati alla fine del pacchetto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2622">Append data to end of packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2623">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2623">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_data_append(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    VOID *data_start, ULONG data_size,
    NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2624">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2624">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2625">Questo servizio aggiunge i dati alla fine del pacchetto specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2625">This service appends data to the end of the specified packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2626">L'area dati fornita viene copiata nel pacchetto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2626">The supplied data area is copied into the packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2627">Se la memoria disponibile non è sufficiente e la funzionalità per i pacchetti concatenati è abilitata, per soddisfare la richiesta verranno allocati uno o più pacchetti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2627">If there is not enough memory available, and the chained packet feature is enabled, one or more packets will be allocated to satisfy the request.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2628">Se la funzionalità di pacchetto concatenato non è abilitata, viene restituito *NX_SIZE_ERROR* .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2628">If the chained packet feature is not enabled, *NX_SIZE_ERROR* is returned.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2629">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2629">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2630">**packet_ptr** Puntatore del pacchetto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2630">**packet_ptr** Packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2631">**DATA_START** Puntatore all'inizio dell'area dati dell'utente da accodare al pacchetto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2631">**data_start** Pointer to the start of the user’s data area to append to the packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2632">**DATA_SIZE** Dimensioni dell'area dati dell'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2632">**data_size** Size of user’s data area.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2633">**pool_ptr** Puntatore al pool di pacchetti da cui allocare un altro pacchetto se non c'è spazio sufficiente nel pacchetto corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2633">**pool_ptr** Pointer to packet pool from which to allocate another packet if there is not enough room in the current packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2634">**WAIT_OPTION** Definisce il comportamento del servizio se non sono disponibili pacchetti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2634">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if there are no packets available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2635">Le opzioni di attesa sono definite come segue:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2635">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2636">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2636">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2637">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2637">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2638">**valore di timeout in cicli (da 0x00000001 a** 0xfffffffe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2638">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2639">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2639">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2640">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Accodamento pacchetti riuscito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2640">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet append.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2641">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) non è disponibile alcun pacchetto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2641">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) No packet available.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2642">La sospensione richiesta **NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) è stata interrotta da una chiamata al tx_thread_wait_abort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2642">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2643">Le dimensioni del pacchetto **NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (irreversibile 0x4D) non supportano il protocollo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2643">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Packet size cannot support protocol.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2644">Il puntatore **NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Prepend è inferiore all'avvio del payload.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2644">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Prepend pointer is less than payload start.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2645">Il puntatore di Accodamento **NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) è maggiore della fine del payload.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2645">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Append pointer is greater than payload end.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2646">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) il pool, il pacchetto o il puntatore ai dati non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2646">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pool, packet, or data Pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2647">Dimensioni dei dati **NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) non valide.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2647">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) Invalid data size.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2648">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) opzione di attesa non valida da un thread non.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2648">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid wait option from nonthread.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2649">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2649">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2650">Inizializzazione, thread, timer e ISRs (driver di rete dell'applicazione)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2650">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs (application network drivers)</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2651">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2651">Preemption Possible</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2653">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2653">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Append "abcd" to the specified packet. */
status = nx_packet_data_append(packet_ptr, "abcd", 4, &pool_0, 5);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the additional four bytes "abcd" have
   been appended to the packet. */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_data_extract_offset"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2667">nx_packet_data_extract_offset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2667">nx_packet_data_extract_offset</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2668">Estrai i dati dal pacchetto tramite un offset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2668">Extract data from packet via an offset</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2669">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2669">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_data_extract_offset(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG offset,
    VOID *buffer_start,
    ULONG buffer_length,
    ULONG *bytes_copied);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2670">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2670">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2671">Questo servizio copia i dati da un pacchetto NetX Duo (o catena di pacchetti) a partire dall'offset specificato, dal puntatore a prependi del pacchetto della dimensione specificata, in byte, nel buffer specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2671">This service copies data from a NetX Duo packet (or packet chain) starting at the specified offset from the packet prepend pointer of the specified size in bytes into the specified buffer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2672">Il numero di byte effettivamente copiati viene restituito in *bytes_copied.*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2672">The number of bytes actually copied is returned in *bytes_copied.*</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2673">Questo servizio non rimuove i dati dal pacchetto, né modifica il puntatore anteposto o altre informazioni sullo stato interno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2673">This service does not remove data from the packet, nor does it adjust the prepend pointer or other internal state information.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2674">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2674">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2675">**packet_ptr** Puntatore al pacchetto da estrarre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2675">**packet_ptr** Pointer to packet to extract</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2676">**offset** Offset dal puntatore a anteporre corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2676">**offset** Offset from the current prepend pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2677">**buffer_start** Puntatore all'inizio del buffer di salvataggio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2677">**buffer_start** Pointer to start of save buffer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2678">**BUFFER_LENGTH** Numero di byte da copiare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2678">**buffer_length** Number of bytes to copy</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2679">**bytes_copied** Numero di byte effettivamente copiati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2679">**bytes_copied** Number of bytes actually copied</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2680">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2680">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2681">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) copia di pacchetti riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2681">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet copy</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2682">È stato specificato un valore di offset non valido **NX_PACKET_OFFSET_ERROR** (0x53)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2682">**NX_PACKET_OFFSET_ERROR** (0x53) Invalid offset value was supplied</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2683">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore a pacchetto o puntatore al buffer non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2683">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid packet pointer or buffer pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2684">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2684">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2685">Inizializzazione, thread, timer e ISRs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2685">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2686">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2686">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2687">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2687">No</span></span>

```c
/* Extract 10 bytes from the start of the received packet buffer
   into the specified memory area. */
status = nx_packet_data_extract_offset(my_packet, 0, &data[0], 10,
                                       &bytes_copied) ;
/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, 10 bytes were successfully copied into
   the data buffer. */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_data_retrieve"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2701">nx_packet_data_retrieve</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2701">nx_packet_data_retrieve</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2702">Recuperare dati dal pacchetto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2702">Retrieve data from packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2703">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2703">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_data_retrieve(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    VOID *buffer_start,
    ULONG *bytes_copied);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2704">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2704">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2705">Questo servizio copia i dati dal pacchetto fornito nel buffer fornito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2705">This service copies data from the supplied packet into the supplied buffer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2706">Il numero effettivo di byte copiati viene restituito nella destinazione a cui punta **bytes_copied**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2706">The actual number of bytes copied is returned in the destination pointed to by **bytes_copied**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2707">Si noti che questo servizio non modifica lo stato interno del pacchetto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2707">Note that this service does not change internal state of the packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2708">I dati recuperati sono ancora disponibili nel pacchetto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2708">The data being retrieved is still available in the packet.</span></span> 

> [!CAUTION]  
> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2709">*Il buffer di destinazione deve essere sufficientemente grande da contenere il contenuto del pacchetto. In caso contrario, la memoria verrà danneggiata causando risultati imprevedibili*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2709">*The destination buffer must be large enough to hold the packet's contents. If not, memory will be corrupted causing unpredictable results*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2710">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2710">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2711">**packet_ptr** Puntatore al pacchetto di origine.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2711">**packet_ptr** Pointer to the source packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2712">**buffer_start** Puntatore all'inizio dell'area del buffer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2712">**buffer_start** Pointer to the start of the buffer area.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2713">**bytes_copied** Puntatore alla destinazione per il numero di byte copiati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2713">**bytes_copied** Pointer to the destination for the number of bytes copied.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2714">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2714">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2715">Il recupero dei dati del pacchetto **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2715">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet data retrieve.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2716">Il pacchetto **NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0X12) non è valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2716">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) Invalid packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2717">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) pacchetto non valido, avvio del buffer o puntatore di byte copiato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2717">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid packet, buffer start, or bytes copied pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2718">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2718">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2719">Inizializzazione, thread, timer e ISRs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2719">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2720">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2720">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2721">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2721">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2722">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2722">Example</span></span>

```c
UCHAR                 buffer[512];
ULONG                 bytes_copied;

/* Retrieve data from packet pointed to by "packet_ptr". */
status = nx_packet_data_retrieve(packet_ptr, buffer, &bytes_copied);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, buffer contains the contents of the
   packet, the size of which is contained in "bytes_copied." */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_length_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2736">nx_packet_length_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2736">nx_packet_length_get</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2738">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2738">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_length_get(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr, 
    ULONG *length);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2739">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2739">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2740">Questo servizio ottiene la lunghezza dei dati nel pacchetto specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2740">This service gets the length of the data in the specified packet.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2743">**lunghezza** Destinazione per la lunghezza del pacchetto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2743">**length** Destination for the packet length.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2746">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore al pacchetto non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2746">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid packet pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2747">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2747">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2748">Inizializzazione, thread, timer e ISRs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2748">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2751">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2751">Example</span></span>

## <a name="nx_packet_pool_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2765">nx_packet_pool_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2765">nx_packet_pool_create</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2766">Crea pool di pacchetti nell'area di memoria specificata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2766">Create packet pool in specified memory area</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2767">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2767">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_pool_create(
    NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr,
    CHAR *name,
    ULONG payload_size,
    VOID *memory_ptr,
    ULONG memory_size);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2768">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2768">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2769">Questo servizio crea un pool di pacchetti con le dimensioni del pacchetto specificate nell'area di memoria fornita dall'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2769">This service creates a packet pool of the specified packet size in the memory area supplied by the user.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2770">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2770">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2771">**pool_ptr** Puntatore al blocco di controllo del pool di pacchetti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2771">**pool_ptr** Pointer to packet pool control block.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2772">**nome** Puntatore al nome dell'applicazione per il pool di pacchetti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2772">**name** Pointer to application’s name for the packet pool.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2773">**payload_size** Numero di byte in ogni pacchetto nel pool.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2773">**payload_size** Number of bytes in each packet in the pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2774">Questo valore deve essere almeno di 40 byte e deve essere divisibile anche per 4.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2774">This value must be at least 40 bytes and must also be evenly divisible by 4.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2775">**memory_ptr** Puntatore all'area di memoria in cui inserire il pool di pacchetti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2775">**memory_ptr** Pointer to the memory area to place the packet pool in.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2776">Il puntatore deve essere allineato su un limite ULONG.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2776">The pointer should be aligned on an ULONG boundary.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2777">**memory_size** Dimensioni dell'area di memoria del pool.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2777">**memory_size** Size of the pool memory area.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2778">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2778">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2779">Creazione pool di pacchetti riuscita **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2779">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet pool create.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2780">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) il pool o il puntatore di memoria non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2780">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pool or memory pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2781">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) dimensione del blocco o della memoria non valida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2781">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) Invalid block or memory size.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2782">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2782">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2783">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2783">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2784">Inizializzazione, thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2784">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2785">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2785">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2786">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2786">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2787">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2787">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Create a packet pool of 32000 bytes starting at physical
   address 0x10000000. */
status = nx_packet_pool_create(&pool_0, "Default Pool", 128,
                               (void *) 0x10000000, 32000);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the packet pool has been successfully
   created. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2804">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2804">Description</span></span>

## <a name="nx_packet_pool_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2831">nx_packet_pool_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2831">nx_packet_pool_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2832">Recuperare informazioni su un pool di pacchetti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2832">Retrieve information about a packet pool</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2833">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2833">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_pool_info_get(
    NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr,
    ULONG *total_packets,
    ULONG *free_packets,
    ULONG *empty_pool_requests,
    ULONG *empty_pool_suspensions,
    ULONG *invalid_packet_releases);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2834">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2834">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2835">Questo servizio recupera le informazioni sul pool di pacchetti specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2835">This service retrieves information about the specified packet pool.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2836">*Se un puntatore di destinazione è NX_NULL, le informazioni specifiche non vengono restituite al chiamante*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2836">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2837">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2837">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2838">**pool_ptr** Puntatore al pool di pacchetti creato in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2838">**pool_ptr** Pointer to previously created packet pool.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2839">**total_packets** Puntatore alla destinazione per il numero totale di pacchetti nel pool.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2839">**total_packets** Pointer to destination for the total number of packets in the pool.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2840">**free_packets** Puntatore alla destinazione per il numero totale di pacchetti attualmente disponibili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2840">**free_packets** Pointer to destination for the total number of currently free packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2841">**empty_pool_requests** Puntatore alla destinazione del numero totale di richieste di allocazione quando il pool è vuoto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2841">**empty_pool_requests** Pointer to destination of the total number of allocation requests when the pool was empty.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2842">**empty_pool_suspensions** Puntatore alla destinazione del numero totale di sospensioni del pool vuote.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2842">**empty_pool_suspensions** Pointer to destination of the total number of empty pool suspensions.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2843">**invalid_packet_releases** Puntatore alla destinazione del numero totale di versioni di pacchetti non valide.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2843">**invalid_packet_releases** Pointer to destination of the total number of invalid packet releases.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2844">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2844">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2845">Il recupero delle informazioni sul pool di pacchetti è stato completato **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2845">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet pool information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2846">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore IP non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2846">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2847">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2847">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2849">Inizializzazione, thread e timer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2849">Initialization, threads, and timers</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2850">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2850">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2851">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2851">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2852">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2852">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve packet pool information. */
status = nx_packet_pool_info_get(&pool_0,
                                 &total_packets,
                                 &free_packets,
                                 &empty_pool_requests,
                                 &empty_pool_suspensions,
                                 &invalid_packet_releases);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, packet pool information was
   retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2866">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2866">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2867">Imposta limite minimo pool di pacchetti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2867">Set packet pool low watermark</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2868">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2868">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set(
    NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr,
    ULONG low_watermark);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2869">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2869">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2870">Questo servizio configura il limite minimo per il pool di pacchetti specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2870">This service configures the low watermark for the specified packet pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2871">Una volta impostato il valore limite minimo, TCP o UDP non accoda i pacchetti ricevuti se il numero di pacchetti disponibili nel pool di pacchetti è inferiore al limite minimo del pool di pacchetti, evitando che il pool di pacchetti venga privo di pacchetti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2871">Once the low watermark value is set, TCP or UDP will not queue up the received packets if the number of available packets in the packet pool is less than the packet pool's low watermark, preventing the packet pool from being starved of packets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2872">Questo servizio è disponibile se la libreria NetX Duo viene compilata con l'opzione ***NX_ENABLE_LOW_WATERMARK*** definita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2872">This service is available if the NetX Duo library is built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_LOW_WATERMARK*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2873">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2873">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2874">**pool_ptr** Puntatore al blocco di controllo del pool di pacchetti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2874">**pool_ptr** Pointer to packet pool control block.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2875">**low_watermark** Valore limite minimo da configurare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2875">**low_watermark** Low watermark value to be configured</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2876">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2876">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2877">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha impostato correttamente il valore limite minimo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2877">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the low watermark value.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2878">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0X4B) la funzionalità limite minimo non è incorporata in NETX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2878">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) The low watermark feature is not built into NetX Duo.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2879">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore al pool non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2879">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pool pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2880">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2880">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2881">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2881">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2882">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2882">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2883">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2883">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2884">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2884">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2885">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2885">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Set pool_0 low watermark value to 2. */
status = nx_packet_pool_create(&pool_0, 2);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the low watermark value is set for
   pool_0.*/
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2898">nx_packet_transmit_release</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2898">nx_packet_transmit_release</span></span>

## <a name="nx_packet_release"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2899">nx_packet_release</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2899">nx_packet_release</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2900">Versione del pacchetto allocato in precedenza</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2900">Release previously allocated packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2901">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2901">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_release(NX_PACKET *packet_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2902">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2902">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2903">Questo servizio rilascia un pacchetto, inclusi eventuali pacchetti aggiuntivi concatenati al pacchetto specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2903">This service releases a packet, including any additional packets chained to the specified packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2904">Se un altro thread è bloccato per l'allocazione dei pacchetti, riceve il pacchetto e lo riprende.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2904">If another thread is blocked on packet allocation, it is given the packet and resumed.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]  
> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2905">*L'applicazione deve impedire il rilascio di un pacchetto più di una volta, perché questa operazione provocherà risultati imprevedibili*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2905">*The application must prevent releasing a packet more than once, because doing so will cause unpredictable results*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2906">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2906">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2907">**packet_ptr** Puntatore del pacchetto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2907">**packet_ptr** Packet pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2908">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2908">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2909">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) versione del pacchetto completata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2909">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet release.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2910">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore al pacchetto non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2910">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2911">Il puntatore **NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Prepend è inferiore all'avvio del payload.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2911">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Prepend pointer is less than payload start.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2912">Il puntatore di Accodamento **NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) è maggiore della fine del payload.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2912">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Append pointer is greater than payload end.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2913">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2913">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2914">Inizializzazione, thread, timer e ISRs (driver di rete dell'applicazione)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2914">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs (application network drivers)</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2915">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2915">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2916">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2916">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2917">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2917">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Release a previously allocated packet. */
status = nx_packet_release(packet_ptr);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the packet has been returned to the
   packet pool it was allocated from. */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_transmit_release"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2931">nx_packet_transmit_release</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2931">nx_packet_transmit_release</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2932">Rilascia un pacchetto trasmesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2932">Release a transmitted packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2933">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2933">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_transmit_release(NX_PACKET *packet_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2934">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2934">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2935">Per i pacchetti non TCP, questo servizio rilascia un pacchetto trasmesso, inclusi eventuali pacchetti aggiuntivi concatenati al pacchetto specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2935">For non-TCP packets, this service releases a transmitted packet, including any additional packets chained to the specified packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2936">Se un altro thread è bloccato per l'allocazione dei pacchetti, riceve il pacchetto e lo riprende.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2936">If another thread is blocked on packet allocation, it is given the packet and resumed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2937">Per un pacchetto TCP trasmesso, il pacchetto è contrassegnato come trasmesso ma non rilasciato finché il pacchetto non viene riconosciuto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2937">For a transmitted TCP packet, the packet is marked as being transmitted but not released till the packet is acknowledged.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2938">Questo servizio viene in genere chiamato dal driver di rete dell'applicazione dopo la trasmissione di un pacchetto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2938">This service is typically called from the application's network driver after a packet is transmitted.</span></span>

> [!WARNING] 
> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2939">*Il driver di rete deve rimuovere l'intestazione supporto fisico e regolare la lunghezza del pacchetto prima di chiamare il servizio*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2939">*The network driver should remove the physical media header and adjust the length of the packet before calling this service*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2940">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2940">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2941">**packet_ptr** Puntatore del pacchetto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2941">**packet_ptr** Packet pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2942">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2942">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2943">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha completato la trasmissione del pacchetto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2943">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful transmit packet release.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2944">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore al pacchetto non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2944">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2945">Il puntatore **NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Prepend è inferiore all'avvio del payload.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2945">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Prepend pointer is less than payload start.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2946">Il puntatore di Accodamento **NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) è maggiore della fine del payload.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2946">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Append pointer is greater than payload end.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2948">Inizializzazione, thread, timer, driver di rete dell'applicazione (incluso ISRs)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2948">Initialization, threads, timers, Application network drivers (including ISRs)</span></span>

```c

   from the application network driver. */

   returned to the packet pool it was allocated from. */
```

## <a name="nx_rarp_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2965">nx_rarp_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2965">nx_rarp_disable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2966">Disabilitare il protocollo RARP (inverse Address Resolution Protocol)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2966">Disable Reverse Address Resolution Protocol (RARP)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2967">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2967">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_rarp_disable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2968">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2968">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2969">Questo servizio Disabilita il componente RARP di NetX Duo per l'istanza IP specifica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2969">This service disables the RARP component of NetX Duo for the specific IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2970">Per un sistema multihome, questo servizio Disabilita RARP su tutte le interfacce.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2970">For a multihome  system, this service disables RARP on all interfaces.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2971">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2971">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2972">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2972">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2973">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2973">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2974">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) DISABILITAto RARP con esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2974">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful RARP disable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2975">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) RARP non è stato abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2975">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) RARP was not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2976">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore IP non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2976">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2977">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2977">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2978">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2978">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2979">Inizializzazione, thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2979">Initialization, threads</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2981">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2981">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2982">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2982">Example</span></span>

```c

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, RARP is disabled. */
```

## <a name="nx_rarp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2986">nx_rarp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2986">nx_rarp_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2987">Abilita il protocollo RARP (Reverse Address Resolution Protocol)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2987">Enable Reverse Address Resolution Protocol (RARP)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2988">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2988">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_rarp_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2989">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2989">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2990">Questo servizio Abilita il componente RARP di NetX Duo per l'istanza IP specifica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2990">This service enables the RARP component of NetX Duo for the specific IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2991">Il componente RARP esegue la ricerca in tutte le interfacce di rete collegate per un indirizzo IP zero.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2991">The RARP components searches through all attached network interfaces for zero IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2992">Un indirizzo IP zero indica che l'interfaccia non è ancora stata assegnata all'indirizzo IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2992">A zero IP address indicates the interface does not have IP address assignment yet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2993">RARP tenta di risolvere l'indirizzo IP abilitando il processo RARP su tale interfaccia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2993">RARP attempts to resolve the IP address by enabling RARP process on that interface.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2994">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2994">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2995">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2995">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2996">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2996">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2997">Abilitazione di **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) RARP riuscita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2997">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful RARP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2998">L'indirizzo IP **NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) è già valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2998">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) IP address is already valid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-2999">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0X15) RARP è già abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-2999">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) RARP was already enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3000">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore IP non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3000">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3001">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3001">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3002">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3002">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3003">Inizializzazione, thread, timer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3003">Initialization, threads, timers</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3004">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3004">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3005">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3005">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3006">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3006">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable RARP on the previously created IP instance. */
status = nx_rarp_enable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, RARP is enabled and is attempting to
   resolve this IP instance’s address by querying the network. */
```

## <a name="nx_rarp_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3010">nx_rarp_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3010">nx_rarp_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3011">Recuperare informazioni sulle attività RARP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3011">Retrieve information about RARP activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3012">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3012">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_rarp_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *rarp_requests_sent,
    ULONG *rarp_responses_received,
    ULONG *rarp_invalid_messages);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3013">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3013">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3014">Questo servizio recupera informazioni sulle attività RARP per l'istanza IP specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3014">This service retrieves information about RARP activities for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3015">*Se un puntatore di destinazione è NX_NULL, le informazioni specifiche non vengono restituite al chiamante*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3015">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3016">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3016">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3017">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3017">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3018">**rarp_requests_sent** Puntatore alla destinazione per il numero totale di richieste RARP inviate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3018">**rarp_requests_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of RARP requests sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3019">**rarp_responses_received** Puntatore alla destinazione per il numero totale di risposte RARP ricevute.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3019">**rarp_responses_received** Pointer to destination for the total number of RARP responses received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3020">**rarp_invalid_messages** Puntatore alla destinazione del numero totale di messaggi non validi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3020">**rarp_invalid_messages** Pointer to destination of the total number of invalid messages.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3021">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3021">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3022">Il recupero delle informazioni RARP riuscito **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3022">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful RARP information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3023">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore IP non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3023">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3024">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) questo componente non è stato abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3024">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3025">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3025">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3026">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3026">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3027">Inizializzazione, thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3027">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3028">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3028">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3029">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3029">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3030">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3030">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve RARP information from previously created IP
   Instance 0. */
status = nx_rarp_info_get(&ip_0,
                          &rarp_requests_sent,
                          &rarp_responses_received,
                          &rarp_invalid_messages);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, RARP information was retrieved. */
```
