## <a name="nx_tcp_client_socket_bind"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3074">nx_tcp_client_socket_bind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3074">nx_tcp_client_socket_bind</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3075">Associa socket TCP client a porta TCP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3075">Bind client TCP socket to TCP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3076">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3076">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_client_socket_bind(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    UINT port,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3077">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3077">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3078">Questo servizio associa il socket client TCP creato in precedenza alla porta TCP specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3078">This service binds the previously created TCP client socket to the specified TCP port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3079">I socket TCP validi sono compresi tra 0 e 0xFFFF.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3079">Valid TCP sockets range from 0 through 0xFFFF.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3080">Se la porta TCP specificata non è disponibile, il servizio viene sospeso in base all'opzione di attesa fornita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3080">If the specified TCP port is unavailable, the service suspends according to the supplied wait option.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3081">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3081">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3082">**socket_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza di socket TCP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3082">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3083">numero di **porta di porta** da associare (da 1 a 0xFFFF).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3083">**port Port** number to bind (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3084">Se il numero di porta è NX_ANY_PORT (0x0000), l'istanza IP cercherà la porta libera successiva e la utilizzerà per l'associazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3084">If port number is NX_ANY_PORT (0x0000), the IP instance will search for the next free port and use that for the binding.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3085">**WAIT_OPTION** Definisce il comportamento del servizio se la porta è già associata a un altro socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3085">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if the port is already bound to another socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3086">Le opzioni di attesa sono definite come segue:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3086">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3087">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3087">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3088">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3088">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3089">**valore di timeout in cicli (da 0x00000001 a** 0xfffffffe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3089">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3090">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3090">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3091">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) associazione Socket riuscita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3091">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket bind.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3092">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND** (0X22) questo socket è già associato a un'altra porta TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3092">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND** (0x22) This socket is already bound to another TCP port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3093">La porta **NX_PORT_UNAVAILABLE** (0x23) è già associata a un socket diverso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3093">**NX_PORT_UNAVAILABLE** (0x23) Port is already bound to a different socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3094">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS** (0X45) non è disponibile alcuna porta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3094">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS** (0x45) No free port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3095">La sospensione richiesta **NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) è stata interrotta da una chiamata al tx_thread_wait_abort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3095">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3096">La porta **NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) non è valida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3096">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Invalid port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3097">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore al socket non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3097">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3098">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3098">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3099">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) questo componente non è stato abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3099">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3100">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3100">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3101">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3101">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3102">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3102">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3103">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3103">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3104">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3104">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Bind a previously created client socket to port 12 and wait for 7
   timer ticks for the bind to complete. */
status = nx_tcp_client_socket_bind(&client_socket, 12, 7);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the previously created client_socket is
   bound to port 12 on the associated IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_client_socket_connect"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3128">nx_tcp_client_socket_connect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3128">nx_tcp_client_socket_connect</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3129">Connetti socket TCP client</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3129">Connect client TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3130">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3130">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_client_socket_connect(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG server_ip,
    UINT server_port,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3131">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3131">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3132">Questo servizio connette il socket client TCP precedentemente creato e associato alla porta del server specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3132">This service connects the previously created and bound TCP client socket to the specified server's port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3133">Le porte del server TCP valide sono comprese tra 0 e 0xFFFF.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3133">Valid TCP server ports range from 0 through 0xFFFF.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3134">Se la connessione non viene completata immediatamente, il servizio viene sospeso in base all'opzione wait specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3134">If the connection does not complete immediately, the service suspends according to the supplied wait option.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3135">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3135">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3136">**socket_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza di socket TCP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3136">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3137">**server_ip** Indirizzo IP del server.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3137">**server_ip** Server’s IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3138">**SERVER_PORT** Numero di porta del server a cui connettersi \* \* (da 1 a 0xFFFF).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3138">**server_port** Server port number to connect to\*\* (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3139">**WAIT_OPTION** Definisce il comportamento del servizio mentre viene stabilita la connessione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3139">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves while the connection is being established.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3140">Le opzioni di attesa sono definite come segue:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3140">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3141">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3141">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3142">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3142">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3143">**valore di timeout in cicli (da 0x00000001 a** 0xfffffffe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3143">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3144">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3144">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3145">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) connessione socket riuscita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3145">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket connect.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3146">Il socket **NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) non è associato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3146">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket is not bound.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3147">Il socket **NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) non è in uno stato chiuso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3147">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) Socket is not in a closed state.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3148">**NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0x37) non è stata specificata alcuna attesa. il tentativo di connessione è in corso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3148">**NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0x37) No wait was specified, the connection attempt is in progress.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3149">Non è stata specificata l'interfaccia **NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3149">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid interface supplied.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3150">La sospensione richiesta **NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) è stata interrotta da una chiamata al tx_thread_wait_abort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3150">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3151">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) indirizzo IP del server non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3151">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid server IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3152">La porta **NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) non è valida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3152">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Invalid port.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3154">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3154">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3160">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3160">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Initiate a TCP connection from a previously created and bound
   client socket. The connection requested in this example is to
   port 12 on the server with the IP address of 1.2.3.5. This
   service will wait 300 timer ticks for the connection to take
   place before giving up. */
status = nx_tcp_client_socket_connect(&client_socket,
                                      IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,5),
                                      12, 300);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the previously created and bound
   client_socket is connected to port 12 on IP 1.2.3.5. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_client_socket_port_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3184">nx_tcp_client_socket_port_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3184">nx_tcp_client_socket_port_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3185">Ottenere il numero di porta associato al socket TCP client</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3185">Get port number bound to client TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3186">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3186">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_client_socket_port_get(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    UINT *port_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3187">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3187">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3188">Questo servizio recupera il numero di porta associato al socket, che è utile per trovare la porta allocata da NetX Duo nelle situazioni in cui il NX_ANY_PORT è stato specificato al momento dell'associazione del socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3188">This service retrieves the port number associated with the socket, which is useful to find the port allocated by NetX Duo in situations where the NX_ANY_PORT was specified at the time the socket was bound.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3189">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3189">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3190">**socket_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza di socket TCP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3190">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3191">**port_ptr** Puntatore alla destinazione per il numero di porta restituito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3191">**port_ptr** Pointer to destination for the return port number.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3192">I numeri di porta validi sono compresi tra 1 e 0xFFFF.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3192">Valid port numbers are (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3193">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3193">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3194">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) associazione Socket riuscita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3194">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket bind.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3195">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0X24) questo socket non è associato a una porta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3195">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) This socket is not bound to a port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3196">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore a socket non valido o puntatore a porta restituita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3196">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer or port return pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3197">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3197">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3198">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) questo componente non è stato abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3198">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3199">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3199">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3200">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3200">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3201">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3201">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3202">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3202">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3203">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3203">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Get the port number of previously created and bound client
   socket. */
status = nx_tcp_client_socket_port_get(&client_socket, &port);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the port variable contains the port this
   socket is bound to. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_client_socket_unbind"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3227">nx_tcp_client_socket_unbind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3227">nx_tcp_client_socket_unbind</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3228">Annulla Binding socket client TCP dalla porta TCP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3228">Unbind TCP client socket from TCP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3229">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3229">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_client_socket_unbind(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3230">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3230">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3231">Questo servizio rilascia l'associazione tra il socket client TCP e una porta TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3231">This service releases the binding between the TCP client socket and a TCP port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3232">Se sono presenti altri thread in attesa di associare un altro socket allo stesso numero di porta, il primo thread sospeso viene quindi associato a questa porta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3232">If there are other threads waiting to bind another socket to the same port number, the first suspended thread is then bound to this port.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3233">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3233">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3234">**socket_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza di socket TCP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3234">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3235">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3235">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3236">La disassociazione del socket è riuscita **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3236">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket unbind.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3237">Il socket **NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) non è stato associato ad alcuna porta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3237">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket was not bound to any port.</span></span>

## <a name="nx_tcp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3270">nx_tcp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3270">nx_tcp_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3271">Abilita il componente TCP di NetX Duo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3271">Enable TCP component of NetX Duo</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3272">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3272">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3273">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3273">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3274">Questo servizio Abilita il componente Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) di NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3274">This service enables the Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) component of NetX Duo.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3275">Dopo l'abilitazione, le connessioni TCP possono essere stabilite dall'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3275">After enabled, TCP connections may be established by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3276">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3276">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3277">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3277">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3278">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3278">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3279">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) abilitato per TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3279">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful TCP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3280">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0X15) TCP è già abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3280">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) TCP is already enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3281">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore IP non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3281">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3282">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3282">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3283">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3283">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3284">Inizializzazione, thread, timer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3284">Initialization, threads, timers</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3285">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3285">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3286">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3286">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3287">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3287">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable TCP on a previously created IP instance ip_0. */

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, TCP is enabled on the IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_free_port_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3311">nx_tcp_free_port_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3311">nx_tcp_free_port_find</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3312">Trova la porta TCP successiva disponibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3312">Find next available TCP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3313">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3313">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_free_port_find(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT port,
    UINT *free_port_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3314">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3314">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3315">Questo servizio tenta di individuare una porta TCP gratuita (senza binding) a partire dalla porta fornita dall'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3315">This service attempts to locate a free TCP port (unbound) starting from the application supplied port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3316">La logica di ricerca eseguirà il wrapping se la ricerca viene eseguita per raggiungere il valore di porta massimo di 0xFFFF.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3316">The search logic will wrap around if the search happens to reach the maximum port value of 0xFFFF.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3317">Se la ricerca ha esito positivo, la porta libera viene restituita nella variabile a cui punta *free_port_ptr*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3317">If  the search is successful, the free port is returned in the variable pointed to by *free_port_ptr*.</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3318">*Questo servizio può essere chiamato da un altro thread e deve essere restituita la stessa porta. Per evitare questo race condition, è possibile che l'applicazione inserisca il servizio e che il socket client effettivo venga associato sotto la protezione di un mutex*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3318">*This service can be called from another thread and have the same port returned. To prevent this race condition, the application may wish to place this service and the actual client socket bind under the protection of a mutex*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3319">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3319">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3320">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3320">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3321">**porta** Numero di porta da cui iniziare la ricerca (da 1 a 0xFFFF).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3321">**port** Port number to start search at (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3322">**free_port_ptr** Puntatore al valore restituito della porta libera di destinazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3322">**free_port_ptr** Pointer to the destination free port return value.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3323">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3323">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3324">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscite dalla porta libera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3324">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful free port find.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3325">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS** (0X45) non sono state trovate porte gratuite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3325">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS** (0x45) No free ports found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3326">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore IP non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3326">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3327">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3327">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3328">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) questo componente non è stato abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3328">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3329">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) il numero di porta specificato non è valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3329">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) The specified port number is invalid.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3330">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3330">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3331">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3331">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3332">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3332">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3333">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3333">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3334">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3334">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Locate a free TCP port, starting at port 12, on a previously
   created IP instance. */
status = nx_tcp_free_port_find(&ip_0, 12, &free_port);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, "free_port" contains the next free port
   on the IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3358">nx_tcp_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3358">nx_tcp_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3359">Recuperare informazioni sulle attività TCP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3359">Retrieve information about TCP activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3360">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3360">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *tcp_packets_sent,
    ULONG *tcp_bytes_sent,
    ULONG *tcp_packets_received,
    ULONG *tcp_bytes_received,
    ULONG *tcp_invalid_packets,
    ULONG *tcp_receive_packets_dropped,
    ULONG *tcp_checksum_errors,
    ULONG *tcp_connections,
    ULONG *tcp_disconnections,
    ULONG *tcp_connections_dropped,
    ULONG *tcp_retransmit_packets);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3361">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3361">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3362">Questo servizio recupera informazioni sulle attività TCP per l'istanza IP specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3362">This service retrieves information about TCP activities for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3363">*Se un puntatore di destinazione è NX_NULL, le informazioni specifiche non vengono restituite al chiamante*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3363">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3364">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3364">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3365">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3365">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3366">**tcp_packets_sent** Puntatore alla destinazione per il numero totale di pacchetti TCP inviati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3366">**tcp_packets_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of TCP packets sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3367">**tcp_bytes_sent** Puntatore alla destinazione per il numero totale di byte TCP inviati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3367">**tcp_bytes_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of TCP bytes sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3368">**tcp_packets_received** Puntatore alla destinazione del numero totale di pacchetti TCP ricevuti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3368">**tcp_packets_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP packets received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3369">**tcp_bytes_received** Puntatore alla destinazione del numero totale di byte TCP ricevuti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3369">**tcp_bytes_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP bytes received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3370">**tcp_invalid_packets** Puntatore alla destinazione del numero totale di pacchetti TCP non validi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3370">**tcp_invalid_packets** Pointer to destination of the total number of invalid TCP packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3371">**tcp_receive_packets_dropped** Puntatore alla destinazione del numero totale di pacchetti di ricezione TCP eliminati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3371">**tcp_receive_packets_dropped** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP receive packets dropped.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3372">**tcp_checksum_errors** Puntatore alla destinazione del numero totale di pacchetti TCP con errori di checksum.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3372">**tcp_checksum_errors** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP packets with checksum errors.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3373">**tcp_connections** Puntatore alla destinazione del numero totale di connessioni TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3373">**tcp_connections** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP connections.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3374">**tcp_disconnections** Puntatore alla destinazione del numero totale di disconnessioni TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3374">**tcp_disconnections** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP disconnections.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3375">**tcp_connections_dropped** Puntatore alla destinazione del numero totale di connessioni TCP eliminate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3375">**tcp_connections_dropped** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP connections dropped.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3376">**tcp_retransmit_packets** Puntatore alla destinazione del numero totale di pacchetti TCP ritrasmessi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3376">**tcp_retransmit_packets** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP packets retransmitted.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3377">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3377">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3378">Il recupero delle informazioni TCP riuscite **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3378">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful TCP information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3379">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore IP non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3379">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3380">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3380">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3381">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) questo componente non è stato abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3381">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3382">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3382">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3383">Inizializzazione, thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3383">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3384">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3384">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3385">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3385">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3386">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3386">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve TCP information from previously created IP Instance
   ip_0. */
status = nx_tcp_info_get(&ip_0,
                         &tcp_packets_sent,
                         &tcp_bytes_sent,
                         &tcp_packets_received,
                         &tcp_bytes_received,
                         &tcp_invalid_packets,
                         &tcp_receive_packets_dropped,
                         &tcp_checksum_errors,
                         &tcp_connections,
                         &tcp_disconnections
                         &tcp_connections_dropped,
                         &tcp_retransmit_packets);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, TCP information was retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_server_socket_accept"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3410">nx_tcp_server_socket_accept</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3410">nx_tcp_server_socket_accept</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3411">Accetta connessione TCP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3411">Accept TCP connection</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3412">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3412">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_server_socket_accept(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3413">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3413">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3414">Questo servizio accetta o prepara l'accettazione di una richiesta di connessione socket client TCP per una porta precedentemente configurata per l'ascolto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3414">This service accepts (or prepares to accept) a TCP client socket connection request for a port that was previously set up for listening.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3415">Questo servizio può essere chiamato immediatamente dopo che l'applicazione chiama il servizio di ascolto o di riascolto o dopo che la routine di callback di ascolto viene chiamata quando la connessione client è effettivamente presente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3415">This service may be called immediately after the application calls the listen or re-listen service or after the listen callback routine is called when the client connection is actually present.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3416">Se non è possibile stabilire una connessione immediatamente, il servizio viene sospeso in base all'opzione wait specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3416">If a connection cannot not be established right away, the service suspends according to the supplied wait option.</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3417">*L'applicazione deve chiamare **nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept** dopo che la connessione non è più necessaria per rimuovere l'associazione del socket server alla porta del server*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3417">*The application must call **nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept** after the connection is no longer needed to remove the server socket's binding to the server port*.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3418">*Le routine di callback dell'applicazione vengono chiamate dall'interno del thread helper dell'IP*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3418">*Application callback routines are called from within the IP's helper thread*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3419">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3419">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3420">**socket_ptr** Puntatore al blocco di controllo socket del server TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3420">**socket_ptr** Pointer to the TCP server socket control block.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3421">**WAIT_OPTION** Definisce il comportamento del servizio mentre viene stabilita la connessione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3421">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves while the connection is being established.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3422">Le opzioni di attesa sono definite come segue:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3422">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3423">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3423">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3424">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3424">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3425">**valore di timeout in cicli (da 0x00000001 a** 0xfffffffe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3425">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3426">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3426">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3427">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) accettazione socket server TCP riuscita (connessione passiva).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3427">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful TCP server socket accept (passive connect).</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3428">**NX_NOT_LISTEN_STATE** (0X36) il socket del server specificato non è in uno stato di attesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3428">**NX_NOT_LISTEN_STATE** (0x36) The server socket supplied is not in a listen state.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3429">**NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0x37) non è stata specificata alcuna attesa. il tentativo di connessione è in corso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3429">**NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0x37) No wait was specified, the connection attempt is in progress.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3430">La sospensione richiesta **NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) è stata interrotta da una chiamata al tx_thread_wait_abort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3430">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3431">Errore del puntatore del socket **NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3431">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Socket pointer error.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3432">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3432">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3433">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) questo componente non è stato abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3433">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3438">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3438">Example</span></span>

```c
NX_PACKET_POOL my_pool;
NX_IP my_ip;
NX_TCP_SOCKET server_socket;

void port_12_connect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, UINT port)
{
    /* Simply set the semaphore to wake up the server thread. */
    tx_semaphore_put(&port_12_semaphore);
}

void port_12_disconnect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr)
{
    /* The client has initiated a disconnect on this socket. This
       example doesn't use this callback. */
}

void port_12_server_thread_entry(ULONG id)
{
NX_PACKET *my_packet;
UINT status, i;
    /* Assuming that:
       "port_12_semaphore" has already been created with an
        initial count of 0 "my_ip" has already been created and the
        link is enabled "my_pool" packet pool has already been
        created
    */

    /* Create the server socket. */
    nx_tcp_socket_create(&my_ip, &server_socket,
                         "Port 12 Server Socket",
                          NX_IP_NORMAL, NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY,
                          NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE, 100,
                          NX_NULL, port_12_disconnect_request);

    /* Setup server listening on port 12. */
    nx_tcp_server_socket_listen(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket, 5,
                                port_12_connect_request);

    /* Loop to process 5 server connections, sending
       "Hello_and_Goodbye" to each client and then disconnecting.*/
    for (i = 0; i < 5; i++)
    {

        /* Get the semaphore that indicates a client connection
        request is present. */
        tx_semaphore_get(&port_12_semaphore, TX_WAIT_FOREVER);

        /* Wait for 200 ticks for the client socket connection to
           complete.*/
        status = nx_tcp_server_socket_accept(&server_socket, 200);

        /* Check for a successful connection. */
        if (status == NX_SUCCESS)
        {

            /* Allocate a packet for the "Hello_and_Goodbye"
               message */
            nx_packet_allocate(&my_pool, &my_packet, NX_TCP_PACKET,
                                         NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

            /* Place "Hello_and_Goodbye" in the packet. */
            nx_packet_data_append(my_packet, "Hello_and_Goodbye",
                                  sizeof("Hello_and_Goodbye"),
                                  &my_pool, NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

            /* Send "Hello_and_Goodbye" to client. */
            nx_tcp_socket_send(&server_socket, my_packet, 200);

            /* Check for an error. */
            if (status)
            {
               /* Error, release the packet. */
               nx_packet_release(my_packet);
            }

            /* Now disconnect the server socket from the client. */
            nx_tcp_socket_disconnect(&server_socket, 200);
         }

         /* Unaccept the server socket. Note that unaccept is called
            even if disconnect or accept fails. */
         nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept(&server_socket);

         /* Setup server socket for listening with this socket
            again. */
         nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket);
     }

     /* We are now done so unlisten on server port 12. */
     nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten(&my_ip, 12);

     /* Delete the server socket. */
     nx_tcp_socket_delete(&server_socket);
}
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3465">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3465">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3466">Questo servizio consente l'attesa di una richiesta di connessione client sulla porta TCP specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3466">This service enables listening for a client connection request on the specified TCP port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3467">Quando viene ricevuta una richiesta di connessione client, il socket del server fornito viene associato alla porta specificata e viene chiamata la funzione di callback di ascolto fornita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3467">When a client connection request is received, the supplied server socket is bound to the specified port and the supplied listen callback function is called.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3468">L'elaborazione della routine di callback di ascolto è stata completata fino all'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3468">The listen callback routine's processing is completely up to the application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3469">Può contenere la logica per riattivare un thread dell'applicazione che esegue successivamente un'operazione Accept.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3469">It may contain logic to wake up an application thread that subsequently performs an accept operation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3470">Se l'applicazione dispone già di un thread sospeso durante l'accettazione dell'elaborazione per questo socket, la routine di callback di ascolto potrebbe non essere necessaria.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3470">If the application already has a thread suspended on accept processing for this socket, the listen callback routine may not be needed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3471">Se l'applicazione desidera gestire connessioni client aggiuntive sulla stessa porta, il ***nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten*** deve essere chiamato con un socket disponibile (un socket nello stato Closed) per la connessione successiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3471">If the application wishes to handle additional client connections on the same port, the ***nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten*** must be called with an available socket (a socket in the CLOSED state) for the next connection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3472">Fino a quando non viene chiamato il servizio di riascolto, le connessioni client aggiuntive vengono accodate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3472">Until the re-listen service is called, additional client connections are queued.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3473">Quando viene superata la profondità massima della coda, la richiesta di connessione meno recente viene eliminata a favore dell'accodamento della nuova richiesta di connessione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3473">When the maximum queue depth is exceeded, the oldest connection request is dropped in favor of queuing the new connection request.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3474">La profondità massima della coda è specificata da questo servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3474">The maximum queue depth is specified by this service.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3475">*Le routine di callback dell'applicazione vengono chiamate dal thread di supporto IP interno*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3475">*Application callback routines are called from the internal IP helper thread*.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3478">**porta** Numero di porta su cui restare in ascolto (da 1 a 0xFFFF).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3478">**port** Port number to listen on (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3479">**socket_ptr** Puntatore al socket da utilizzare per la connessione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3479">**socket_ptr** Pointer to socket to use for the connection.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3480">**listen_queue_size** Numero di richieste di connessione client che possono essere accodate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3480">**listen_queue_size** Number of client connection requests that can be queued.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3481">**Listen_Callback** Funzione dell'applicazione da chiamare quando viene ricevuta la connessione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3481">**listen_callback** Application function to call when the connection is received.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3482">Se viene specificato un valore NULL, la funzionalità di callback di ascolto è disabilitata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3482">If a NULL is specified, the listen callback feature is disabled.</span></span>

## <a name="nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3522">nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3522">nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3523">Re-ascolto della connessione client sulla porta TCP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3523">Re-listen for client connection on TCP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3524">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3524">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    UINT port,
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3525">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3525">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3526">Questo servizio viene chiamato dopo la ricezione di una connessione su una porta che è stata impostata in precedenza per l'ascolto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3526">This service is called after a connection has been received on a port that was setup previously for listening.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3527">Lo scopo principale di questo servizio è fornire un nuovo socket server per la successiva connessione client.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3527">The main purpose of this service is to provide a new server socket for the next client connection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3528">Se una richiesta di connessione viene accodata, la connessione verrà elaborata immediatamente durante la chiamata al servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3528">If a connection request is queued, the connection will be processed immediately during this service call.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3529">*La stessa routine di callback specificata dalla richiesta di ascolto originale viene chiamata anche quando è presente una connessione per questo nuovo socket del server*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3529">*The same callback routine specified by the original listen request is also called when a connection is present for this new server socket*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3530">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3530">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3531">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3531">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3532">**porta** Numero di porta su cui eseguire di nuovo l'ascolto (da 1 a 0xFFFF).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3532">**port** Port number to re-listen on (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3533">**socket_ptr** Socket da utilizzare per la connessione client successiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3533">**socket_ptr** Socket to use for the next client connection.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3534">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3534">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3535">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) la porta TCP riascoltata è riuscita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3535">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful TCP port re-listen.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3536">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) il socket server specificato non si trova in uno stato chiuso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3536">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) The supplied server socket is not in a closed state.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3537">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND** (0X22) il socket del server specificato è già associato a una porta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3537">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND** (0x22) The supplied server socket is already bound to a port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3538">**NX_INVALID_RELISTEN** (0x47) è già presente un puntatore socket valido per questa porta oppure la porta specificata non ha una richiesta di ascolto attiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3538">**NX_INVALID_RELISTEN** (0x47) There is already a valid socket pointer for this port or the port specified does not have a listen request active.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3539">**NX_CONNECTION_PENDING** (0X48) uguale NX_SUCCESS, ad eccezione del fatto che è stata eseguita una richiesta di connessione in coda ed è stata elaborata durante questa chiamata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3539">**NX_CONNECTION_PENDING** (0x48) Same as NX_SUCCESS, except there was a queued connection request and it was processed during this call.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3540">La porta **NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) specificata non è valida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3540">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Invalid port specified.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3541">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) un IP non valido o un puntatore di callback di ascolto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3541">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or listen callback pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3542">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3542">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3543">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) questo componente non è stato abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3543">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3548">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3548">Example</span></span>

```c
NX_PACKET_POOL my_pool;
NX_IP my_ip;
NX_TCP_SOCKET server_socket;

void port_12_connect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, UINT port)
{

   /* Simply set the semaphore to wake up the server thread.*/
   tx_semaphore_put(&port_12_semaphore);
}

void port_12_disconnect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr)
{
   /* The client has initiated a disconnect on this socket. This
      example doesn't use this callback. */
}

void port_12_server_thread_entry(ULONG id)
{

NX_PACKET *my_packet;
UINT status, i;

   /* Assuming that:
     "port_12_semaphore" has already been created with an initial
     count of 0.
    "my_ip" has already been created and the link is enabled.
    "my_pool" packet pool has already been created. */

   /* Create the server socket. */
   nx_tcp_socket_create(&my_ip, &server_socket, "Port 12 Server Socket",
                                 NX_IP_NORMAL, NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY,
                                 NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE, 100,
                                 NX_NULL, port_12_disconnect_request);

   /* Setup server listening on port 12. */
   nx_tcp_server_socket_listen(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket, 5,
                               port_12_connect_request);

   /* Loop to process 5 server connections, sending
      "Hello_and_Goodbye" to each client then disconnecting. */
   for (i = 0; i < 5; i++)
   {

       /* Get the semaphore that indicates a client connection
          request is present. */
       tx_semaphore_get(&port_12_semaphore, TX_WAIT_FOREVER);

       /* Wait for 200 ticks for the client socket connection to
          complete. */
       status = nx_tcp_server_socket_accept(&server_socket, 200);

       /* Check for a successful connection. */
          if (status == NX_SUCCESS)
       {

             /* Allocate a packet for the "Hello_and_Goodbye"
                message. */
             nx_packet_allocate(&my_pool, &my_packet, NX_TCP_PACKET,
                                NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

             /* Place "Hello_and_Goodbye" in the packet. */
             nx_packet_data_append(my_packet, "Hello_and_Goodbye",
                                   sizeof("Hello_and_Goodbye"),
                                   &my_pool, NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

             /* Send "Hello_and_Goodbye" to client. */
             nx_tcp_socket_send(&server_socket, my_packet, 200);

             /* Check for an error. */
             if (status)
             {

                /* Error, release the packet. */
                nx_packet_release(my_packet);
             }

             /* Now disconnect the server socket from the client. */
             nx_tcp_socket_disconnect(&server_socket, 200);
         }

         /* Unaccept the server socket. Note that unaccept is
            called even if disconnect or accept fails. */
         nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept(&server_socket);

         /* Setup server socket for listening with this socket
            again. */
         nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket);
     }

     /* We are now done so unlisten on server port 12. */
     nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten(&my_ip, 12);

     /* Delete the server socket. */
     nx_tcp_socket_delete(&server_socket);
}
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3572">nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3572">nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3574">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3574">Prototype</span></span>  

```c

```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3575">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3575">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3576">Questo servizio rimuove l'associazione tra questo socket server e la porta del server specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3576">This service removes the association between this server socket and the specified server port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3577">L'applicazione deve chiamare questo servizio dopo una disconnessione o dopo una chiamata Accept non riuscita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3577">The application must call this service after a disconnection or after an unsuccessful accept call.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3578">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3578">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3579">**socket_ptr** Puntatore all'istanza del socket del server di installazione precedente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3579">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously setup server socket instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3580">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3580">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3581">Impossibile accettare il socket server riuscito **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3581">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful server socket unaccept.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3582">Il socket del server **NX_NOT_LISTEN_STATE** (0x36) si trova in uno stato non valido e probabilmente non è disconnesso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3582">**NX_NOT_LISTEN_STATE** (0x36) Server socket is in an improper state, and is probably not disconnected.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3583">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore al socket non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3583">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3584">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3584">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3590">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3590">Example</span></span>

```c
NX_PACKET_POOL        my_pool;
NX_IP                 my_ip;
NX_TCP_SOCKET         server_socket;
void port_12_connect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, UINT port)
{

   /* Simply set the semaphore to wake up the server thread. */
   tx_semaphore_put(&port_12_semaphore);
}

void port_12_disconnect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr)
{
   /* The client has initiated a disconnect on this socket. This example
   doesn't use this callback. */
}

void port_12_server_thread_entry(ULONG id)
{

NX_PACKET  *my_packet;
UINT       status, i;

   /* Assuming that:
     "port_12_semaphore" has already been created with an initial count
      of 0 "my_ip" has already been created and the link is enabled
     "my_pool" packet pool has already been created
   */

    /* Create the server socket. */
    nx_tcp_socket_create(&my_ip, &server_socket, "Port 12 Server
                         Socket",NX_IP_NORMAL, NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY,
                         NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE, 100,NX_NULL,
                         port_12_disconnect_request);

    /* Setup server listening on port 12. */
    nx_tcp_server_socket_listen(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket, 5,
                                port_12_connect_request);

    /* Loop to process 5 server connections, sending "Hello_and_Goodbye"
       to
       each client and then disconnecting. */
    for (i = 0; i < 5; i++)
    {

        /* Get the semaphore that indicates a client connection request
           is present. */
        tx_semaphore_get(&port_12_semaphore, TX_WAIT_FOREVER);

        /* Wait for 200 ticks for the client socket connection to
           complete.*/
        status = nx_tcp_server_socket_accept(&server_socket, 200);

       /* Check for a successful connection. */
          if (status == NX_SUCCESS)
       {
             /* Allocate a packet for the "Hello_and_Goodbye" message. */
             nx_packet_allocate(&my_pool, &my_packet, NX_TCP_PACKET,
                                NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

             /* Place "Hello_and_Goodbye" in the packet. */
             nx_packet_data_append(my_packet,
                      "Hello_and_Goodbye",sizeof("Hello_and_Goodbye"),
                      &my_pool, NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

             /* Send "Hello_and_Goodbye" to client. */
             nx_tcp_socket_send(&server_socket, my_packet, 200);

             /* Check for an error. */
             if (status)
             {

                /* Error, release the packet. */
                nx_packet_release(my_packet);
             }

             /* Now disconnect the server socket from the client. */
             nx_tcp_socket_disconnect(&server_socket, 200);
       }

       /* Unaccept the server socket. Note that unaccept is called even
          if disconnect or accept fails. */
       nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept(&server_socket);

      /* Setup server socket for listening with this socket again. */
      nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket);
    }

    /* We are now done so unlisten on server port 12. */
    nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten(&my_ip, 12);

    /* Delete the server socket. */
    nx_tcp_socket_delete(&server_socket);
}
```

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3633">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3633">Example</span></span>

```c
NX_PACKET_POOL       my_pool;
NX_IP                my_ip;
NX_TCP_SOCKET        server_socket;

void port_12_connect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, UINT port)
{

     /* Simply set the semaphore to wake up the server thread. */
     tx_semaphore_put(&port_12_semaphore);
}

void port_12_disconnect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr)
{

     /* The client has initiated a disconnect on this socket. This example
        doesn't use this callback.*/
}

void port_12_server_thread_entry(ULONG id)
{

NX_PACKET *my_packet;
UINT status, i;

     /* Assuming that:
       "port_12_semaphore" has already been created with an initial count
        of 0 "my_ip" has already been created and the link is enabled
       "my_pool" packet pool has already been created
     */

     /* Create the server socket. */
     nx_tcp_socket_create(&my_ip, &server_socket, "Port 12 Server Socket",
                          NX_IP_NORMAL, NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY,
                          NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE, 100,
                          NX_NULL, port_12_disconnect_request);

     /* Setup server listening on port 12. */
     nx_tcp_server_socket_listen(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket, 5,
                                 port_12_connect_request);

     /* Loop to process 5 server connections, sending "Hello_and_Goodbye" to
        each client and then disconnecting. */
     for (i = 0; i < 5; i++)
     {

         /* Get the semaphore that indicates a client connection request is
            present. */
         tx_semaphore_get(&port_12_semaphore, TX_WAIT_FOREVER);

         /* Wait for 200 ticks for the client socket connection to complete.*/
         status = nx_tcp_server_socket_accept(&server_socket, 200);

         /* Check for a successful connection. */
         if (status == NX_SUCCESS)
         {

             /* Allocate a packet for the "Hello_and_Goodbye" message. */
             nx_packet_allocate(&my_pool, &my_packet, NX_TCP_PACKET,
                                NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

             /* Place "Hello_and_Goodbye" in the packet. */
             nx_packet_data_append(my_packet, "Hello_and_Goodbye",
                                   sizeof("Hello_and_Goodbye"), &my_pool,
                                   NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

             /* Send "Hello_and_Goodbye" to client. */
             nx_tcp_socket_send(&server_socket, my_packet, 200);

             /* Check for an error. */
             if (status)
             {

                /* Error, release the packet. */
                nx_packet_release(my_packet);
             }

             /* Now disconnect the server socket from the client. */
             nx_tcp_socket_disconnect(&server_socket, 200);
          }

          /* Unaccept the server socket. Note that unaccept is called even if
             disconnect or accept fails. */
          nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept(&server_socket);

          /* Setup server socket for listening with this socket again. */
          nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket);
     }
  
     /* We are now done so unlisten on server port 12. */
     nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten(&my_ip, 12);

     /* Delete the server socket. */
     nx_tcp_socket_delete(&server_socket);
}
```

```c
status = nx_tcp_socket_bytes_available(&my_socket,&bytes_available);

/* Is status = NX_SUCCESS, the available bytes is returned in
   bytes_available. */
```
