## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3701">nx_tcp_socket_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3701">nx_tcp_socket_create</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3702">Creazione di un client TCP o di un server socket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3702">Create TCP client or server socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3703">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3703">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_create(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    CHAR *name, 
    ULONG type_of_service, 
    ULONG fragment,
    UINT time_to_live, 
    ULONG window_size,
    VOID (*urgent_data_callback)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr),
    VOID (*disconnect_callback)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3704">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3704">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3705">Questo servizio crea un client TCP o un socket server per l'istanza IP specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3705">This service creates a TCP client or server socket for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]  
> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3706">*Le routine di callback dell'applicazione vengono chiamate dal thread associato a questa istanza IP*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3706">*Application callback routines are called from the thread associated with this IP instance*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3707">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3707">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3708">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3708">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3709">**socket_ptr** Puntatore al nuovo blocco di controllo socket TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3709">**socket_ptr** Pointer to new TCP socket control block.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3710">**nome** Nome dell'applicazione per questo socket TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3710">**name** Application name for this TCP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3711">**Type_of_Service** Definisce il tipo di servizio per la trasmissione. i valori validi sono i seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3711">**type_of_service** Defines the type of service for the transmission, legal values are as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3712">**NX_IP_NORMAL** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3712">**NX_IP_NORMAL** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3713">**NX_IP_MIN_DELAY** (0x00100000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3713">**NX_IP_MIN_DELAY** (0x00100000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3714">**NX_IP_MAX_DATA** (0x00080000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3714">**NX_IP_MAX_DATA** (0x00080000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3715">**NX_IP_MAX_RELIABLE** (0x00040000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3715">**NX_IP_MAX_RELIABLE** (0x00040000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3716">**NX_IP_MIN_COST** (0x00020000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3716">**NX_IP_MIN_COST** (0x00020000)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3717">**frammento** Specifica se la frammentazione IP è consentita o meno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3717">**fragment** Specifies whether or not IP fragmenting is allowed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3718">Se viene specificato NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY \* \* (0x0), è consentita la frammentazione IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3718">If NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY\*\* (0x0) is specified, IP fragmenting is allowed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3719">Se viene specificato NX_DONT_FRAGMENT (0x4000), la frammentazione IP è disabilitata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3719">If NX_DONT_FRAGMENT (0x4000) is specified, IP fragmenting is disabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3720">**Time_to_live** Specifica il valore a 8 bit che definisce il numero di router che questo pacchetto può superare prima di essere eliminato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3720">**time_to_live** Specifies the 8-bit value that defines how many routers this packet can pass before being thrown away.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3721">Il valore predefinito è specificato dal NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3721">The default value is specified by NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3722">**window_size** Definisce il numero massimo di byte consentiti nella coda di ricezione per questo socket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3722">**window_size** Defines the maximum number of bytes allowed in the receive queue for this socket</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3723">**urgent_data_callback** Funzione dell'applicazione che viene chiamata ogni volta che vengono rilevati dati urgenti nel flusso di ricezione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3723">**urgent_data_callback** Application function that is called whenever urgent data is detected in the receive stream.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3724">Se questo valore è NX_NULL, i dati urgenti vengono ignorati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3724">If this value is NX_NULL, urgent data is ignored.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3725">**disconnect_callback** Funzione dell'applicazione che viene chiamata ogni volta che una disconnessione viene emessa dal socket all'altra estremità della connessione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3725">**disconnect_callback** Application function that is called whenever a disconnect is issued by the socket at the other end of the connection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3726">Se questo valore è NX_NULL, la funzione di callback di disconnessione è disabilitata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3726">If this value is NX_NULL, the disconnect callback function is disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3727">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3727">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3728">Creazione socket client TCP riuscita **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3728">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful TCP client socket create.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3729">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0A) tipo di servizio non valido, frammento, dimensioni della finestra non valide o opzione Time-tolive.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3729">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0A) Invalid type-of-service, fragment, invalid window size, or time-tolive option.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3730">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) un puntatore IP o socket non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3730">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3731">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3731">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3732">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) questo componente non è stato abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3732">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3733">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3733">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3734">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3734">Initialization and Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3735">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3735">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3736">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3736">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3737">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3737">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Create a TCP client socket on the previously created IP instance,
   with normal delivery, IP fragmentation enabled, 0x80 time to
   live, a 200-byte receive window, no urgent callback routine, and
   the "client_disconnect" routine to handle disconnection initiated
   from the other end of the connection. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_create(&ip_0, &client_socket,
                             "Client Socket",
                             NX_IP_NORMAL, NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY,
                             0x80, 200, NX_NULL
                             client_disconnect);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the client socket is created and ready
   to be bound. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3761">nx_tcp_socket_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3761">nx_tcp_socket_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3762">Elimina socket TCP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3762">Delete TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3763">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3763">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_delete(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3764">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3764">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3765">Questo servizio Elimina un socket TCP creato in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3765">This service deletes a previously created TCP socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3766">Se il socket è ancora associato o connesso, il servizio restituisce un codice di errore.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3766">If the socket is still bound or connected, the service returns an error code.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3767">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3767">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3768">**socket_ptr** Socket TCP creato in precedenza</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3768">**socket_ptr** Previously created TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3769">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3769">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3770">Eliminazione del socket riuscita **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3770">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket delete.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3771">Il socket **NX_NOT_CREATED** (0x27) non è stato creato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3771">**NX_NOT_CREATED** (0x27) Socket was not created.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3772">Il socket **NX_STILL_BOUND** (0x42) è ancora associato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3772">**NX_STILL_BOUND** (0x42) Socket is still bound.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3773">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore al socket non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3773">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3774">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3774">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3775">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) questo componente non è stato abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3775">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_disconnect"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3804">nx_tcp_socket_disconnect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3804">nx_tcp_socket_disconnect</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3805">Disconnettere le connessioni socket client e server</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3805">Disconnect client and server socket connections</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3806">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3806">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_disconnect(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3807">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3807">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3808">Questo servizio disconnette una connessione client o socket server stabilita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3808">This service disconnects an established client or server socket connection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3809">Una disconnessione di un socket del server deve essere seguita da una richiesta di non accettazione, mentre un socket client disconnesso viene lasciato in uno stato pronto per un'altra richiesta di connessione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3809">A disconnect of a server socket should be followed by an unaccept request, while a client socket that is disconnected is left in a state ready for another connection request.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3810">Se non è possibile completare immediatamente il processo di disconnessione, il servizio viene sospeso in base all'opzione wait specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3810">If the disconnect process cannot finish immediately, the service suspends according to the supplied wait option.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3811">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3811">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3812">**socket_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza del client o del socket del server connessa in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3812">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously connected client or server socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3813">**WAIT_OPTION** Definisce il comportamento del servizio mentre è in corso la disconnessione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3813">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves while the disconnection is in progress.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3814">Le opzioni di attesa sono definite come segue:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3814">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3815">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3815">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3816">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3816">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3817">**valore di timeout in cicli (da 0x00000001 a** 0xfffffffe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3817">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3818">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3818">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3819">Disconnessione socket riuscite **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3819">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket disconnect.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3820">Il socket specificato **NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) non è connesso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3820">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) Specified socket is not connected.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3821">È in corso la disconnessione **NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0x37). non è stata specificata alcuna attesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3821">**NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0x37) Disconnect is in progress, no wait was specified.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3822">La sospensione richiesta **NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) è stata interrotta da una chiamata al tx_thread_wait_abort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3822">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3823">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore al socket non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3823">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3824">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3824">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3825">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) questo componente non è stato abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3825">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3826">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3826">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3827">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3827">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3828">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3828">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3829">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3829">Yes</span></span> 

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3830">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3830">Example</span></span> 

```c
/* Disconnect from a previously established connection and wait a
   maximum of 400 timer ticks. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_disconnect(&client_socket, 400);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the previously connected socket (either
   as a result of the client socket connect or the server accept) is
   disconnected. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_disconnect_complete_notify"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3854">nx_tcp_socket_disconnect_complete_notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3854">nx_tcp_socket_disconnect_complete_notify</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3855">Installazione della funzione di callback di disconnessione TCP completata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3855">Install TCP disconnect complete notify callback function</span></span>
 
### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3856">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3856">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_disconnect_complete_notify(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    VOID (*tcp_disconnect_complete_notify)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3857">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3857">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3858">Questo servizio registra una funzione di callback che viene richiamata dopo il completamento di un'operazione di disconnessione del socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3858">This service registers a callback function which is invoked after a socket disconnect operation is completed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3859">La funzione di callback completa di disconnessione socket TCP è disponibile se NetX Duo viene compilato con l'opzione ***NX_ENABLE_EXTENDED_NOTIFY_SUPPORT*** definita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3859">The TCP socket disconnect complete callback function is available if NetX Duo is built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_EXTENDED_NOTIFY_SUPPORT*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3860">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3860">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3861">**socket_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza del client o del socket del server connessa in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3861">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously connected client or server socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3862">**tcp_disconnect_complete_notify** Funzione di callback da installare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3862">**tcp_disconnect_complete_notify** The callback function to be installed.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3863">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3863">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3864">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha registrato correttamente la funzione di callback.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3864">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully registered the callback function.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3865">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0X4B) la funzionalità di notifica estesa non è incorporata nella libreria NetX Duo NX_PTR_ERROR \* \* (0x07) puntatore al socket non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3865">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) The extended notify feature is not built into the NetX Duo library NX_PTR_ERROR\*\* (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3866">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3866">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3867">La funzionalità TCP **NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) non è abilitata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3867">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP feature is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3868">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3868">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3869">Inizializzazione, thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3869">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3870">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3870">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3871">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3871">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3872">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3872">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Install the disconnect complete notify callback function. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_disconnect_complete_notify(&client_socket,
                                                  callback);
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_establish_notify"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3885">nx_tcp_socket_establish_notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3885">nx_tcp_socket_establish_notify</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3886">Impostare la funzione TCP establishe Notify callback</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3886">Set TCP establish notify callback function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3887">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3887">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_establish_notify(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    VOID (*tcp_establish_notify)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3888">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3888">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3889">Questo servizio registra una funzione di callback, che viene chiamata dopo che un socket TCP crea una connessione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3889">This service registers a callback function, which is called after a TCP socket makes a connection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3890">La funzione di callback socket TCP establish è disponibile se NetX Duo viene compilato con l'opzione ***NX_ENABLE_EXTENDED_NOTIFY_SUPPORT*** definita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3890">The TCP socket establish callback function is available if NetX Duo is built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_EXTENDED_NOTIFY_SUPPORT*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3891">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3891">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3892">**socket_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza del client o del socket del server connessa in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3892">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously connected client or server socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3893">**tcp_establish_notify** Funzione di callback richiamata dopo che è stata stabilita una connessione TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3893">**tcp_establish_notify** Callback function invoked after a TCP connection is established.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3894">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3894">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3895">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) imposta correttamente la funzione Notify.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3895">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully sets the notify function.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3896">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0X4B) la funzionalità di notifica estesa non è integrata nella libreria NETX Duo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3896">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) The extended notify feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3897">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore al socket non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3897">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3898">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3898">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3899">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) TCP non è stato abilitato dall'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3899">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP has not been enabled by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3900">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3900">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3901">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3901">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3902">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3902">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3903">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3903">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3904">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3904">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Set the function pointer "callback" as the notify function NetX
   Duo will call when the connection is in the established state. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_establish_notify(&client_socket, callback);
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3918">nx_tcp_socket_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3918">nx_tcp_socket_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3919">Recuperare informazioni sulle attività dei socket TCP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3919">Retrieve information about TCP socket activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3920">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3920">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_info_get(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG *tcp_packets_sent,
    ULONG *tcp_bytes_sent,
    ULONG *tcp_packets_received,
    ULONG *tcp_bytes_received,
    ULONG *tcp_retransmit_packets,
    ULONG *tcp_packets_queued,
    ULONG *tcp_checksum_errors,
    ULONG *tcp_socket_state,
    ULONG *tcp_transmit_queue_depth,
    ULONG *tcp_transmit_window,
    ULONG *tcp_receive_window);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3921">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3921">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3922">Questo servizio recupera informazioni sulle attività socket TCP per l'istanza di socket TCP specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3922">This service retrieves information about TCP socket activities for the specified TCP socket instance.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]  
> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3923">*Se un puntatore di destinazione è NX_NULL, le informazioni specifiche non vengono restituite al chiamante*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3923">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3924">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3924">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3925">**socket_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza di socket TCP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3925">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3926">**tcp_packets_sent** Puntatore alla destinazione per il numero totale di pacchetti TCP inviati al socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3926">**tcp_packets_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of TCP packets sent on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3927">**tcp_bytes_sent** Puntatore alla destinazione per il numero totale di byte TCP inviati al socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3927">**tcp_bytes_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of TCP bytes sent on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3928">**tcp_packets_received** Puntatore alla destinazione del numero totale di pacchetti TCP ricevuti sul socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3928">**tcp_packets_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP packets received on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3929">**tcp_bytes_received** Puntatore alla destinazione del numero totale di byte TCP ricevuti sul socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3929">**tcp_bytes_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP bytes received on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3930">**tcp_retransmit_packets** Puntatore alla destinazione del numero totale di ritrasmissioni di pacchetti TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3930">**tcp_retransmit_packets** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP packet retransmissions.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3931">**tcp_packets_queued** Puntatore alla destinazione del numero totale di pacchetti TCP in coda nel socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3931">**tcp_packets_queued** Pointer to destination of the total number of queued TCP packets on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3932">**tcp_checksum_errors** Puntatore alla destinazione del numero totale di pacchetti TCP con errori di checksum nel socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3932">**tcp_checksum_errors** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP packets with checksum errors on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3933">**tcp_socket_state** Puntatore alla destinazione dello stato corrente del socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3933">**tcp_socket_state** Pointer to destination of the socket’s current state.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3934">**tcp_transmit_queue_depth** Puntatore alla destinazione del numero totale di pacchetti di trasmissione ancora in coda in attesa di ACK.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3934">**tcp_transmit_queue_depth** Pointer to destination of the total number of transmit packets still queued waiting for ACK.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3935">**tcp_transmit_window** Puntatore alla destinazione della dimensione della finestra di trasmissione corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3935">**tcp_transmit_window** Pointer to destination of the current transmit window size.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3936">**tcp_receive_window** Puntatore alla destinazione delle dimensioni correnti della finestra di ricezione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3936">**tcp_receive_window** Pointer to destination of the current receive window size.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3937">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3937">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3938">Il recupero delle informazioni sul socket TCP riuscite **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3938">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful TCP socket information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3939">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore al socket non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3939">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3940">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3940">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3941">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) questo componente non è stato abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3941">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3942">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3942">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3943">Inizializzazione, thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3943">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3944">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3944">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3945">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3945">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3946">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3946">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve TCP socket information from previously created
   socket_0.*/
status = nx_tcp_socket_info_get(&socket_0,
                                &tcp_packets_sent,
                                &tcp_bytes_sent,
                                &tcp_packets_received,
                                &tcp_bytes_received,
                                &tcp_retransmit_packets,
                                &tcp_packets_queued,
                                &tcp_checksum_errors,
                                &tcp_socket_state,
                                &tcp_transmit_queue_depth,
                                &tcp_transmit_window,
                                &tcp_receive_window);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, TCP socket information was retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_mss_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3970">nx_tcp_socket_mss_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3970">nx_tcp_socket_mss_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3971">Ottenere la MSS del socket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3971">Get MSS of socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3972">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3972">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_mss_get(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, 
    ULONG *mss);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3973">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3973">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3974">Questo servizio recupera la dimensione del segmento massimo locale (MSS) del socket specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3974">This service retrieves the specified socket's local Maximum Segment Size (MSS).</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3975">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3975">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3976">**socket_ptr** Puntatore al socket creato in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3976">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3977">**MSS** Destinazione per la restituzione di MSS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3977">**mss** Destination for returning MSS.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3978">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3978">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3979">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscite MSS Get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3979">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful MSS get.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3980">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) o un puntatore di destinazione MSS non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3980">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket or MSS destination pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3981">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** TCP (0x14) non è abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3981">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3982">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) non è un thread o un'inizializzazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3982">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller is not a thread or initialization.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3983">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3983">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3984">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3984">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3985">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3985">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3986">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3986">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-3987">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-3987">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Get the MSS for the socket "my_socket". */
status = nx_tcp_socket_mss_get(&my_socket, &mss_value);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the "mss_value" variable contains the
   socket's current MSS value. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_mss_peer_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4001">nx_tcp_socket_mss_peer_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4001">nx_tcp_socket_mss_peer_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4002">Ottenere la MSS del socket TCP peer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4002">Get MSS of the peer TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4003">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4003">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_mss_peer_get(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG *mss);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4004">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4004">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4005">Questo servizio recupera le dimensioni massime del segmento (MSS) annunciate dal socket peer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4005">This service retrieves the Maximum Segment Size (MSS) advertised by the peer socket.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4006">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4006">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4007">**socket_ptr** Puntatore al socket precedentemente creato e connesso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4007">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created and connected socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4008">**MSS** Destinazione per la restituzione dell'oggetto MSS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4008">**mss** Destination for returning the MSS.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4009">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4009">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4010">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) il peer MSS riuscito Get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4010">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful peer MSS get.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4011">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) o un puntatore di destinazione MSS non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4011">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket or MSS destination pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4012">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** TCP (0x14) non è abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4012">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4013">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) non è un thread o un'inizializzazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4013">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller is not a thread or initialization.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4014">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4014">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4015">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4015">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4016">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4016">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4017">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4017">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4018">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4018">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Get the MSS of the connected peer to the socket "my_socket". */
status = nx_tcp_socket_mss_peer_get(&my_socket, &mss_value);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the "mss_value" variable contains the
   socket peer’s advertised MSS value. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_mss_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4032">nx_tcp_socket_mss_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4032">nx_tcp_socket_mss_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4033">Imposta MSS del socket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4033">Set MSS of socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4034">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4034">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_mss_set(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, 
    ULONG mss);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4035">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4035">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4036">Questo servizio imposta la dimensione massima del segmento (MSS) del socket specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4036">This service sets the specified socket's Maximum Segment Size (MSS).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4037">Si noti che il valore MSS deve rientrare nell'IP dell'interfaccia di rete MTU, consentendo spazio per le intestazioni IP e TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4037">Note the MSS value must be within the network interface IP MTU, allowing room for IP and TCP headers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4038">Questo servizio deve essere utilizzato prima che un socket TCP avvii il processo di connessione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4038">This service should be used before a TCP socket starts the connection process.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4039">Se il servizio viene utilizzato dopo che è stata stabilita una connessione TCP, il nuovo valore non ha alcun effetto sulla connessione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4039">If the service is used after a TCP connection is established, the new value has no effect on the connection.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4040">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4040">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4041">**socket_ptr** Puntatore al socket creato in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4041">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4042">**MSS** Valore di MSS da impostare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4042">**mss** Value of MSS to set.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4043">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4043">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4044">Set di MSS riusciti **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4044">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful MSS set.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4045">Il valore MSS specificato per **NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) è troppo grande.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4045">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) Specified MSS value is too large.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4046">Non è stata stabilita la connessione TCP **NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4046">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) TCP connection has not been established</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4047">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore al socket non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4047">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4048">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** TCP (0x14) non è abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4048">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4049">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) non è un thread o un'inizializzazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4049">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller is not a thread or initialization.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4050">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4050">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4051">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4051">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4052">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4052">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4053">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4053">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4054">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4054">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Set the MSS of the socket "my_socket" to 1000 bytes. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_mss_set(&my_socket, 1000);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the MSS of "my_socket" is 1000 bytes. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4068">nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4068">nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4069">Recuperare informazioni sul socket TCP peer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4069">Retrieve information about peer TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4070">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4070">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG *peer_ip_address,
    ULONG *peer_port);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4071">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4071">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4072">Questo servizio recupera le informazioni sull'indirizzo IP e sulla porta del peer per il socket TCP connesso sulla rete IPv4.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4072">This service retrieves peer IP address and port information for the connected TCP socket over IPv4 network.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4073">Il servizio equivalente che supporta anche la rete IPv6 è ***nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get.***</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4073">The equivalent service that also supports IPv6 network is ***nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get.***</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4074">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4074">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4075">**socket_ptr** Puntatore al socket TCP creato in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4075">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket.</span></span>

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4103">nx_tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4103">nx_tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4104">Impostazione della funzione di notifica della coda di trasmissione TCP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4104">Set the TCP transmit queue notify function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4105">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4105">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify_set(
              NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
              VOID(*tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4106">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4106">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4107">Questo servizio imposta la funzione di notifica dell'aggiornamento della profondità della coda di trasmissione specificata dall'applicazione, che viene chiamata ogni volta che il socket specificato stabilisce che i pacchetti sono stati rilasciati dalla coda di trasmissione in modo che la profondità della coda non superi il limite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4107">This service sets the transmit queue depth update notify function specified by the application, which is called whenever the specified socket determines that it has released packets from the transmit queue such that the queue depth is no longer exceeding its limit.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4108">Se un'applicazione viene bloccata durante la trasmissione a causa della profondità della coda, la funzione di callback funge da notifica all'applicazione che può iniziare a trasmettere nuovamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4108">If an application would be blocked on transmit due to queue depth, the callback function serves as a notification to the application that it may start transmitting again.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4109">Questo servizio è disponibile solo se la libreria NetX Duo è compilata con l'opzione ***NX_ENABLE_TCP_QUEUE_DEPTH_UPDATE_NOTIFY*** definita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4109">This service is available only if the NetX Duo library is built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_TCP_QUEUE_DEPTH_UPDATE_NOTIFY*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4110">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4110">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4111">**socket_ptr** Puntatore alla struttura del socket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4111">**socket_ptr** Pointer to the socket structure</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4112">**tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify** Funzione Notify da installare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4112">**tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify** The notify function to be installed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4113">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4113">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4114">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha installato correttamente la funzione Notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4114">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully installed the notify function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4115">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0X4B) la funzionalità di notifica della profondità della coda di socket TCP non è integrata nella libreria NETX Duo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4115">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) The TCP socket queue depth notify feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4116">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore non valido al blocco di controllo socket o alla funzione Notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4116">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer to the socket control block or the notify function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4117">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4117">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4118">La funzionalità TCP **NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) non è abilitata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4118">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP feature is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4119">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4119">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4120">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4120">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4121">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4121">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4122">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4122">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4123">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4123">Example</span></span>

```c
VOID tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr)
{
   /* Notify the application to resume sending. */

}
/* Install the TCP transmit queue notify function .*/
status = nxd_tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify_set(&tcp_socket,
                                  tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the callback function is successfully
   installed. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_receive"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4137">nx_tcp_socket_receive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4137">nx_tcp_socket_receive</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4138">Ricevere dati dal socket TCP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4138">Receive data from TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4139">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4139">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_receive(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NX_PACKET **packet_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4140">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4140">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4141">Questo servizio riceve i dati TCP dal socket specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4141">This service receives TCP data from the specified socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4142">Se non viene accodato alcun dato nel socket specificato, il chiamante viene sospeso in base all'opzione wait fornita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4142">If no data is queued on the specified socket, the caller suspends based on the supplied wait option.</span></span>

> [!CAUTION]  
> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4143">*Se viene restituito NX_SUCCESS, l'applicazione è responsabile del rilascio del pacchetto ricevuto quando non è più necessario*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4143">*If NX_SUCCESS is returned, the application is responsible for releasing the received packet when it is no longer needed*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4144">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4144">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4145">**socket_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza di socket TCP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4145">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4146">**packet_ptr** Puntatore al puntatore del pacchetto TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4146">**packet_ptr** Pointer to TCP packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4147">**WAIT_OPTION** Definisce il comportamento del servizio se i dati sono attualmente accodati in questo socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4147">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if do data are currently queued on this socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4148">Le opzioni di attesa sono definite come segue:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4148">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4149">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4149">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4150">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4150">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4151">**valore di timeout in cicli (da 0x00000001 a** 0xfffffffe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4151">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4152">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4152">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4153">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) la ricezione dei dati socket è riuscita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4153">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket data receive.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4154">Il socket **NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) non è ancora associato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4154">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket is not bound yet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4155">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) non sono stati ricevuti dati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4155">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) No data received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4156">La sospensione richiesta **NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) è stata interrotta da una chiamata al tx_thread_wait_abort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4156">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4157">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0X38) il socket non è più connesso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4157">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) The socket is no longer connected.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4158">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) socket non valido o puntatore al pacchetto restituito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4158">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket or return packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4159">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4159">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4160">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) questo componente non è stato abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4160">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4161">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4161">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4162">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4162">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4163">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4163">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4164">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4164">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4165">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4165">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Receive a packet from the previously created and connected TCP
   client socket. If no packet is available, wait for 200 timer
   ticks before giving up. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_receive(&client_socket, &packet_ptr, 200);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the received packet is pointed to by
   "packet_ptr". */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4189">nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4189">nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4190">Notificare all'applicazione i pacchetti ricevuti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4190">Notify application of received packets</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4191">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4191">Prototype</span></span>   

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, 
    VOID (*tcp_receive_notify)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4192">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4192">Description</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4193">Questo servizio configura il puntatore della funzione receive Notify con la funzione di callback specificata dall'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4193">This service configures the receive notify function pointer with the callback function specified by the application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4194">Questa funzione di callback viene quindi chiamata ogni volta che vengono ricevuti uno o più pacchetti nel socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4194">This callback function is then called whenever one or more packets are received on the socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4195">Se viene fornito un puntatore NX_NULL, la funzione Notify è disabilitata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4195">If a NX_NULL pointer is supplied, the notify function is disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4196">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4196">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4197">**socket_ptr** Puntatore al socket TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4197">**socket_ptr** Pointer to the TCP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4198">**tcp_receive_notify** Puntatore alla funzione di callback dell'applicazione che viene chiamato quando uno o più pacchetti vengono ricevuti sul socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4198">**tcp_receive_notify** Application callback function pointer that is called when one or more packets are received on the socket.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4199">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4199">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4200">La notifica di ricezione del socket riuscite **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4200">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket receive notify.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4201">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore al socket non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4201">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4202">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4202">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4203">La funzionalità TCP **NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) non è abilitata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4203">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP feature is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4204">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4204">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4205">Inizializzazione, thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4205">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4206">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4206">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4207">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4207">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4208">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4208">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Setup a receive packet callback function for the "client_socket"
   socket. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify(&client_socket,
                                      my_receive_notify);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, NetX Duo will call the function named
   "my_receive_notify" whenever one or more packets are received for
   "client_socket". */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4221">nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4221">nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set</span></span>

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4222">nx_tcp_socket_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4222">nx_tcp_socket_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4223">Inviare dati tramite un socket TCP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4223">Send data through a TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4224">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4224">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_send(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4225">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4225">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4226">Questo servizio invia dati TCP tramite un socket TCP connesso in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4226">This service sends TCP data through a previously connected TCP socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4227">Se le ultime dimensioni della finestra annunciata del ricevitore sono inferiori a questa richiesta, il servizio viene sospeso facoltativamente in base all'opzione wait specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4227">If the receiver's last advertised window size is less than this request, the service optionally suspends based on the wait option specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4228">Questo servizio garantisce che non vengano inviati dati di pacchetto di dimensioni superiori a MSS al livello IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4228">This service guarantees that no packet data larger than MSS is sent to the IP layer.</span></span> 

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4229">*A meno che non venga restituito un errore, l'applicazione non deve rilasciare il pacchetto dopo questa chiamata. Questa operazione causerà risultati imprevedibili perché il driver di rete tenterà anche di rilasciare il pacchetto dopo la trasmissione*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4229">*Unless an error is returned, the application should not release the packet after this call. Doing so will cause unpredictable results because the network driver will also try to release the packet after transmission*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4230">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4230">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4231">**socket_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza di socket TCP connessa in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4231">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously connected TCP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4232">**packet_ptr** Puntatore al pacchetto di dati TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4232">**packet_ptr** TCP data packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4233">**WAIT_OPTION** Definisce il comportamento del servizio se la richiesta è maggiore delle dimensioni della finestra del destinatario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4233">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if the request is greater than the window size of the receiver.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4234">Le opzioni di attesa sono definite come segue:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4234">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4235">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4235">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4236">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4236">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4237">**valore di timeout in cicli (da 0x00000001 a** 0xfffffffe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4237">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4238">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4238">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4239">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) del socket inviato correttamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4239">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket send.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4240">Il socket **NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) non è stato associato ad alcuna porta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4240">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket was not bound to any port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4241">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0X50) non è stata trovata alcuna interfaccia in uscita adatta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4241">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) No suitable outgoing interface found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4242">Il socket **NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) non è più connesso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4242">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) Socket is no longer connected.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4243">La richiesta **NX_WINDOW_OVERFLOW** (0x39) è maggiore della dimensione della finestra annunciata del ricevitore in byte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4243">**NX_WINDOW_OVERFLOW** (0x39) Request is greater than receiver’s advertised window size in bytes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4244">La sospensione richiesta **NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) è stata interrotta da una chiamata al tx_thread_wait_abort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4244">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4245">Il pacchetto **NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) non è allocato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4245">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) Packet is not allocated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4246">È stata raggiunta la profondità massima della coda di trasmissione **NX_TX_QUEUE_DEPTH** (0x49).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4246">**NX_TX_QUEUE_DEPTH** (0x49) Maximum transmit queue depth has been reached.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4247">Il puntatore di aggiunta del pacchetto **NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) non è valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4247">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Packet append pointer is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4248">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore al socket non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4248">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4249">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4249">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4250">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) questo componente non è stato abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4250">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4251">Il puntatore **NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) non è valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4251">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Packet prepend pointer is invalid.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4252">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4252">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4253">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4253">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4254">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4254">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4255">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4255">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4256">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4256">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Send a packet out on the previously created and connected TCP
   socket. If the receive window on the other side of the connection
   is less than the packet size, wait 200 timer ticks before giving
   up. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_send(&client_socket, packet_ptr, 200);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the packet has been sent! */
```
