## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_state_wait"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4280">nx_tcp_socket_state_wait</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4280">nx_tcp_socket_state_wait</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4281">Attendere che il socket TCP entri in uno stato specifico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4281">Wait for TCP socket to enter specific state</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4282">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4282">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_state_wait(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    UINT desired_state,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4283">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4283">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4284">Questo servizio attende che il socket entri nello stato desiderato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4284">This service waits for the socket to enter the desired state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4285">Se il socket non è nello stato desiderato, il servizio viene sospeso in base all'opzione wait specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4285">If the socket is not in the desired state, the service suspends according to the supplied wait option.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4286">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4286">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4287">**socket_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza di socket TCP connessa in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4287">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously connected TCP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4288">**desired_state** Stato TCP desiderato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4288">**desired_state** Desired TCP state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4289">Gli Stati di socket TCP validi sono definiti come segue:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4289">Valid TCP socket states are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4290">**NX_TCP_CLOSED** (0x01)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4290">**NX_TCP_CLOSED** (0x01)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4291">**NX_TCP_LISTEN_STATE** (0x02)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4291">**NX_TCP_LISTEN_STATE** (0x02)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4292">**NX_TCP_SYN_SENT** (0x03)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4292">**NX_TCP_SYN_SENT** (0x03)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4293">**NX_TCP_SYN_RECEIVED** (0x04)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4293">**NX_TCP_SYN_RECEIVED** (0x04)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4294">**NX_TCP_ESTABLISHED** (0x05)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4294">**NX_TCP_ESTABLISHED** (0x05)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4295">**NX_TCP_CLOSE_WAIT** (0x06)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4295">**NX_TCP_CLOSE_WAIT** (0x06)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4296">**NX_TCP_FIN_WAIT_1** (0x07)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4296">**NX_TCP_FIN_WAIT_1** (0x07)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4297">**NX_TCP_FIN_WAIT_2** (0x08)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4297">**NX_TCP_FIN_WAIT_2** (0x08)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4298">**NX_TCP_CLOSING** (0x09)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4298">**NX_TCP_CLOSING** (0x09)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4299">**NX_TCP_TIMED_WAIT** (0x0A)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4299">**NX_TCP_TIMED_WAIT** (0x0A)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4300">**NX_TCP_LAST_ACK** (0x0B)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4300">**NX_TCP_LAST_ACK** (0x0B)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4301">**WAIT_OPTION** Definisce il comportamento del servizio se lo stato richiesto non è presente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4301">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if the requested state is not present.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4302">Le opzioni di attesa sono definite come segue:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4302">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4303">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4303">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4304">**valore di timeout in cicli (da 0x00000001 a** 0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4304">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4305">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4305">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4306">Attesa stato riuscita **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4306">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful state wait.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4307">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore al socket non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4307">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4308">Lo stato **NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0x43) non è presente entro il tempo di attesa specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4308">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0x43) State not present within the specified wait time.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4309">La sospensione richiesta **NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) è stata interrotta da una chiamata al tx_thread_wait_abort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4309">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4310">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4310">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4311">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) questo componente non è stato abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4311">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4312">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0X0A) lo stato del socket desiderato non è valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4312">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0A) The desired socket state is invalid.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4313">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4313">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4314">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4314">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4315">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4315">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4316">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4316">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4317">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4317">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Wait 300 timer ticks for the previously created socket to enter
   the established state in the TCP state machine. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_state_wait(&client_socket,
                                  NX_TCP_ESTABLISHED, 300);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the socket is now in the established
   state! */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_timed_wait_callback"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4341">nx_tcp_socket_timed_wait_callback</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4341">nx_tcp_socket_timed_wait_callback</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4342">Installa callback per lo stato di attesa programmato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4342">Install callback for timed wait state</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4343">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4343">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_timed_wait_callback(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    VOID (*tcp_timed_wait_callback)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4344">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4344">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4345">Questo servizio registra una funzione di callback che viene richiamata quando il socket TCP è in stato di attesa programmato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4345">This service registers a callback function which is invoked when the TCP socket is in timed wait state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4346">Per usare questo servizio, è necessario compilare la libreria NetX Duo con l'opzione ***NX_ENABLE_EXTENDED_NOTIFY*** definita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4346">To use this service, the NetX Duo library must be built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_EXTENDED_NOTIFY*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4347">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4347">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4348">**socket_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza del client o del socket del server connessa in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4348">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously connected client or server socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4349">**tcp_timed_wait_callback** Funzione di callback Wait temporizzata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4349">**tcp_timed_wait_callback** The timed wait callback function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4350">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4350">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4351">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) registra correttamente il socket della funzione di callback</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4351">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully registers the callback function socket</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4352">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0X4B) NETX Duo Library è compilata senza la funzionalità di notifica estesa abilitata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4352">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) NetX Duo library is built without the extended notify feature enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4353">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore al socket non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4353">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4354">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4354">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4355">La funzionalità TCP **NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) non è abilitata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4355">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP feature is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4356">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4356">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4357">Inizializzazione, thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4357">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4358">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4358">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4359">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4359">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4360">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4360">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Install the timed wait callback function */
nx_tcp_socket_timed_wait_callback(&client_socket, callback);
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_transmit_configure"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4374">nx_tcp_socket_transmit_configure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4374">nx_tcp_socket_transmit_configure</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4375">Configurare i parametri di trasmissione del socket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4375">Configure socket's transmit parameters</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4376">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4376">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_transmit_configure(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG max_queue_depth,
    ULONG timeout,
    ULONG max_retries,
    ULONG timeout_shift);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4377">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4377">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4378">Questo servizio configura vari parametri di trasmissione del socket TCP specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4378">This service configures various transmit parameters of the specified TCP socket.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4379">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4379">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4380">**socket_ptr** Puntatore al socket TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4380">**socket_ptr** Pointer to the TCP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4381">**max_queue_depth** Numero massimo di pacchetti che possono essere accodati per la trasmissione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4381">**max_queue_depth** Maximum number of packets allowed to be queued for transmission.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4382">**timeout** Numero di cicli del timer ThreadX in attesa di un ACK prima che il pacchetto venga nuovamente inviato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4382">**timeout** Number of ThreadX timer ticks an ACK is waited for before the packet is sent again.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4383">**max_retries** Numero massimo di tentativi consentiti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4383">**max_retries** Maximum number of retries allowed.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4384">**timeout_shift** Valore per spostare il timeout per ogni nuovo tentativo successivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4384">**timeout_shift** Value to shift the timeout for each subsequent retry.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4385">Il valore 0 comporta lo stesso timeout tra i tentativi successivi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4385">A value of 0, results in the same timeout between successive retries.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4386">Il valore 1, raddoppia il timeout tra i tentativi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4386">A value of 1, doubles the timeout between retries.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4387">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4387">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4388">Configurazione socket di trasmissione riuscita **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4388">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful transmit socket configure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4389">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore al socket non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4389">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4390">Opzione profondità coda non valida **NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0A).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4390">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0a) Invalid queue depth option.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4391">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4391">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4392">La funzionalità TCP **NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) non è abilitata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4392">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP feature is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4393">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4393">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4394">Inizializzazione, thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4394">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4395">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4395">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4396">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4396">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4397">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4397">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Configure the "client_socket" for a maximum transmit queue depth of
   12, 100 tick timeouts, a maximum of 20 retries, and a timeout double
   on each successive retry. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_transmit_configure(&client_socket,12,100,20,1);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the socket’s transmit retry has been
   configured. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4411">nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4411">nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4412">Notifica dell'applicazione degli aggiornamenti delle dimensioni della finestra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4412">Notify application of window size updates</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4413">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4413">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    VOID (*tcp_window_update_notify)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4414">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4414">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4415">Questo servizio installa una routine di callback di aggiornamento della finestra del socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4415">This service installs a socket window update callback routine.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4416">Questa routine viene chiamata automaticamente ogni volta che il socket specificato riceve un pacchetto che indica un aumento delle dimensioni della finestra dell'host remoto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4416">This routine is called automatically whenever the specified socket receives a packet indicating an increase in the window size of the remote host.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4417">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4417">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4418">**socket_ptr** Puntatore al socket TCP creato in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4418">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4419">**tcp_window_update_notify** Routine di callback da chiamare quando cambiano le dimensioni della finestra.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4419">**tcp_window_update_notify** Callback routine to be called when the window size changes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4420">Il valore NULL disabilita l'aggiornamento delle modifiche della finestra.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4420">A value of NULL disables the window change update.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4421">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4421">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4422">Nel socket è installata la routine di callback **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4422">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Callback routine is installed on the socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4423">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4423">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4424">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatori non validi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4424">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointers.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4425">La funzionalità TCP **NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) non è abilitata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4425">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP feature is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4426">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4426">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4427">Inizializzazione, thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4427">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4428">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4428">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4429">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4429">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4430">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4430">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Set the function pointer to the windows update callback after creating the
   socket. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set(&data_socket,
                                                my_windows_update_callback);

/* Define the window callback function in the host application. */
void my_windows_update_callback(&data_socket)
{

/* Process update on increase TCP transmit socket window size. */
   return;
}
```

## <a name="nx_udp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4444">nx_udp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4444">nx_udp_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4445">Abilita componente UDP di NetX Duo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4445">Enable UDP component of NetX Duo</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4446">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4446">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4447">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4447">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4448">Questo servizio Abilita il componente UDP (User Datagram Protocol) di NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4448">This service enables the User Datagram Protocol (UDP) component of NetX Duo.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4449">Dopo l'abilitazione, i datagrammi UDP possono essere inviati e ricevuti dall'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4449">After enabled, UDP datagrams may be sent and received by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4450">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4450">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4451">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4451">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4452">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4452">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4453">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Enable UDP riuscito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4453">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful UDP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4454">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore IP non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4454">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4455">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4455">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4456">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0X15) questo componente è già stato abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4456">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) This component has already been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4457">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4457">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4458">Inizializzazione, thread, timer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4458">Initialization, threads, timers</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4459">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4459">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4460">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4460">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4461">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4461">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable UDP on the previously created IP instance. */
status = nx_udp_enable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, UDP is now enabled on the specified IP
   instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_free_port_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4484">nx_udp_free_port_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4484">nx_udp_free_port_find</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4485">Trova la porta UDP successiva disponibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4485">Find next available UDP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4486">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4486">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_free_port_find(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    UINT port,
    UINT *free_port_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4487">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4487">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4488">Questo servizio cerca una porta UDP gratuita (senza binding) a partire dal numero di porta fornito dall'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4488">This service looks for a free UDP port (unbound) starting from the application supplied port number.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4489">Se la ricerca raggiunge il valore massimo della porta di 0xFFFF, viene eseguito il wrapping della logica di ricerca.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4489">The search logic will wrap around if the search reaches the maximum port value of 0xFFFF.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4490">Se la ricerca ha esito positivo, la porta libera viene restituita nella variabile a cui punta free_port_ptr.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4490">If the search is successful, the free port is returned in the variable pointed to by free_port_ptr.</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4491">*Questo servizio può essere chiamato da un altro thread e può avere la stessa porta restituita. Per evitare questo race condition, è possibile che l'applicazione inserisca il servizio e il socket effettivo associato alla protezione di un mutex*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4491">*This service can be called from another thread and can have the same port returned. To prevent this race condition, the application may wish to place this service and the actual socket bind under the protection of a mutex*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4492">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4492">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4493">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4493">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4494">**porta** Numero di porta da cui iniziare la ricerca (da 1 a 0xFFFF).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4494">**port** Port number to start search (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4495">**free_port_ptr** Puntatore alla variabile di restituzione della porta libera di destinazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4495">**free_port_ptr** Pointer to the destination free port return variable.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4496">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4496">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4497">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscite dalla porta libera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4497">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful free port find.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4498">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS** (0X45) non sono state trovate porte gratuite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4498">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS** (0x45) No free ports found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4499">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore IP non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4499">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4500">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4500">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4501">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) questo componente non è stato abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4501">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4502">Il numero di porta specificato **NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) non è valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4502">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Specified port number is invalid.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4503">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4503">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4504">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4504">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4505">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4505">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4506">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4506">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4507">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4507">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Locate a free UDP port, starting at port 12, on a previously
   created IP instance. */
status = nx_udp_free_port_find(&ip_0, 12, &free_port);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS pointer, "free_port" identifies the next
   free UDP port on the IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4530">nx_udp_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4530">nx_udp_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4531">Recuperare informazioni sulle attività UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4531">Retrieve information about UDP activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4532">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4532">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *udp_packets_sent,
    ULONG *udp_bytes_sent,
    ULONG *udp_packets_received,
    ULONG *udp_bytes_received,
    ULONG *udp_invalid_packets,
    ULONG *udp_receive_packets_dropped,
    ULONG *udp_checksum_errors);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4533">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4533">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4534">Questo servizio recupera informazioni sulle attività UDP per l'istanza IP specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4534">This service retrieves information about UDP activities for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4535">*Se un puntatore di destinazione è NX_NULL, le informazioni specifiche non vengono restituite al chiamante*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4535">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4536">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4536">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4537">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4537">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4538">**udp_packets_sent** Puntatore alla destinazione per il numero totale di pacchetti UDP inviati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4538">**udp_packets_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of UDP packets sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4539">**udp_bytes_sent** Puntatore alla destinazione per il numero totale di byte UDP inviati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4539">**udp_bytes_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of UDP bytes sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4540">**udp_packets_received** Puntatore alla destinazione del numero totale di pacchetti UDP ricevuti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4540">**udp_packets_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of UDP packets received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4541">**udp_bytes_received** Puntatore alla destinazione del numero totale di byte UDP ricevuti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4541">**udp_bytes_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of UDP bytes received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4542">**udp_invalid_packets** Puntatore alla destinazione del numero totale di pacchetti UDP non validi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4542">**udp_invalid_packets** Pointer to destination of the total number of invalid UDP packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4543">**udp_receive_packets_dropped** Puntatore alla destinazione del numero totale di pacchetti di ricezione UDP eliminati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4543">**udp_receive_packets_dropped** Pointer to destination of the total number of UDP receive packets dropped.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4544">**udp_checksum_errors** Puntatore alla destinazione del numero totale di pacchetti UDP con errori di checksum.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4544">**udp_checksum_errors** Pointer to destination of the total number of UDP packets with checksum errors.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4545">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4545">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4546">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) il recupero delle informazioni UDP è riuscito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4546">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful UDP information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4547">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore IP non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4547">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4548">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4548">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4549">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) questo componente non è stato abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4549">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4550">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4550">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4551">Inizializzazione, thread e timer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4551">Initialization, threads, and timers</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4552">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4552">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4553">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4553">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4554">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4554">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve UDP information from previously created IP Instance
   ip_0. */
status = nx_udp_info_get(&ip_0, &udp_packets_sent,
                         &udp_bytes_sent,
                         &udp_packets_received,
                         &udp_bytes_received,
                         &udp_invalid_packets,
                         &udp_receive_packets_dropped,
                         &udp_checksum_errors);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, UDP information was retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_packet_info_extract"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4577">nx_udp_packet_info_extract</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4577">nx_udp_packet_info_extract</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4578">Estrai parametri di rete dal pacchetto UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4578">Extract network parameters from UDP packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4579">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4579">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_packet_info_extract(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG *ip_address,
    UINT *protocol,
    UINT *port,
    UINT *interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4580">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4580">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4581">Questo servizio estrae i parametri di rete, ad esempio l'indirizzo IPv4, il numero di porta peer, il tipo di protocollo (questo servizio restituisce sempre il tipo UDP) da un pacchetto ricevuto su un'interfaccia in ingresso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4581">This service extracts network parameters, such as IPv4 address, peer port number, protocol type (this service always returns UDP type) from a packet received on an incoming interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4582">Per ottenere informazioni su un pacchetto proveniente da una rete IPv4 o IPv6, è necessario che l'applicazione utilizzi il servizio ***nxd_udp_packet_info_extract.***</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4582">To obtain information on a packet coming from IPv4 or IPv6 network, application shall use the service ***nxd_udp_packet_info_extract.***</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4583">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4583">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4584">**packet_ptr** Puntatore al pacchetto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4584">**packet_ptr** Pointer to packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4585">**ip_address** Puntatore all'indirizzo IP del mittente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4585">**ip_address** Pointer to sender IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4586">**protocollo** di Puntatore a protocollo (UDP).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4586">**protocol** Pointer to protocol (UDP).</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4587">**porta** Puntatore al numero di porta del mittente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4587">**port** Pointer to sender’s port number.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4588">**interface_index** Puntatore all'indice dell'interfaccia ricevente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4588">**interface_index** Pointer to receiving interface index.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4589">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4589">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4590">Estrazione dei dati dell'interfaccia di pacchetti **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) completata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4590">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Packet interface data successfully extracted.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4591">Il pacchetto **NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) non contiene un frame IPv4.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4591">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) Packet does not contain IPv4 frame.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4592">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) input puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4592">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4593">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4593">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4594">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4594">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4595">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4595">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4596">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4596">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4597">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4597">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4598">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4598">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Extract network data from UDP packet interface.*/
status = nx_udp_packet_info_extract(packet_ptr, &ip_address,
                                     &protocol, &port,
                                     &interface_index);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS packet data was successfully
   retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_bind"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4621">nx_udp_socket_bind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4621">nx_udp_socket_bind</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4622">Associa socket UDP a porta UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4622">Bind UDP socket to UDP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4623">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4623">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_bind(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, 
    UINT port,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4624">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4624">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4625">Questo servizio associa il socket UDP creato in precedenza alla porta UDP specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4625">This service binds the previously created UDP socket to the specified UDP port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4626">I socket UDP validi sono compresi tra 0 e 0xFFFF.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4626">Valid UDP sockets range from 0 through 0xFFFF.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4627">Se il numero di porta richiesto è associato a un altro socket, il servizio attende il periodo di tempo specificato affinché il socket venga dissociato dal numero di porta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4627">If the requested port number is bound to another socket, this service waits for specified period of time for the socket to unbind from the port number.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4628">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4628">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4629">**socket_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza del socket UDP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4629">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4630">**porta** Numero di porta da associare a \* \* (da 1 a 0xFFFF).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4630">**port** Port number to bind to\*\* (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4631">Se il numero di porta è NX_ANY_PORT \* \* (0x0000), l'istanza IP cercherà la porta libera successiva e la utilizzerà per l'associazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4631">If port number is NX_ANY_PORT\*\* (0x0000), the IP instance will search for the next free port and use that for the binding.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4632">**WAIT_OPTION** Definisce il comportamento del servizio se la porta è già associata a un altro socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4632">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if the port is already bound to another socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4633">Le opzioni di attesa sono definite come segue:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4633">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4634">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4634">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4635">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4635">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4636">**valore di timeout in cicli (da 0x00000001 a** 0xfffffffe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4636">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4637">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4637">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4638">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) associazione Socket riuscita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4638">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket bind.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4639">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND** (0X22) questo socket è già associato a un'altra porta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4639">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND** (0x22) This socket is already bound to another port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4640">La porta **NX_PORT_UNAVAILABLE** (0x23) è già associata a un socket diverso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4640">**NX_PORT_UNAVAILABLE** (0x23) Port is already bound to a different socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4641">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS** (0X45) non è disponibile alcuna porta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4641">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS** (0x45) No free port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4642">La sospensione richiesta **NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) è stata interrotta da una chiamata al tx_thread_wait_abort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4642">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4643">La porta **NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) specificata non è valida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4643">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Invalid port specified.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4644">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore al socket non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4644">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4645">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4645">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4646">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) questo componente non è stato abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4646">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4647">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4647">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4648">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4648">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4649">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4649">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4650">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4650">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4651">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4651">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Bind the previously created UDP socket to port 12 on the
   previously created IP instance. If the port is already bound,
   wait for 300 timer ticks before giving up. */
status = nx_udp_socket_bind(&udp_socket, 12, 300);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the UDP socket is now bound to
   port 12.*/
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_bytes_available"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4674">nx_udp_socket_bytes_available</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4674">nx_udp_socket_bytes_available</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4675">Recupera il numero di byte disponibili per il recupero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4675">Retrieves number of bytes available for retrieval</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4676">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4676">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_bytes_available(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG *bytes_available);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4677">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4677">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4678">Questo servizio recupera il numero di byte disponibili per la ricezione nel socket UDP specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4678">This service retrieves number of bytes available for reception in the specified UDP socket.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4679">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4679">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4680">**socket_ptr** Puntatore al socket UDP creato in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4680">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4681">**bytes_available** Puntatore alla destinazione per byte disponibili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4681">**bytes_available** Pointer to destination for bytes available.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4682">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4682">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4683">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) byte riusciti di recupero disponibili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4683">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful bytes available retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4684">Il socket **NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0x43) non è associato a una porta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4684">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0x43) Socket not bound to a port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4685">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatori non validi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4685">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointers.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4686">La funzionalità UDP **NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) non è abilitata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4686">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) UDP feature is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4687">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4687">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4688">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4688">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4689">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4689">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4690">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4690">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4691">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4691">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4692">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4692">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Get the bytes available for retrieval from the UDP socket. */
status = nx_udp_socket_bytes_available(&my_socket,
                                       &bytes_available);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the number of bytes was successfully
   retrieved.*/
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_checksum_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4715">nx_udp_socket_checksum_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4715">nx_udp_socket_checksum_disable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4716">Disabilitare il checksum per il socket UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4716">Disable checksum for UDP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4717">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4717">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_checksum_disable(NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4718">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4718">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4719">Questo servizio Disabilita la logica di checksum per l'invio e la ricezione di pacchetti sul socket UDP specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4719">This service disables the checksum logic for sending and receiving packets on the specified UDP socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4720">Quando la logica di checksum è disabilitata, il valore zero viene caricato nel campo checksum dell'intestazione UDP per tutti i pacchetti inviati tramite questo socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4720">When the checksum logic is disabled, a value of zero is loaded into the UDP header's checksum field for all packets sent through this socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4721">Un valore di checksum con valore zero nell'intestazione UDP segnala al ricevitore che checksum non viene calcolato per questo pacchetto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4721">A zero-value checksum value in the UDP header signals the  receiver that checksum is not computed for this packet.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4722">Si noti inoltre che questa operazione non ha effetto se vengono definiti **NX_DISABLE_UDP_RX_CHECKSUM** e **NX_DISABLE_UDP_TX_CHECKSUM** durante la ricezione e l'invio di pacchetti UDP rispettivamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4722">Also note that this has no effect if **NX_DISABLE_UDP_RX_CHECKSUM** and **NX_DISABLE_UDP_TX_CHECKSUM** are defined when receiving and sending UDP packets respectively,</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4723">Si noti che questo servizio non ha alcun effetto sui pacchetti nella rete IPv6, perché il checksum UDP è obbligatorio per IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4723">Note that this service has no effect on packets on the IPv6 network since UDP checksum is mandatory for IPv6.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4724">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4724">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4725">**socket_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza del socket UDP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4725">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4726">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4726">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4727">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) disabilitato checksum del socket riuscito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4727">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket checksum disable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4728">Il socket **NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) non è associato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4728">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket is not bound.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4729">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore al socket non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4729">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4730">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4730">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4731">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) questo componente non è stato abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4731">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4732">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4732">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4733">Inizializzazione, thread, timer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4733">Initialization, threads, timer</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4734">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4734">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4735">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4735">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4736">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4736">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Disable the UDP checksum logic for packets sent on this socket. */
status = nx_udp_socket_checksum_disable(&udp_socket);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, outgoing packets will not have a checksum
   calculated. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_checksum_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4759">nx_udp_socket_checksum_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4759">nx_udp_socket_checksum_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4760">Abilita checksum per socket UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4760">Enable checksum for UDP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4761">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4761">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_checksum_enable(NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4762">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4762">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4763">Questo servizio Abilita la logica di checksum per l'invio e la ricezione di pacchetti sul socket UDP specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4763">This service enables the checksum logic for sending and receiving packets on the specified UDP socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4764">Il checksum copre l'intera area dati UDP e un'intestazione pseudo-IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4764">The checksum covers the entire UDP data area as well as a pseudo IP header.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4765">Si noti inoltre che questa operazione non ha effetto se vengono definiti **NX_DISABLE_UDP_RX_CHECKSUM** e **NX_DISABLE_UDP_TX_CHECKSUM** durante la ricezione e l'invio di pacchetti UDP rispettivamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4765">Also note that this has no effect if **NX_DISABLE_UDP_RX_CHECKSUM** and **NX_DISABLE_UDP_TX_CHECKSUM** are defined when receiving and sending UDP packets respectively.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4766">Si noti che questo servizio non ha alcun effetto sui pacchetti nella rete IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4766">Note that this service has no effect on packets on the IPv6 network.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4767">Checksum UDP è obbligatorio in IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4767">UDP checksum is mandatory in IPv6.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4772">Il socket **NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) non è associato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4772">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket is not bound.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4773">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore al socket non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4773">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4774">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4774">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4775">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) questo componente non è stato abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4775">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4803">nx_udp_socket_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4803">nx_udp_socket_create</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4804">Crea socket UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4804">Create UDP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4805">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4805">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_create(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, 
    CHAR *name,
    ULONG type_of_service, 
    ULONG fragment,
    UINT time_to_live, 
    ULONG queue_maximum);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4806">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4806">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4807">Questo servizio crea un socket UDP per l'istanza IP specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4807">This service creates a UDP socket for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4808">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4808">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4809">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4809">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4810">**socket_ptr** Puntatore al nuovo blocco di controllo socket UDP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4810">**socket_ptr** Pointer to new UDP socket control bloc.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4811">**nome** Nome dell'applicazione per questo socket UDP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4811">**name** Application name for this UDP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4812">**Type_of_Service** Definisce il tipo di servizio per la trasmissione. i valori validi sono i seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4812">**type_of_service** Defines the type of service for the transmission, legal values are as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4813">**NX_IP_NORMAL** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4813">**NX_IP_NORMAL** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4814">**NX_IP_MIN_DELAY** (0x00100000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4814">**NX_IP_MIN_DELAY** (0x00100000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4815">**NX_IP_MAX_DATA** (0x00080000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4815">**NX_IP_MAX_DATA** (0x00080000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4816">**NX_IP_MAX_RELIABLE** (0x00040000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4816">**NX_IP_MAX_RELIABLE** (0x00040000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4817">**NX_IP_MIN_COST** (0x00020000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4817">**NX_IP_MIN_COST** (0x00020000)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4818">il **frammento specifica** se la frammentazione IP è consentita o meno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4818">**fragment Specifies** whether or not IP fragmenting is allowed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4819">Se viene specificato NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY (0x0), è consentita la frammentazione IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4819">If NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY (0x0) is specified, IP fragmenting is allowed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4820">Se viene specificato NX_DONT_FRAGMENT (0x4000), la frammentazione IP è disabilitata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4820">If NX_DONT_FRAGMENT (0x4000) is specified, IP fragmenting is disabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4821">**Time_to_live** Specifica il valore a 8 bit che definisce il numero di router che questo pacchetto può superare prima di essere eliminato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4821">**time_to_live** Specifies the 8-bit value that defines how many routers this packet can pass before being thrown away.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4822">Il valore predefinito è specificato dal NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4822">The default value is specified by NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4823">**queue_maximum** Definisce il numero massimo di datagrammi UDP che possono essere accodati per il socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4823">**queue_maximum** Defines the maximum number of UDP datagrams that can be queued for this socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4824">Una volta raggiunto il limite della coda, per ogni nuovo pacchetto ricevuto viene rilasciato il pacchetto UDP meno recente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4824">After the queue limit is reached, for every new packet received the oldest UDP packet is released.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4825">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4825">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4826">Creazione socket UDP riuscita **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4826">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful UDP socket create.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4827">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0A) tipo di servizio, frammento o opzione di durata (TTL) non valida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4827">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0A) Invalid type-of-service, fragment, or time-to-live option.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4828">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) un puntatore IP o socket non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4828">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4829">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4829">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4830">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) questo componente non è stato abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4830">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4831">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4831">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4832">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4832">Initialization and Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4833">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4833">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4834">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4834">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4835">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4835">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Create a UDP socket with a maximum receive queue of 30 packets.*/
status = nx_udp_socket_create(&ip_0, &udp_socket, "Sample UDP Socket",
                              NX_IP_NORMAL, NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY, 0x80,
                              30);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the new UDP socket has been created and
   is ready for binding. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4858">nx_udp_socket_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4858">nx_udp_socket_delete</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4860">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4860">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_delete(NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4861">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4861">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4862">Questo servizio Elimina un socket UDP creato in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4862">This service deletes a previously created UDP socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4863">Se il socket è stato associato a una porta, il socket deve essere prima non associato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4863">If the socket was bound to a port, the socket must be unbound first.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4864">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4864">Parameters</span></span>

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4899">nx_udp_socket_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4899">nx_udp_socket_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4900">Recuperare informazioni sulle attività del socket UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4900">Retrieve information about UDP socket activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4901">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4901">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_info_get(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG *udp_packets_sent,
    ULONG *udp_bytes_sent,
    ULONG *udp_packets_received,
    ULONG *udp_bytes_received,
    ULONG *udp_packets_queued,
    ULONG *udp_receive_packets_dropped,
    ULONG *udp_checksum_errors);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4902">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4902">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4903">Questo servizio recupera informazioni sulle attività socket UDP per l'istanza del socket UDP specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4903">This service retrieves information about UDP socket activities for the specified UDP socket instance.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4904">*Se un puntatore di destinazione è NX_NULL, le informazioni specifiche non vengono restituite al chiamante*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4904">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4905">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4905">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4906">**socket_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza del socket UDP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4906">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4907">**udp_packets_sent** Puntatore alla destinazione per il numero totale di pacchetti UDP inviati al socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4907">**udp_packets_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of UDP packets sent on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4908">**udp_bytes_sent** Puntatore alla destinazione per il numero totale di byte UDP inviati al socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4908">**udp_bytes_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of UDP bytes sent on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4909">**udp_packets_received** Puntatore alla destinazione del numero totale di pacchetti UDP ricevuti sul socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4909">**udp_packets_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of UDP packets received on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4910">**udp_bytes_received** Puntatore alla destinazione del numero totale di byte UDP ricevuti sul socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4910">**udp_bytes_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of UDP bytes received on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4911">**udp_packets_queued** Puntatore alla destinazione del numero totale di pacchetti UDP in coda nel socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4911">**udp_packets_queued** Pointer to destination of the total number of queued UDP packets on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4912">**udp_receive_packets_dropped** Puntatore alla destinazione del numero totale di pacchetti di ricezione UDP eliminati per il socket a causa del superamento della dimensione della coda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4912">**udp_receive_packets_dropped** Pointer to destination of the total number of UDP receive packets dropped for socket due to queue size being exceeded.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4913">**udp_checksum_errors** Puntatore alla destinazione del numero totale di pacchetti UDP con errori di checksum nel socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4913">**udp_checksum_errors** Pointer to destination of the total number of UDP packets with checksum errors on socket.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4914">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4914">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4915">Il recupero delle informazioni sul socket UDP riuscite **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4915">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful UDP socket information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4916">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore al socket non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4916">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4917">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4917">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4918">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) questo componente non è stato abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4918">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4919">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4919">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4920">Inizializzazione, thread e timer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4920">Initialization, threads, and timers</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4921">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4921">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4922">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4922">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4923">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4923">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve UDP socket information from socket 0.*/
status = nx_udp_socket_info_get(&socket_0,
                                &udp_packets_sent,
                                &udp_bytes_sent,
                                &udp_packets_received,
                                &udp_bytes_received,
                                &udp_queued_packets,
                                &udp_receive_packets_dropped,
                                &udp_checksum_errors);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, UDP socket information was retrieved.*/
```
