## <a name="nx_udp_socket_port_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4946">nx_udp_socket_port_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4946">nx_udp_socket_port_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4947">Preleva il numero di porta associato al socket UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4947">Pick up port number bound to UDP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4948">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4948">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_port_get(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    UINT *port_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4949">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4949">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4950">Questo servizio recupera il numero di porta associato al socket, che è utile per trovare la porta allocata da NetX Duo nelle situazioni in cui il NX_ANY_PORT è stato specificato al momento dell'associazione del socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4950">This service retrieves the port number associated with the socket, which is useful to find the port allocated by NetX Duo in situations where the NX_ANY_PORT was specified at the time the socket was bound.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4951">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4951">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4952">**socket_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza del socket UDP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4952">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4953">**port_ptr** Puntatore alla destinazione per il numero di porta restituito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4953">**port_ptr** Pointer to destination for the return port number.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4954">I numeri di porta validi sono (1-0xFFFF).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4954">Valid port numbers are (1- 0xFFFF).</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4955">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4955">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4956">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) associazione Socket riuscita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4956">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket bind.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4957">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0X24) questo socket non è associato a una porta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4957">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) This socket is not bound to a port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4958">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore a socket non valido o puntatore a porta restituita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4958">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer or port return pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4959">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4959">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4960">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) questo componente non è stato abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4960">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4961">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4961">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4962">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4962">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4963">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4963">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4964">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4964">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4965">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4965">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Get the port number of created and bound UDP socket. */
status = nx_udp_socket_port_get(&udp_socket, &port);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the port variable contains the port this
   socket is bound to. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_receive"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4988">nx_udp_socket_receive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4988">nx_udp_socket_receive</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4989">Ricevi datagramma dal socket UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4989">Receive datagram from UDP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4990">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4990">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_receive(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NX_PACKET **packet_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4991">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4991">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4992">Questo servizio riceve un datagramma UDP dal socket specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4992">This service receives an UDP datagram from the specified socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4993">Se non viene accodato alcun datagramma sul socket specificato, il chiamante viene sospeso in base all'opzione wait fornita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4993">If no datagram is queued on the specified socket, the caller suspends based on the supplied wait option.</span></span>

> [!CAUTION]  
> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4994">*Se viene restituito NX_SUCCESS, l'applicazione è responsabile del rilascio del pacchetto ricevuto quando non è più necessario*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4994">*If NX_SUCCESS is returned, the application is responsible for releasing the received packet when it is no longer needed*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4995">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4995">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4996">**socket_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza del socket UDP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4996">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4997">**packet_ptr** Puntatore al puntatore del pacchetto del datagramma UDP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4997">**packet_ptr** Pointer to UDP datagram packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4998">**WAIT_OPTION** Definisce il comportamento del servizio se un datagramma non è attualmente accodato in questo socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4998">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if a datagram is not currently queued on this socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-4999">Le opzioni di attesa sono definite come segue:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-4999">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5000">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5000">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5001">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5001">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5002">**valore di timeout in cicli (da 0x00000001 a** 0xfffffffe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5002">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5003">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5003">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5004">La ricezione del socket è riuscita **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5004">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket receive.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5005">Il socket **NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) non è stato associato ad alcuna porta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5005">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket was not bound to any port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5006">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) non è disponibile alcun datagramma UDP da ricevere.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5006">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) There was no UDP datagram to receive.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5007">La sospensione richiesta **NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) è stata interrotta da una chiamata al tx_thread_wait_abort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5007">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5008">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) il puntatore del socket o del pacchetto restituito non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5008">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket or packet return pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5009">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5009">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5010">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) questo componente non è stato abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5010">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5011">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5011">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5012">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5012">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5013">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5013">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5014">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5014">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5015">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5015">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Receive a packet from a previously created and bound UDP socket.
   If no packets are currently available, wait for 500 timer ticks
   before giving up. */
status = nx_udp_socket_receive(&udp_socket, &packet_ptr, 500);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the received UDP packet is pointed to by
   packet_ptr. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_receive_notify"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5038">nx_udp_socket_receive_notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5038">nx_udp_socket_receive_notify</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5039">Invia una notifica all'applicazione di ogni pacchetto ricevuto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5039">Notify application of each received packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5040">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5040">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_receive_notify(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    VOID (*udp_receive_notify)(NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5041">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5041">Description</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5042">Questo servizio imposta il puntatore della funzione receive Notify per la funzione di callback specificata dall'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5042">This service sets the receive notify function pointer to the callback function specified by the  application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5043">Questa funzione di callback viene quindi chiamata ogni volta che viene ricevuto un pacchetto nel socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5043">This callback function is then called whenever a packet is received on the socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5044">Se viene fornito un puntatore NX_NULL, la funzione receive Notify è disabilitata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5044">If a NX_NULL pointer is supplied, the receive notify function is disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5045">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5045">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5046">**socket_ptr** Puntatore al socket UDP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5046">**socket_ptr** Pointer to the UDP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5047">**udp_receive_notify** Puntatore alla funzione di callback dell'applicazione che viene chiamato quando viene ricevuto un pacchetto nel socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5047">**udp_receive_notify** Application callback function pointer that is called when a packet is received on the socket.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5048">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5048">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5049">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha impostato correttamente la funzione socket Receive Notify.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5049">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set socket receive notify function.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5050">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore al socket non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5050">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5051">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5051">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5052">Inizializzazione, thread, timer e ISRs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5052">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5053">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5053">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5054">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5054">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5055">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5055">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Setup a receive packet callback function for the "udp_socket"
   socket. */
status = nx_udp_socket_receive_notify(&udp_socket,
                                      my_receive_notify);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, NetX Duo will call the function named
   "my_receive_notify" whenever a packet is received for
   "udp_socket". */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5078">nx_udp_socket_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5078">nx_udp_socket_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5079">Inviare un datagramma UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5079">Send a UDP Datagram</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5080">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5080">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_send(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address, 
    UINT port);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5081">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5081">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5082">Questo servizio invia un datagramma UDP tramite un socket UDP precedentemente creato e associato per le reti IPv4.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5082">This service sends a UDP datagram through a previously created and bound UDP socket for IPv4 networks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5083">NetX Duo trova un indirizzo IP locale appropriato come indirizzo di origine in base all'indirizzo IP di destinazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5083">NetX Duo finds a suitable local IP address as source address based on the destination IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5084">Per specificare un'interfaccia e un indirizzo IP di origine specifici, l'applicazione deve usare il servizio  **nxd_udp_socket_source_send** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5084">To specify a specific interface and source IP address, the application should use the  **nxd_udp_socket_source_send** service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5085">Si noti che questo servizio viene restituito immediatamente, indipendentemente dal fatto che il datagramma UDP sia stato inviato correttamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5085">Note that this service returns immediately regardless of whether the UDP datagram was successfully sent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5086">Il servizio equivalente NetX Duo (IPv4/IPv6) viene ***nxd_udp_socket_send***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5086">The NetX Duo (IPv4/IPv6) equivalent service is ***nxd_udp_socket_send***.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5087">Il socket deve essere associato a una porta locale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5087">The socket must be bound to a local port.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5088">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5088">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5089">**socket_ptr** Puntatore all'istanza Socket UDP creata in precedenza</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5089">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5090">**packet_ptr** Puntatore al pacchetto del datagramma UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5090">**packet_ptr** UDP datagram packet pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5091">**ip_address** Indirizzo IPv4 di destinazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5091">**ip_address** Destination IPv4 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5092">**porta** Numero di porta di destinazione valido compreso tra 1 e 0xFFFF), in ordine byte host</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5092">**port** Valid destination port number between 1 and 0xFFFF), in host byte order</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5093">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5093">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5094">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) trasmissione socket UDP riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5094">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful UDP socket send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5095">Socket **NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) non associato ad alcuna porta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5095">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket not bound to any port</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5096">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0X50) non è possibile trovare un'interfaccia in uscita adatta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5096">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) No suitable outgoing interface can be found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5097">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) indirizzo IP del server non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5097">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid server IP address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5098">Lo spazio di **NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) non è sufficiente per l'intestazione UDP nel pacchetto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5098">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Not enough room for UDP header in the packet</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5099">Puntatore di aggiunta pacchetto di **NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5099">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Packet append pointer is invalid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5100">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore al socket non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5100">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5101">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questo servizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5101">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5102">Il **NX_NOT_ENABLED** UDP (0x14) non è stato abilitato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5102">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) UDP has not been enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5103">Il numero di porta **NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) non è compreso in un intervallo valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5103">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Port number is not within a valid range</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5104">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5104">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5105">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5105">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5106">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5106">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5107">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5107">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5108">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5108">Example</span></span>

```c
ULONG server_address;

/* Set the UDP Client IP address. */
server_address = IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,5);

/* Send a packet to the UDP server at server_address on port 12. */
status = nx_udp_socket_send(&client_socket, packet_ptr,
                            server_address, 12);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the application successfully transmitted
   the packet out the UDP socket to its peer. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_source_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5131">nx_udp_socket_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5131">nx_udp_socket_source_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5132">Invia datagramma tramite socket UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5132">Send datagram through UDP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5133">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5133">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_source_send(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    UINT port,
    UINT address_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5134">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5134">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5135">Questo servizio invia un datagramma UDP tramite un socket UDP precedentemente creato e associato tramite l'interfaccia di rete con l'indirizzo IP specificato come indirizzo di origine.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5135">This service sends a UDP datagram through a previously created and bound UDP socket through the network interface with the specified IP address as the source address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5136">Si noti che il servizio restituisce immediatamente un risultato, indipendentemente dal fatto che il datagramma UDP sia stato inviato correttamente o meno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5136">Note that service returns immediately, regardless of whether or not the UDP datagram was successfully sent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5137">***nxd_udp_socket_source_send*** funziona sia per le reti IPv4 sia per quelle IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5137">***nxd_udp_socket_source_send*** works for both IPv4 and IPv6 networks.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5138">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5138">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5139">**socket_ptr** Socket per la trasmissione del pacchetto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5139">**socket_ptr** Socket to transmit the packet out on.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5140">**packet_ptr** Puntatore al pacchetto da trasmettere.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5140">**packet_ptr** Pointer to packet to transmit.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5141">**ip_address** Indirizzo IP di destinazione per l'invio del pacchetto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5141">**ip_address** Destination IP address to send packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5142">**porta** Porta di destinazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5142">**port** Destination port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5143">**address_index** Indice dell'indirizzo associato all'interfaccia su cui inviare il pacchetto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5143">**address_index** Index of the address associated with the interface to send packet on.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5144">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5144">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5145">Il pacchetto **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) è stato inviato correttamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5145">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Packet successfully sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5146">Il socket **NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) non è associato a una porta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5146">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket not bound to a port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5147">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) indirizzo IP non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5147">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5148">L'elaborazione UDP di **NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) non è abilitata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5148">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) UDP processing not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5149">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5149">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5150">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) puntatore di Accodamento pacchetti non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5150">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Invalid packet append pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5151">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) puntatore a anteporre il pacchetto non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5151">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Invalid packet prepend pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5152">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5152">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5153">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) indice di indirizzo non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5153">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid address index.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5154">Il numero di porta **NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) supera il numero di porta massimo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5154">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Port number exceeds maximum port number.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5155">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5155">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5156">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5156">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5157">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5157">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5158">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5158">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5159">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5159">Example</span></span>

```c
#define ADDRESS_INDEX 1

/* Send packet out on port 80 to the specified destination IP on the
   interface at index 1 in the IP task interface list. */
status = nx_udp_socket_source_send(socket_ptr, packet_ptr,
                                   destination_ip, 80,
                                   ADDRESS_INDEX);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS packet was successfully transmitted. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_unbind"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5182">nx_udp_socket_unbind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5182">nx_udp_socket_unbind</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5183">Separa socket UDP dalla porta UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5183">Unbind UDP socket from UDP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5184">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5184">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_unbind(NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5185">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5185">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5186">Questo servizio rilascia l'associazione tra il socket UDP e una porta UDP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5186">This service releases the binding between the UDP socket and a UDP port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5187">Tutti i pacchetti ricevuti archiviati nella coda di ricezione vengono rilasciati come parte dell'operazione di annullamento dell'associazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5187">Any received packets stored in the receive queue are released as part of the unbind operation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5188">Se sono presenti altri thread in attesa di associare un altro socket alla porta non associata, il primo thread sospeso viene quindi associato alla porta appena non associata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5188">If there are other threads waiting to bind another socket to the unbound port, the first suspended thread is then bound to the newly unbound port.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5189">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5189">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5190">**socket_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza del socket UDP creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5190">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5191">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5191">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5192">La disassociazione del socket è riuscita **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5192">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket unbind.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5193">Il socket **NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) non è stato associato ad alcuna porta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5193">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket was not bound to any port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5194">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore al socket non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5194">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5195">Il chiamante **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) non è valido per il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5195">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5196">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) questo componente non è stato abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5196">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5197">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5197">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5198">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5198">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5199">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5199">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5200">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5200">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5201">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5201">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Unbind the previously bound UDP socket. */
status = nx_udp_socket_unbind(&udp_socket);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the previously bound socket is now
   unbound. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_source_extract"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5224">nx_udp_source_extract</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5224">nx_udp_source_extract</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5225">Estrarre IP e la porta di trasmissione dal datagramma UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5225">Extract IP and sending port from UDP datagram</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5226">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5226">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_source_extract(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG *ip_address, 
    UINT *port);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5227">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5227">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5228">Questo servizio estrae l'IP e il numero di porta del mittente dalle intestazioni IP e UDP del datagramma UDP fornito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5228">This service extracts the sender's IP and port number from the IP and UDP headers of the supplied UDP datagram.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5229">Si noti che il ***nxd_udp_source_extract*** del servizio funziona con i pacchetti di una rete IPv4 o IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5229">Note that the service ***nxd_udp_source_extract*** works with packets from either IPv4 or IPv6 network.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5230">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5230">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5231">**packet_ptr** Puntatore al pacchetto del datagramma UDP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5231">**packet_ptr** UDP datagram packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5232">**ip_address** Puntatore valido alla variabile dell'indirizzo IP restituito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5232">**ip_address** Valid pointer to the return IP address variable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5233">**porta** Puntatore valido alla variabile della porta restituita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5233">**port** Valid pointer to the return port variable.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5234">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5234">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5235">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) l'estrazione IP/porta di origine è riuscita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5235">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful source IP/port extraction.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5236">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0X12) il pacchetto fornito non è valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5236">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) The supplied packet is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5237">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) pacchetto non valido o destinazione IP o porta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5237">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid packet or IP or port destination.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5238">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5238">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5239">Inizializzazione, thread, timer, ISR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5239">Initialization, threads, timers, ISR</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5240">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5240">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5241">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5241">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5242">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5242">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Extract the IP and port information from the sender of the UPD packet. */
status = nx_udp_source_extract(packet_ptr, &sender_ip_address, &sender_port);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the sender IP and port information has been stored
   in sender_ip_address and sender_port respectively.*/
```

## <a name="nxd_icmp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5265">nxd_icmp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5265">nxd_icmp_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5266">Abilitare i servizi ICMPv4 e ICMPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5266">Enable ICMPv4 and ICMPv6 Services</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5267">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5267">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_icmp_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5268">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5268">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5269">Questo servizio Abilita sia i servizi ICMPv4 che ICMPv6 e può essere chiamato solo dopo la creazione dell'istanza IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5269">This service enables both ICMPv4 and ICMPv6 services and can only be called after the IP instance has been created.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5270">Il servizio può essere abilitato prima o dopo l'abilitazione di IPv6 (vedere *nxd_ipv6_enable*).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5270">The service can be enabled either before or after IPv6 is enabled (see *nxd_ipv6_enable*).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5271">I servizi ICMPv4 includono richiesta/risposta echo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5271">ICMPv4 services include Echo Request/Reply.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5272">I servizi ICMPv6 includono richieste/risposte echo, individuazione Neighbor, rilevamento di indirizzi duplicati, individuazione router e configurazione automatica degli indirizzi senza stato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5272">ICMPv6 services include Echo Request/Reply, Neighbor Discovery, Duplicate Address Detection, Router Discovery, and Stateless Address Auto-configuration.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5273">L'equivalente IPv4 in NetX è *nx_icmp_enable*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5273">The IPv4 equivalent in NetX is *nx_icmp_enable*.</span></span>

> [!NOTE] 
> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5274">*Se l'indirizzo IPv6 viene configurato manualmente prima di abilitare ICMPv6, il IPv6 configurato manualmente non è soggetto a un processo di rilevamento degli indirizzi duplicato*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5274">*If the IPv6 address is manually configured prior to enabling ICMPv6, the manually configured IPv6 is not subject to Duplicate Address Detection process*.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5275">*nx_icmp_enable* avvia i servizi ICMP solo per le operazioni IPv4.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5275">*nx_icmp_enable* starts ICMP services for IPv4 operations only.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5276">Le applicazioni che utilizzano i servizi ICMPv6 devono utilizzare *nxd_icmp_enable* anziché *nx_icmp_enable*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5276">Applications using ICMPv6 services must use *nxd_icmp_enable* instead of *nx_icmp_enable*.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5277">Per utilizzare la richiesta router IPv6 e la configurazione degli indirizzi automatici senza stato IPv6, è necessario abilitare ICMPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5277">To utilize IPv6 router solicitation and IPv6 stateless auto-address configuration, ICMPv6 must be enabled.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5281">I servizi ICMP **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) sono stati abilitati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5281">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ICMP services are successfully enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5282">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore IP non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5282">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5283">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questo servizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5283">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

```c
/* A status return of NX_SUCCESS indicates that the IP instance is
```

## <a name="nxd_icmp_ping"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5296">nxd_icmp_ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5296">nxd_icmp_ping</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5297">Eseguire richieste echo ICMPv4 o ICMPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5297">Perform ICMPv4 or ICMPv6 Echo Requests</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5298">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5298">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_icmp_ping(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    CHAR *data_ptr, 
    ULONG data_size,
    NX_PACKET **response_ptr, 
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5299">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5299">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5300">Questo servizio invia un pacchetto di richiesta echo ICMP tramite un'interfaccia fisica appropriata e attende una risposta echo dall'host di destinazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5300">This service sends out an ICMP Echo Request packet through an appropriate physical interface and waits for an Echo Reply from the destination host.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5301">NetX Duo determina l'interfaccia appropriata, in base all'indirizzo di destinazione, per l'invio del messaggio ping.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5301">NetX Duo determines the appropriate interface, based on the destination address, to send the ping message .</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5302">Le applicazioni devono utilizzare il ***nxd_icmp_source_ping*** di servizio per specificare l'interfaccia fisica e l'indirizzo IP di origine preciso da utilizzare per la trasmissione dei pacchetti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5302">Applications shall use the service ***nxd_icmp_source_ping*** to specify the physical interface and precise source IP address to use for packet transmission.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5303">È necessario che l'istanza IP sia stata creata e che i servizi ICMPv4/ICMPv6 siano abilitati. vedere ***nxd_icmp_enable***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5303">The IP instance must have been created, and the ICMPv4/ICMPv6 services must be enabled (see ***nxd_icmp_enable***).</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5304">Se viene restituito NX_SUCCESS, l'applicazione è responsabile del rilascio del pacchetto ricevuto dopo che non è più necessario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5304">If NX_SUCCESS is returned, the application is responsible for releasing the received packet after it is no longer needed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5305">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5305">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5306">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a istanza IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5306">**ip_ptr** Pointer to IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5307">**ip_address** Indirizzo IP di destinazione per il ping, in ordine byte host</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5307">**ip_address** Destination IP address to ping, in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5308">**DATA_PTR** Puntatore all'area dati del pacchetto ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5308">**data_ptr** Pointer to ping packet data area</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5309">**DATA_SIZE** Numero di byte di dati ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5309">**data_size** Number of bytes of ping data</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5310">**response_ptr** Puntatore al puntatore del pacchetto di risposta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5310">**response_ptr** Pointer to response packet Pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5311">**WAIT_OPTION** Tempo di attesa per una risposta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5311">**wait_option** Time to wait for a reply.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5312">Le opzioni di attesa sono definite come segue:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5312">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5313">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5313">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5314">**valore di timeout in cicli (da 0x00000001 a**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5314">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through</span></span> 
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5315">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** 0xfffffffe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5315">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5316">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5316">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5317">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) correttamente inviato e ricevuto ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5317">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful sent and received ping</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5318">Il protocollo IPv6 **NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) non è abilitato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5318">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 is not enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5319">I dati di ping **NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) superano il payload del pacchetto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5319">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Ping data exceeds packet payload</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5320">L'host di destinazione **NX_NO_RESPONSE** (0x29) non ha risposto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5320">**NX_NO_RESPONSE** (0x29) Destination host did not respond</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5321">La sospensione richiesta **NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) è stata interrotta da tx_thread_wait_abort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5321">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by tx_thread_wait_abort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5322">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0X50) non è possibile trovare un'interfaccia in uscita adatta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5322">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) No suitable outgoing interface can be found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5323">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) un puntatore IP o risposta non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5323">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or response pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5324">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questo servizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5324">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5325">Il componente **NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) IP o ICMP non è abilitato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5325">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) IP or ICMP component is not enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5326">Indirizzo IP di input **NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5326">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Input IP address is invalid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5327">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5327">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5328">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5328">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5329">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5329">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5330">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5330">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5331">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5331">Example</span></span>

```c
/* The following two examples illustrate how to use this API to send
   ping packets to IPv6 or IPv4 destinations. */

/* The first example: Send a ping packet to an IPv6 host
   2001:1234:5678::1 */
   
/* Declare variable address to hold the destination address. */
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;

char *buffer = “abcd”;
UINT prefix_length = 10;

/* Set the IPv6 address. */
ip_address.nxd_ip_address_version  = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0]    = 0x20011234;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1]    = 0x56780000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2]    = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3]    = 1;

status = nxd_icmp_ping(&ip_0, &ip_address, buffer,
                       strlen(buffer),&response_ptr,
                       NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

/* A return value of NX_SUCCESS indicates a ping reply has been
   received from IP address 2001:1234:5678::1 and the response
   packet is contained in the packet pointed to by response_ptr.It
   should have the same “abcd” four bytes of data. */

/* The second example: Send a ping packet to an IPv4 host 1.2.3.4 */

/* Program the IPv4 address. */
ip_address.nxd_ip_address_version  = NX_IP_VERSION_V4;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v4[0]    = 0x01020304;

status = nxd_icmp_ping(&ip_0, &ip_address, buffer,
                       strlen(buffer),&response_ptr, 10);

/* A return value of NX_SUCCESS indicates a ping reply was received
   from IP address 1.2.3.4 and the response packet is contained in
   the packet pointed to by response_ptr. It should have the same
   “abcd” four bytes of data. */
```

## <a name="nxd_icmp_source_ping"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5339">nxd_icmp_source_ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5339">nxd_icmp_source_ping</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5340">Eseguire richieste echo ICMPv4 o ICMPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5340">Perform ICMPv4 or ICMPv6 Echo Requests</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5341">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5341">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_icmp_source_ping(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    UINT address_index,
    CHAR *data_ptr, 
    ULONG data_size,
    NX_PACKET **response_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5342">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5342">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5343">Questo servizio invia un pacchetto di richiesta echo ICMP usando l'indice specificato di un indirizzo IPv4 o IPv6 e tramite l'interfaccia di rete a cui è associato l'indirizzo di origine e attende una risposta echo dall'host di destinazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5343">This service sends out an ICMP Echo Request packet using the specified index of an IPv4 or IPv6 address, and through the network interface the source address is associated with, and waits for an Echo Reply from the destination host.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5344">Questo servizio è compatibile con gli indirizzi IPv4 e IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5344">This service works with both IPv4 and IPv6 addresses.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5345">Il parametro *address_index* indica l'indirizzo IPv4 o IPv6 di origine da usare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5345">The parameter *address_index* indicates the source IPv4 or IPv6 address to use.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5346">Per l'indirizzo IPv4, il *address_index* è lo stesso indice dell'interfaccia di rete collegata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5346">For IPv4 address, the *address_index* is the same index to the attached network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5347">Per IPv6, il *address_index* indica la voce nella tabella degli indirizzi IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5347">For IPv6, the *address_index* indicates the entry in the IPv6 address table.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5348">È necessario che sia stata creata l'istanza IP ed è necessario abilitare i servizi ICMPv4 e ICMPv6 (vedere *nxd_icmp_enable*).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5348">The IP instance must have been created, and the ICMPv4 and ICMPv6 services must be enabled (see *nxd_icmp_enable*).</span></span>

> [!CAUTION] 
> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5349">*Se viene restituito NX_SUCCESS, l'applicazione è responsabile del rilascio del pacchetto ricevuto dopo che non è più necessario*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5349">*If NX_SUCCESS is returned, the application is responsible for releasing the received packet after it is no longer needed*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5350">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5350">Parameters</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5377">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5377">Example</span></span>

```c
/* The following two examples illustrate how to use this API to send ping
   packets to IPv6 or IPv4 destinations. */

/* The first example: Send a ping packet to an IPv6 host
   FE80::411:7B23:40dc:f181 */

/* Declare variable address to hold the destination address. */

#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
#define GLOBAL_IPv6_ADDRESS 1

NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;
char *buffer = “abcd”;
UINT prefix_length = 10;

/* Set the IPv6 address. */
ip_address.nxd_ip_address_version  = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0]    = 0xFE800000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1]    = 0x00000000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2]    = 0x04117B23;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3]    = 0x40DCF181;

status = nxd_icmp_source_ping(&ip_0, &ip_address,
                              GLOBAL_IPv6_ADDRESS,
                              buffer,
                              strlen(buffer),
                              &response_ptr,
                              NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

/* A return value of NX_SUCCESS indicates a ping reply has been received
   from IP address FE80::411:7B23:40dc:f181 and the response packet is
   contained in the packet pointed to by response_ptr. It should have the
   same “abcd” four bytes of data. */

/* The second example: Send a ping packet to an IPv4 host 1.2.3.4 */

/* Program the IPv4 address. */
ip_address.nxd_ip_address_version  = NX_IP_VERSION_V4;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v4       = 0x01020304;

status = nxd_icmp_source_ping(&ip_0, &ip_address,
                              PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                              buffer,
                              strlen(buffer),
                              &response_ptr,
                              NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

/* A return value of NX_SUCCESS indicates a ping reply was received from
   IP address 1.2.3.4 and the response packet is contained in the packet
   pointed to by response_ptr. It should have the same “abcd” four bytes
   of data. */
```

```c
VOID icmpv6_ra_flag_callback(NX_IP *ip_ptr, UINT ra_flag)
{
   /* RA flag has changed. The updated value is passed in via the
      ra_flag parameter. */
}

/* Configure the user-defined ICMPv6 RA flag change callback
   function. */

                                         icmpv6_ra_flag_callback);

   been successfully configured. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ip_raw_packet_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5411">nxd_ip_raw_packet_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5411">nxd_ip_raw_packet_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5412">Invia pacchetto IP non elaborato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5412">Send Raw IP Packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5413">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5413">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ip_raw_packet_send(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *destination
    ULONG protocol, 
    UINT ttl, 
    ULONG tos);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5414">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5414">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5415">Questo servizio invia un pacchetto IPv4 o IPv6 non elaborato (nessuna intestazione del protocollo del livello di trasporto).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5415">This service sends a raw IPv4 or IPv6 packet (no transport-layer protocol headers).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5416">In un sistema multihome, se il sistema non è in grado di determinare un'interfaccia appropriata (ad esempio, se l'indirizzo IP di destinazione è broadcast IPv4, multicast o indirizzo multicast IPv6), viene selezionato il dispositivo primario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5416">On a multihome system, if the system is unable to determine an appropriate interface (for example, if the destination IP address is IPv4 broadcast, multicast or IPv6 multicast address), the primary device is selected.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5417">Il servizio \***nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send** _ può essere usato per specificare un'interfaccia in uscita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5417">The service \***nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send** _ can be used to specify an outgoing interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5418">L'equivalente NetX è _ *_nx_ip_raw_packet_send_.*\*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5418">The NetX equivalent is _ *_nx_ip_raw_packet_send_.*\*</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5419">È necessario che l'istanza IP sia stata creata in precedenza e che la gestione dei pacchetti IP non elaborati sia abilitata usando il servizio ***nx_ip_raw_packet_enable*** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5419">The IP instance must be previously created and raw IP packet handling must be enabled using the ***nx_ip_raw_packet_enable*** service.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5420">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5420">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5421">**ip_ptr** Puntatore all'istanza IP creata in precedenza</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5421">**ip_ptr** Pointer to the previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5422">**packet_ptr** Puntatore al pacchetto da trasmettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5422">**packet_ptr** Pointer to packet to transmit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5423">**destination_ip** Puntatore all'indirizzo di destinazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5423">**destination_ip** Pointer to destination address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5424">**protocollo** di Protocollo Packet archiviato nell'intestazione IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5424">**protocol** Packet protocol stored to the IP header</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5425">valore **TTL** Valore per TTL o limite hop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5425">**ttl** Value for TTL or hop limit</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5430">Gestione degli indirizzi IP non elaborati **NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) non abilitata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5430">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Raw IP handling not enabled</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5435">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questo servizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5435">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5436">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (irreversibile 0x4D) non è un input di indirizzo IPv6 valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5436">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Not valid IPv6 address input</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5441">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5441">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS dest_address;

/* Set the destination address,in this case an IPv6 address. */
dest_address.nxd_ip_address_version  = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
dest_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0]    = 0x20011234;
dest_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1]    = 0x56780000;
dest_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2]    = 0;
dest_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3]    = 1;

UINT ttl, tos;

ttl = 128;

tos = 0;

/* Enable RAW IP handling on the previously created IP instance.*/
status = nx_raw_ip_packet_enable(&ip_0);

/* Allocate a packet pointed to by packet_ptr from the IP packet
   pool. */
/* Then transmit the packet to the destination address. */

status = nxd_ip_raw_packet_send(&ip_0, packet_ptr, dest_address,
                                NX_PROTOCOL_UDP, ttl, tos);

/* A status return of NX_SUCCESS indicates the packet was
   successfully transmitted. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5451">nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5451">nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5452">Invia pacchetto RAW usando l'indirizzo di origine specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5452">Send raw packet using specified source address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5453">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5453">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *destination_ip,
    UINT address_index,
    ULONG protocol,
    UINT ttl,
    ULONG tos);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5454">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5454">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5455">Questo servizio invia un pacchetto IPv4 o IPv6 non elaborato utilizzando l'indirizzo IPv4 o IPv6 specificato come indirizzo di origine.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5455">This service sends a raw IPv4 or IPv6 packet using the specified IPv4 or IPv6 address as source address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5456">Questo servizio viene in genere usato in un sistema multihome, se il sistema non è in grado di determinare un'interfaccia appropriata (ad esempio, se l'indirizzo IP di destinazione è broadcast IPv4, multicast o indirizzo multicast IPv6).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5456">This service is typically used on a multihome system, if the system is unable to determine an appropriate interface (for example, if the destination IP address is IPv4 broadcast, multicast or IPv6 multicast address).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5457">Il parametro *address_index* consente all'applicazione di specificare l'indirizzo di origine da usare per l'invio di questo pacchetto non elaborato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5457">The parameter *address_index* allows the application to specify the source address to use when sending this raw packet.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5458">È necessario che l'istanza IP sia stata creata in precedenza e che la gestione dei pacchetti IP non elaborati sia abilitata usando il servizio ***nx_ip_raw_packet_enable*** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5458">The IP instance must be previously created and raw IP packet handling must be enabled using the ***nx_ip_raw_packet_enable*** service.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5459">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5459">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5460">**ip_ptr** Puntatore istanza IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5460">**ip_ptr** IP instance pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5461">**packet_ptr** Puntatore al pacchetto da inviare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5461">**packet_ptr** Pointer to packet to send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5462">**destination_ip** Indirizzo IP di destinazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5462">**destination_ip** Destination IP address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5463">**address_index** Indice agli indirizzi IPv4 o IPv6 da utilizzare come indirizzo di origine.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5463">**address_index** Index to the IPv4 or IPv6 addresses to use as source address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5464">**protocollo** di Valore per il campo protocollo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5464">**protocol** Value for the protocol field</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5465">valore **TTL** Valore per TTL o limite hop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5465">**ttl** Value for ttl or hop limit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5466">**TOS** Valore per TOS o classe di traffico e etichetta di flusso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5466">**tos** Value for tos or traffic class and flow label</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5467">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5467">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5468">Il pacchetto di **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) viene inviato correttamente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5468">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Packet is sent successfully</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5469">Lo spazio di **NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) non è sufficiente per l'intestazione IPv4 o IPv6 nel pacchetto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5469">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Not enough room for IPv4 or IPv6 header in the packet</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5470">Puntatore di aggiunta pacchetto di **NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5470">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Packet append pointer is invalid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5471">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore non valido a un blocco di controllo IP, a un pacchetto o a destination_ip</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5471">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer to IP control block, packet, or destination_ip</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5472">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questo servizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5472">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5473">Elaborazione non elaborata di **NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) non abilitata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5473">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Raw processing not enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5474">Errore di indirizzo **NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5474">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Address error</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5475">Indice di interfaccia **NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0X4C) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5475">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid interface index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5476">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (irreversibile 0x4D) non è un input di indirizzo IPv6 valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5476">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Not valid IPv6 address input</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5477">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5477">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5478">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5478">Thread</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5479">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5479">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5480">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5480">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5481">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5481">Example</span></span>

```c
#define SOURCE_ADDRESS_INDEX 2

/* Send a raw packet from specified interface. */
status = nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send(&ip_0, packet_ptr,
                                       dest_ip,
                                       SOURCE_ADDRESS_INDEX,
                                       NX_IP_RAW,
                                       NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE,
                                       NX_IP_NORMAL);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, raw packet has been sent out on the
   specified interface. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_address_change_notify"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5491">nxd_ipv6_address_change_notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5491">nxd_ipv6_address_change_notify</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5492">Imposta notifica modifica indirizzo IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5492">Set ipv6 address change notify</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5493">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5493">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_address_change_notify(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    VOID (*ip_address_change_notify)(NX_IP *, UINT, UINT, UINT, ULONG *));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5494">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5494">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5495">Questo servizio registra una routine di callback dell'applicazione che NetX Duo chiama ogni volta che viene modificato l'indirizzo IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5495">This service registers an application callback routine that NetX Duo calls whenever the IPv6 Address is changed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5496">Questo servizio è disponibile se viene compilata la libreria NetX Duo è l'opzione ***NX_ENABLE_IPV6_ADDRESS_CHANGE_NOTIFY*** definita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5496">This service is available if the NetX Duo library is built is the option ***NX_ENABLE_IPV6_ADDRESS_CHANGE_NOTIFY*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5497">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5497">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5498">**ip_ptr** Puntatore del blocco di controllo IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5498">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5499">**ip_address_change_notify** Funzione di callback dell'applicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5499">**ip_address_change_notify** Application callback function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5500">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5500">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5501">Set di **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5501">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5502">La funzionalità di notifica delle modifiche degli indirizzi IPv6 **NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) non è integrata nella libreria NETX Duo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5502">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 address change notify feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5503">Puntatore a blocco di controllo IP **NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5503">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5504">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questo servizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5504">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5505">La notifica della modifica dell'indirizzo IPv6 **NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) non è compilata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5505">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) IPv6 address change notify is not compiled</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5506">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5506">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5507">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5507">Thread</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5508">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5508">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5509">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5509">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5510">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5510">Example</span></span>

```c
VOID ip_address_change_notify(NX_IP *ip_ptr, UINT status,
                              UINT interface_index,
                              UINT address_index,
                              ULONG *ip_address)
{

   /* Do something when ip address changed. */
}

void ip_address_thread_entry(ULONG id)
{

   /* Set the ip address change notify of IP instance. */
   status = nxd_ipv6_address_change_notify (&ip_0, ip_address_change_notify);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the ip address change notify of IP
   instance was successfully set. */
}
```
