## <a name="nxd_ipv6_address_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5535">nxd_ipv6_address_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5535">nxd_ipv6_address_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5536">Elimina indirizzo IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5536">Delete IPv6 Address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5537">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5537">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_address_delete(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    UINT address_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5538">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5538">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5539">Questo servizio Elimina l'indirizzo IPv6 in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato nella tabella degli indirizzi IPv6 dell'istanza IP specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5539">This service deletes the IPv6 address at the specified index in the IPv6 address table of the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5540">Nessun NetX equivalente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5540">There is no NetX equivalent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5541">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5541">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5542">**ip_ptr** Puntatore all'istanza IP creata in precedenza</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5542">**ip_ptr** Pointer to the previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5543">**address_index** Tabella degli indirizzi IPv6 dell'istanza IP da indicizzare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5543">**address_index** Index to IP instance IPv6 address table</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5544">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5544">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5545">L'indirizzo **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) è stato eliminato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5545">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Address successfully deleted</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5546">La funzionalità IPv6 **NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) non è integrata nella libreria NETX Duo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5546">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5547">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0X50) non è possibile trovare un'interfaccia in uscita appropriata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5547">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) No suitable outgoing interface can be found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5548">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore IP non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5548">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5549">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questo servizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5549">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5550">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5550">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5551">Inizializzazione, thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5551">Initialization, Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5552">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5552">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5553">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5553">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5554">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5554">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;
UINT        address_index;

/* Delete the IPv6 address at the specified address table index. */
address_index = 1;
status = nxd_ipv6_address_delete(&ip_0, address_index);

/* A status return of NX_SUCCESS indicates that the IP instance
   address is successfully deleted. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_address_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5579">nxd_ipv6_address_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5579">nxd_ipv6_address_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5580">Recuperare l'indirizzo e il prefisso IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5580">Retrieve IPv6 Address and Prefix</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5581">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5581">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_address_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    UINT address_index, 
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    ULONG *prefix_length,
    UINT *interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5582">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5582">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5583">Questo servizio recupera l'indirizzo IPv6 e il prefisso in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato nella tabella degli indirizzi dell'istanza IP specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5583">This service retrieves the IPv6 address and prefix at the specified index in the address table of the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5584">Nell'indicatore di *interface_index* viene restituito l'indice dell'interfaccia fisica a cui è associato l'indirizzo IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5584">The index of the physical interface the IPv6 address is associated with is returned in the *interface_index* pointer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5585">I servizi equivalenti NetX sono \***nx_ip_address_get** _ e _ *_nx_ip_interface_address_get_* \*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5585">The NetX equivalent services are ***nx_ip_address_get** _ and _*_nx_ip_interface_address_get_\*\*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5586">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5586">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5587">**ip_ptr** Puntatore all'istanza IP creata in precedenza</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5587">**ip_ptr** Pointer to the previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5588">**address_index** Tabella degli indirizzi dell'istanza IP da indicizzare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5588">**address_index** Index to IP instance address table</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5589">**ip_address** Puntatore all'indirizzo da impostare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5589">**ip_address** Pointer to the address to set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5590">**Prefix_Length** Lunghezza del prefisso dell'indirizzo (subnet mask)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5590">**prefix_length** Length of the address prefix (subnet mask)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5591">**interface_index** Puntatore all'indice dell'interfaccia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5591">**interface_index** Pointer to the index of the interface</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5592">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5592">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5593">L'abilitazione di **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) IPv6 è stata completata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5593">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) IPv6 is successfully enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5594">La funzionalità IPv6 **NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) non è integrata nella libreria NETX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5594">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5595">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0X50) nessun indirizzo di interfaccia o address_index non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5595">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) No interface address, or invalid address_index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5596">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore IP non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5596">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5597">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questo servizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5597">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5598">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5598">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5599">Inizializzazione, thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5599">Initialization, Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5600">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5600">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5601">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5601">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5602">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5602">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;
UINT        address_index;
ULONG       prefix_length;
UINT        interface_index;

/* Get the IPv6 address at the specified address table index. If
   found, the address network interface is returned in the
   interface_index input, as well as the address prefix in the
   prefix_length input. */

address_index = 1;
status = nxd_ipv6_address_get(&ip_0, address_index, &ip_address,
                              &prefix_length, &interface_index);

/* A status return of NX_SUCCESS indicates that the IP instance
   address is successfully retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_address_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5627">nxd_ipv6_address_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5627">nxd_ipv6_address_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5628">Imposta indirizzo e prefisso IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5628">Set IPv6 Address and Prefix</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5629">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5629">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_address_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    UINT interface_index,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    ULONG prefix_length,
    UINT *address_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5630">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5630">Description</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5635">**ip_ptr** Puntatore all'istanza IP creata in precedenza</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5635">**ip_ptr** Pointer to the previously created IP instance</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5637">**ip_address** Puntatore all'indirizzo da impostare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5637">**ip_address** Pointer to the address to set</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5641">L'abilitazione di **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) IPv6 è stata completata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5641">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) IPv6 is successfully enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5642">La tabella di indirizzi IP **NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x15) è piena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5642">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x15) IP address table is full</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5643">La funzionalità IPv6 **NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) non è integrata nella libreria NETX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5643">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5644">**NX_DUPLICATED_ENTRY** (0X52) l'indirizzo IP specificato è già in uso in questa istanza IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5644">**NX_DUPLICATED_ENTRY** (0x52) The supplied IP address is already used on this IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5645">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore IP non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5645">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5646">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questo servizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5646">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5647">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) indirizzo IPv6 non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5647">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IPv6 address</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5649">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5649">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5653">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5653">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;
UINT        address_index;
UINT        interface_index;

ip_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0] = 0x20010000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1] = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2] = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3] = 1;

/* First create an IP instance with packet pool, source address, and
   driver.*/
status = nx_ip_create(&ip_0, "NetX IP Instance 0",
                     IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,4),
                     0xFFFFFF00UL, &pool_0,_nx_ram_network_driver,
                     pointer, 2048, 1);

/* Then enable IPv6 on the IP instance. */
status = nxd_ipv6_enable(&ip_0);

/* Set the IPv6 address (a global address as indicated by the 64 bit
   prefix) using the IPv6 address just created on the primary device
   (index zero). The index into the address table is returned in
   address_index. */
interface_index = 0;
status = nxd_ipv6_address_set(&ip_0, interface_index, &ip_address,
                              64,&address_index);

/* A status return of NX_SUCCESS indicates that the IPv6 address is
   successfully assigned to the primary interface (interface 0). */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_default_router_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5678">nxd_ipv6_default_router_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5678">nxd_ipv6_default_router_add</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5679">Aggiungere un router IPv6 alla tabella router predefinita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5679">Add an IPv6 Router to Default Router Table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5680">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5680">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_default_router_add(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *router_address,
    ULONG router_lifetime,
    UINT index_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5681">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5681">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5682">Questo servizio aggiunge un router predefinito IPv6 nell'interfaccia fisica specificata alla tabella router predefinita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5682">This service adds an IPv6 default router on the specified physical interface to the default router table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5683">Il servizio NetX IPv4 equivalente è ***nx_ip_gateway_address_set***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5683">The equivalent NetX IPv4 service is ***nx_ip_gateway_address_set***.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5684">*router_address* deve puntare a un indirizzo IPv6 valido e il router deve essere direttamente accessibile dall'interfaccia fisica specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5684">*router_address* must point to a valid IPv6 address, and the router must be directly accessible from the specified physical interface.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5685">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5685">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5686">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a istanza IP creata in precedenza</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5686">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5687">**router_address** Puntatore all'indirizzo del router predefinito, nell'ordine dei byte dell'host</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5687">**router_address** Pointer to the default router address, in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5688">**router_lifetime** Tempo di vita del router predefinito, in secondi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5688">**router_lifetime** Default router life time, in seconds.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5689">I valori validi sono:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5689">Valid values are:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5690">**0xFFFF:** Nessun timeout</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5690">**0xFFFF:** No time out</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5691">**0-0xFFFE:** Valore di timeout, in secondi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5691">**0-0xFFFE:** Timeout value, in seconds</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5692">**index_index** Puntatore alla posizione di memoria valida per l'indice dell'indice di rete tramite il quale è possibile raggiungere il router</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5692">**index_index** Pointer to the valid memory location for the network index index through which the router can be reached</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5693">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5693">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5694">Il router predefinito **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) è stato aggiunto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5694">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Default router is successfully added</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5695">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) non sono più presenti voci nella tabella router predefinita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5695">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) No more entries available in the default router table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5696">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) indirizzo IPv6 non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5696">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5697">La funzionalità IPv6 **NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) non è integrata nella libreria NETX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5697">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5698">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (irreversibile 0x4D) non è un input di indirizzo IPv6 valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5698">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Not valid IPv6 address input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5699">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) un'istanza IP o uno spazio di archiviazione non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5699">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance or storage space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5700">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questo servizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5700">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5701">Indice dell'interfaccia router **NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0X4C) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5701">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid router interface index</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5702">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5702">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5703">Inizializzazione, thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5703">Initialization, Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5704">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5704">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5705">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5705">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5706">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5706">Example</span></span>

```c
/* This example adds a default router for the primary interface at
   fe80::1219:B9FF:FE37:ac to the default router table. */

#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0

NXD_ADDRESS router_address;

/* Set the router address version to IPv6 */
router_address.nxd_ip_version   = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;

/* Set the IPv6 address, in host byte order. */
router_address.nxd_ip_address[0] = 0xfe800000;
router_address.nxd_ip_address[1] = 0x0;
router_address.nxd_ip_address[2] = 0x1219B9FF;
router_address.nxd_ip_address[3] = 0xFE3700AC;

/* Set IPv6 default router. */
status = nxd_ipv6_default_router_add(ip_ptr, &router_address,
                                     0xFFFF, PRIMARY_INTERFACE);

/* Unless invalid pointer input is detected by the error checking
   Service, status return is always NX_SUCCESS. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_default_router_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5718">nxd_ipv6_default_router_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5718">nxd_ipv6_default_router_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5719">Rimuovi router IPv6 dalla tabella router predefinita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5719">Remove IPv6 Router from Default Router Table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5720">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5720">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_default_router_delete (
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *router_address);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5721">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5721">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5722">Questo servizio Elimina un router predefinito IPv6 dalla tabella router predefinita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5722">This service deletes an IPv6 default router from the default router table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5723">Il servizio NetX IPv4 equivalente è ***nx_ip_gateway_address_clear***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5723">The equivalent NetX IPv4 service is ***nx_ip_gateway_address_clear***.</span></span>

### <a name="restrictions"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5724">Restrizioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5724">Restrictions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5725">L'istanza IP è stata creata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5725">The IP instance has been created.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5726">*router_address* necessario puntare a informazioni valide.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5726">*router_address* must point to valid information.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5727">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5727">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5728">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a un'istanza IP creata in precedenza</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5728">**ip_ptr** Pointer to a previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5729">**router_address** Puntatore all'indirizzo gateway predefinito IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5729">**router_address** Pointer to the IPv6 default gateway address</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5730">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5730">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5731">Il router **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) è stato eliminato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5731">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Router successfully deleted</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5732">La funzionalità IPv6 **NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) non è integrata nella libreria NETX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5732">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5733">**NX_NOT_FOUND** (0x4E) Impossibile trovare la voce del router</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5733">**NX_NOT_FOUND** (0x4E) The router entry cannot be found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5734">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) un'istanza IP o uno spazio di archiviazione non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5734">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance or storage space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5735">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questo servizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5735">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5736">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x82) non è stato inserito alcun puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5736">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x82) Invalid non pointer input</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5737">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5737">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5738">Inizializzazione, thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5738">Initialization, Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5739">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5739">Preemption Possible</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5741">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5741">Example</span></span>

```c
/*This example removes a default router:fe80::1219:B9FF:FE37:ac */

NXD_ADDRESS router_address;

/* Set the router_address version to IPv6 */
router_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;

/* Program the IPv6 address, in host byte order. */
router_address.nxd_ip_address[0] = 0xfe800000;
router_address.nxd_ip_address[1] = 0x0;
router_address.nxd_ip_address[2] = 0x1219B9FF;
router_address.nxd_ip_address[3] = 0xFE3700AC;

/* Delete the IPv6 default router. */
nxd_ipv6_default_router_delete(ip_ptr, &router_address);
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_default_router_entry_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5761">nxd_ipv6_default_router_entry_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5761">nxd_ipv6_default_router_entry_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5762">Ottieni voce router predefinita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5762">Get default router entry</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5763">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5763">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_default_router_entry_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    UINT entry_index,
    NXD_ADDRESS *router_addr,
    ULONG *router_lifetime,
    ULONG *prefix_length,
    ULONG *configuration_method);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5764">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5764">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5765">Questo servizio recupera una voce del router dalla tabella di routing IPv6 predefinita collegata a un dispositivo di rete specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5765">This service retrieves a router entry from the default IPv6 routing table that is attached to a specified network device.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5766">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5766">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5767">**ip_ptr** Puntatore del blocco di controllo IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5767">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5768">**interface_index** Indice dell'interfaccia di rete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5768">**interface_index** Index of the network interface</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5769">**entry_index** Indice voce</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5769">**entry_index** Entry Index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5770">**router_addr** Indirizzo IPv6 router</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5770">**router_addr** Router IPv6 Address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5771">**router_lifetime** Puntatore alla durata del router</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5771">**router_lifetime** Pointer to router life time</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5772">**Prefix_Length** Puntatore alla lunghezza del prefisso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5772">**prefix_length** Pointer to prefix length</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5773">**configuration_method** Puntatore alle informazioni sul modo in cui è stata configurata la voce</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5773">**configuration_method** Pointer to the information on how the entry was configured</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5774">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5774">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5775">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Get riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5775">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5776">Impossibile trovare la voce del router **NX_NOT_FOUND** (0x4E)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5776">**NX_NOT_FOUND** (0x4E) Router entry not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5777">Indice dell'interfaccia **NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5777">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5778">Puntatore a blocco di controllo IP **NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5778">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5779">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questo servizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5779">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5780">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5780">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5781">Inizializzazione, thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5781">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5782">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5782">Preemption Possible</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5784">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5784">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
NXD_ADDRESS            router_addr;
ULONG                  router_lifetime;
ULONG                  prefix_length;
ULONG                  configuration_method;

/* Get the router entry of specified interface. */
status = nxd_ipv6_default_router_entry_get (&ip_0,
                                            PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                            entry_index,
                                            &router_addr,
                                            &router_lifetime,
                                            &prefix_length,
                                            &configuration_method);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the router entry was successfully
   got. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_default_router_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5796">nxd_ipv6_default_router_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5796">nxd_ipv6_default_router_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5797">Recuperare un router IPv6 dalla tabella router predefinita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5797">Retrieve an IPv6 Router from Default Router Table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5798">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5798">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_default_router_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    UINT interface_index
    NXD_ADDRESS *router_address,
    ULONG *router_lifetime,
    ULONG *prefix_length);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5799">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5799">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5800">Questo servizio recupera un indirizzo del router predefinito IPv6, la durata e la lunghezza del prefisso nell'interfaccia fisica specificata dalla tabella router predefinita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5800">This service retrieves an IPv6 default router address, lifetime and prefix length on the specified physical interface from the default router table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5801">Il servizio NetX IPv4 equivalente è \*\**nx_ip_gateway_address_get *.**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5801">The equivalent NetX IPv4 service is \***nx_ip_gateway_address_get\*.**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5802">*router_address* deve puntare a una struttura NXD_ADDRESS valida, in modo che il servizio possa inserire l'indirizzo IPv6 del router predefinito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5802">*router_address* must point to a valid NXD_ADDRESS structure, so this service can fill in the IPv6 address of the default router.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5803">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5803">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5804">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a istanza IP creata in precedenza</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5804">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5805">**interface_index** Indice dell'interfaccia di rete accessibile dal router</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5805">**interface_index** The index to the network interface that the router is accessible through</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5806">**router_address** Puntatore allo spazio di archiviazione per il valore restituito dell'indirizzo del router predefinito, nell'ordine dei byte dell'host.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5806">**router_address** Pointer to the storage space for the return value of the default router address, in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5807">**router_lifetime** Puntatore alla durata del router</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5807">**router_lifetime** Pointer to the router lifetime</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5808">**Prefix_Length** Puntatore alla lunghezza del prefisso dell'indirizzo del router</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5808">**prefix_length** Pointer to the router address prefix length</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5809">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5809">Return Values</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5820">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5820">Example</span></span>

```c
/* This example retrieves a default router for the primary device
   from the default router table. */

#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0

NXD_ADDRESS router_address;
ULONG       router_lifetime;
ULONG       prefix_length;

/* Get IPv6 default router. */
status = nxd_ipv6_default_router_get(ip_ptr, PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                     &router_address,
                                     &router_lifetime,
                                     &prefix_length);

/* If status returns NX_SUCCESS, the router address and related
   information is returned successfully. */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5864">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5864">Prototype</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5866">Questo servizio Disabilita il protocollo IPv6 per l'istanza IP specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5866">This service disables the IPv6 for the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5867">Cancella inoltre la tabella dei router predefinita, la cache ND e la tabella degli indirizzi IPv6, lascia tutti i gruppi multicast e reimposta le variabili di richiesta router.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5867">It also clears the default router table, ND cache and IPv6 address table, leaves the all multicast groups, and resets the router solicitation variables.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5868">Questo servizio non ha alcun effetto se IPv6 non è abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5868">This service has no effect if IPv6 is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5909">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5909">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5910">Questo servizio Abilita i servizi IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5910">This service enables IPv6 services.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5911">Quando i servizi IPv6 sono abilitati, l'istanza IP viene aggiunta al gruppo multicast tutti i nodi (FF02:: 1).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5911">When the IPv6 services are enabled, the IP instance joins the all-node multicast group (FF02::1).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5912">Questo servizio non imposta l'indirizzo locale o l'indirizzo globale del collegamento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5912">This service does not set the link local address or global address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5913">Le applicazioni devono usare *nxd_ipv6_address_set* per configurare gli indirizzi di rete del dispositivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5913">Applications should use *nxd_ipv6_address_set* to configure the device network addresses.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5914">Nessun NetX equivalente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5914">There is no NetX equivalent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5915">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5915">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5916">**ip_ptr** Puntatore all'istanza IP creata in precedenza</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5916">**ip_ptr** Pointer to the previously created IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5917">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5917">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5918">L'abilitazione di **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) IPv6 è stata completata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5918">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) IPv6 is successfully enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5919">Il protocollo IPv6 **NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) è già abilitato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5919">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) IPv6 is already enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5920">La funzionalità IPv6 **NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) non è integrata nella libreria NETX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5920">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5921">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore IP non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5921">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5922">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questo servizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5922">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5927">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5927">Example</span></span>

```c
/* First create an IP instance with packet pool, source address, and
   driver.*/
status = nx_ip_create(&ip_0, "NetX IP Instance 0",
                      IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,4),
                      0xFFFFFF00UL, &pool_0,_nx_ram_network_driver,
                      pointer, 2048, 1);

/* Then enable IPv6 on the IP instance. */
status = nxd_ipv6_enable(&ip_0);

/* A status return of NX_SUCCESS indicates that the IP instance is
   enabled for IPv6 services. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_join"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5952">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_join</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5952">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_join</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5953">Unisciti a un gruppo multicast IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5953">Join an IPv6 multicast group</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5954">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5954">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_join(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *group_address,
    UINT interface_index);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5955">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5955">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5956">Questo servizio consente a un'applicazione di aggiungere un indirizzo multicast IPv6 specifico in un'interfaccia di rete specifica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5956">This service allows an application to join a specific IPv6 multicast address on a specific network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5957">Al driver del collegamento viene inviata una notifica per aggiungere l'indirizzo multicast.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5957">The link driver is notified to add the multicast address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5958">Questo servizio è disponibile se la libreria NetX Duo viene compilata con l'opzione ***NX_ENABLE_IPV6_MULTICAST*** definita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5958">This service is available if the NetX Duo library is built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_IPV6_MULTICAST*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5959">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5959">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5960">**ip_ptr** Puntatore istanza IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5960">**ip_ptr** IP instance pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5961">**group_address** Indirizzo multicast IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5961">**group_address** IPv6 multicast address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5962">**interface_index** Indice dell'interfaccia di rete associata al gruppo multicast</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5962">**interface_index** The index to the network interface associated with the multicast group</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5963">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5963">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5964">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) consente di ricevere correttamente l'indirizzo multicast IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5964">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully enables receiving on IPv6 multicast address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5965">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) non sono presenti altre voci nella tabella multicast IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5965">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) No more entries in the IPv6 multicast table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5966">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0X03) non sono più disponibili indirizzi di gruppo nel driver di dispositivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5966">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) No more group addresses available in the device driver</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5967">La funzionalità IPv6 **NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) o la funzionalità multicast IPv6 non è integrata nella libreria NETX Duo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5967">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature or IPv6 multicast feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5968">Puntatore a blocco di controllo IP **NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5968">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5969">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questo servizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5969">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5970">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) indirizzo IPv6 non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5970">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5971">Indice dell'interfaccia **NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5971">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5972">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5972">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5973">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5973">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5974">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5974">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5975">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5975">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5976">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5976">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0

/* Join multicast group on this IP instance. */
status = nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_join(&ip_0,
                                           &group_address,
                                           PRIMARY_INTERFACE);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, interface of index on IP instance
   has joined the multicast group. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5988">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5988">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5989">Lascia un gruppo multicast IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5989">Leave an IPv6 multicast group</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5990">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5990">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *group_address,
    UINT interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5991">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5991">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5992">Questo servizio rimuove l'indirizzo multicast IPv6 specifico dal dispositivo di rete specifico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5992">This service removes the specific IPv6 multicast address from the specific network device.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5993">Al driver del collegamento viene inoltre notificata la rimozione dell'indirizzo multicast IPv6. Questo servizio è disponibile se la libreria NetX Duo viene compilata con l'opzione ***NX_ENABLE_IPV6_MULTICAST*** definita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5993">The link driver is also notified of the removal of the IPv6 multicast address.This service is available if the NetX Duo library is built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_IPV6_MULTICAST*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5994">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5994">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5995">**ip_ptr** Puntatore istanza IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5995">**ip_ptr** IP instance pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5996">**group_address** Indirizzo multicast IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5996">**group_address** IPv6 multicast address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5997">**interface_index** Indice dell'interfaccia di rete associata al gruppo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5997">**interface_index** The index to the network interface associated with group</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5998">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5998">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-5999">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) uscita multicast riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-5999">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multicast leave</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6000">Voce **NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) non trovata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6000">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Entry not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6001">La funzionalità IPv6 **NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) o la funzionalità multicast IPv6 non è integrata nella libreria NETX Duo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6001">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature or IPv6 multicast feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6002">Puntatore a blocco di controllo IP **NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6002">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6003">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questo servizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6003">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6004">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) indirizzo IPv6 non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6004">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6005">Indice dell'interfaccia **NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6005">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6023">nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6023">nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_disable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6024">Disabilitare la configurazione automatica degli indirizzi senza stato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6024">Disable stateless address autoconfiguration</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6025">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6025">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_disable(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6026">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6026">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6027">Questo servizio Disabilita la funzionalità di configurazione automatica degli indirizzi senza stato IPv6 in un dispositivo di rete specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6027">This service disables the IPv6 stateless address auto configuration feature on a specified network device.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6028">Non ha alcun effetto se l'indirizzo IPv6 è stato configurato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6028">It has no effect if the IPv6 address has been configured.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6029">Questo servizio è disponibile se la libreria NetX Duo viene compilata con l'opzione ***NX_IPV6_STATELESS_AUTOCONFIG_CONTROL*** definita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6029">This service is available if the NetX Duo library is built with the option ***NX_IPV6_STATELESS_AUTOCONFIG_CONTROL*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6030">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6030">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6031">**ip_ptr** Puntatore istanza IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6031">**ip_ptr** IP instance pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6032">**interface_index** Indice dell'interfaccia di rete che la configurazione automatica dell'indirizzo senza stato IPv6 deve essere disabilitata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6032">**interface_index** The index to the network interface that the IPv6 stateless address autoconfiguration should be disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6033">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6033">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6034">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Disabilita la funzionalità di configurazione autocompleta degli indirizzi senza stato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6034">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully disables stateless address autoconfigure feature.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6035">La funzionalità IPv6 **NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) o la funzionalità di controllo della configurazione automatica degli indirizzi senza stato IPv6 non è integrata nella libreria NETX Duo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6035">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature or IPv6 stateless address autoconfig control feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6036">Indice dell'interfaccia **NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6036">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6037">Puntatore a blocco di controllo IP **NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6037">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6038">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questo servizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6038">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6039">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6039">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6040">Inizializzazione, thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6040">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6041">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6041">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6042">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6042">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6043">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6043">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0

/* Disable stateless address auto configuration on this IP instance. */
status = nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_disable(&ip_0,
                                                       PRIMARY_INTERFACE);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, disables stateless address auto
   configuration on IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6068">nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6068">nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6069">Abilitare la configurazione automatica degli indirizzi senza stato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6069">Enable stateless address autoconfiguration</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6070">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6070">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_enable(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6071">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6071">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6072">Questo servizio Abilita la funzionalità di configurazione automatica degli indirizzi senza stato IPv6 in un dispositivo di rete specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6072">This service enables the IPv6 stateless address auto configuration feature on a specified network device.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6073">Questo servizio è disponibile se la libreria NetX Duo viene compilata con l'opzione ***NX_IPV6_STATELESS_AUTOCONFIG_CONTROL*** definita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6073">This service is available if the NetX Duo library is built with the option ***NX_IPV6_STATELESS_AUTOCONFIG_CONTROL*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6074">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6074">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6075">**ip_ptr** Puntatore istanza IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6075">**ip_ptr** IP instance pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6076">**interface_index** Indice dell'interfaccia di rete che deve essere abilitata per la configurazione automatica dell'indirizzo senza stato IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6076">**interface_index** The index to the network interface that the IPv6 stateless address autoconfiguration should be enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6077">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6077">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6078">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) consente la funzionalità di configurazione automatica degli indirizzi senza stato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6078">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully enables stateless address autoconfig feature.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6079">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0X15) già abilitata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6079">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) Already enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6080">La funzionalità IPv6 **NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) o la funzionalità di controllo della configurazione automatica degli indirizzi senza stato IPv6 non è integrata nella libreria NETX Duo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6080">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature or IPv6 stateless address autoconfig control feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6081">Indice dell'interfaccia **NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6081">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6082">Puntatore a blocco di controllo IP **NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6082">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6083">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questo servizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6083">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6084">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6084">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6085">Inizializzazione, thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6085">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6086">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6086">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6087">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6087">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6088">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6088">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE

/* Enable stateless address auto configuration on this
   IP instance. */

                                                      PRIMARY_INTERFACE);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, enables stateless address auto
   configuration on IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6113">nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6113">nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6114">Elimina la voce dell'indirizzo IPv6 nella cache del router adiacente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6114">Delete IPv6 Address entry in the Neighbor Cache</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6115">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6115">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG *ip_address);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6116">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6116">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6117">Questo servizio Elimina una voce della cache di individuazione router adiacente IPv6 per l'indirizzo IP specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6117">This service deletes an IPv6 neighbor discovery cache entry for the supplied IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6118">La funzione NetX IPv4 equivalente è ***nx_arp_static_entry_delete***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6118">The equivalent NetX IPv4 function is ***nx_arp_static_entry_delete***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6119">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6119">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6120">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a istanza IP creata in precedenza</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6120">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6121">**ip_address** Puntatore all'indirizzo IPv6 da eliminare, in ordine byte host</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6121">**ip_address** Pointer to IPv6 address to delete, in host byte order</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6122">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6122">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6123">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha eliminato correttamente l'indirizzo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6123">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully deleted the address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6124">Impossibile trovare l'indirizzo **NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) nella cache del router adiacente IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6124">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Address not found in the IPv6 neighbor cache</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6125">La funzionalità IPv6 **NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) non è integrata nella libreria NETX Duo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6125">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6126">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) un'istanza IP o uno spazio di archiviazione non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6126">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance or storage space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6127">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questo servizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6127">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6128">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6128">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6129">Inizializzazione, thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6129">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6130">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6130">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6131">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6131">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6132">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6132">Example</span></span>

```c
/* This example deletes an entry from the neighbor cache table. */

NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;

ip_address.nxd_ip_address_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0]   = 0x20011234;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1]   = 0x56780000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2]   = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3]   = 1;

/* Delete an entry in the neighbor cache table with the specified IPv6
   address and hardware address. */
status = nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete(&ip_0,
                                   &ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0]);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the entry was deleted from the neighbor cache
   table. */
```

## <a name="nxd_nd_cache_entry_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6149">nxd_nd_cache_entry_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6149">nxd_nd_cache_entry_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6150">Aggiungere un mapping indirizzo/MAC IPv6 alla cache adiacente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6150">Add an IPv6 Address/MAC Mapping to Neighbor Cache</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6151">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6151">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_nd_cache_entry_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    NXD_ADDRESS *dest_ip,
    UINT interface_index, 
    char *mac);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6152">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6152">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6153">Questo servizio aggiunge una voce alla cache di individuazione vicina per l'indirizzo IP specificato *ip_address* mappato all'indirizzo Mac hardware nell'indice dell'interfaccia di rete specificato (interface_index).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6153">This service adds an entry to the neighbor discovery cache for the specified IP address *ip_address* mapped to the hardware MAC address on the specified network interface index (interface_index).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6154">Il servizio NetX IPv4 equivalente è ***nx_arp_static_entry_create***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6154">The equivalent NetX IPv4 service is ***nx_arp_static_entry_create***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6155">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6155">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6156">**ip_ptr** Puntatore a istanza IP creata in precedenza</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6156">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6157">**dest_ip** Puntatore all'istanza di indirizzo IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6157">**dest_ip** Pointer to IPv6 address instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6158">**interface_index** Indice che specifica l'interfaccia di rete fisica in cui è possibile raggiungere l'indirizzo IPv6 di destinazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6158">**interface_index** Index specifying physical network interface where the destination IPv6 address can be reached</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6159">**Mac** Puntatore all'indirizzo hardware.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6159">**mac** Pointer to hardware address.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6160">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6160">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6161">Aggiunta voce **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) completata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6161">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Entry successfully added</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6162">La cache **NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0X43) non è valida o non è disponibile alcuna voce della cache vicina</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6162">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0x43) Invalid cache or no neighbor cache entries available</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6163">La funzionalità IPv6 **NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) non è integrata nella libreria NETX Duo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6163">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6164">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) un'istanza IP o uno spazio di archiviazione non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6164">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance or storage space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6165">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questo servizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6165">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6166">Il valore di indice dell'interfaccia **NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0X4C) non è valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6166">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid interface index value.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6167">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6167">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6168">Inizializzazione, thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6168">Initialization, Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6169">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6169">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6170">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6170">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6171">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6171">Example</span></span>

```c
/* This example adds an entry on the primary network interface to
   the neighbor cache table. */

#define PRIMARY_INTEFACE 0

NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;
UCHAR hw_address[6] = {0x0, 0xcf,0x01,0x02, 0x03, 0x04};
CHAR  *mac;

mac = (CHAR *)&hw_address[0];

ip_address.nxd_ip_address_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0]   = 0x20011234;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1]   = 0x56780000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2]   = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3]   = 1;

/* Create an entry in the neighbor cache table with the specified
   IPv6 address and hardware address. */
status = nxd_nd_cache_entry_set(&ip_0,
                                &ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0],
                                PRIMARY_INTERFACE, mac);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the entry was added to the neighbor
   cache table. */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6190">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6190">Prototype</span></span>

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6191">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6191">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6192">Questo servizio tenta di trovare un indirizzo hardware fisico nella cache di individuazione dei router adiacenti IPv6 associata all'indirizzo IPv6 fornito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6192">This service attempts to find a physical hardware address in the IPv6 neighbor discovery cache that is associated with the supplied IPv6 address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6193">Anche l'indice dell'interfaccia di rete tramite cui è possibile raggiungere il router adiacente viene restituito nel parametro *interface_index.*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6193">The index of the network interface through which the neighbor can be reached is also returned in the parameter *interface_index.*</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6194">Il servizio NetX IPv4 equivalente è ***nx_arp_hardware_address_find***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6194">The equivalent NetX IPv4 service is ***nx_arp_hardware_address_find***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6195">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6195">Parameters</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6212">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6212">Example</span></span>

```c
/* This example inputs an IP address on the primary network in order
   to obtain the hardware address it is mapped to in the neighbor
   cache able. */

NXD_ADDRESS  ip_address;
ULONG physical_msw, physical_lsw;
UINT  interface_index;

ip_address.nxd_ip_address_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0]   = 0x20011234;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1]   = 0x56780000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2]   = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3]   = 1;

/* Obtain the hardware address mapped to the supplied global IPv6
   address. */
status = nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find(&ip_0, &ip_address,
                                            &physical_msw,
                                            &physical_lsw
                                            &interface_index);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, a matching entry was found in the
   neighbor cache table and the hardware address returned in
   variables physical_msw and physical_lsw, the index of the network
   interface through which the neighbor can be reached is stored in
   interface_index. */
```

## <a name="nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6264">nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6264">nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6266">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6266">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    ULONG physical_msw,
    ULONG physical_lsw,
    UINT *interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6267">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6267">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6268">Questo servizio tenta di trovare un indirizzo IPv6 nella cache di individuazione dei router adiacenti IPv6 associata all'indirizzo fisico fornito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6268">This service attempts to find an IPv6 address in the IPv6 neighbor discovery cache that is associated with the supplied physical address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6269">Viene restituito anche l'indice dell'interfaccia di rete tramite cui è possibile raggiungere il router adiacente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6269">The index of the network interface through which the neighbor can be reached is also returned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6270">Il servizio NetX IPv4 equivalente è ***nx_arp_ip_address_find***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6270">The equivalent NetX IPv4 service is ***nx_arp_ip_address_find***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6271">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6271">Parameters</span></span>
