- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6273">**ip_address** Puntatore a una struttura di NXD_ADDRESS valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6273">**ip_address** Pointer to valid NXD_ADDRESS structure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6274">**physical_msw** Primi 16 bit (47-32) dell'indirizzo fisico da trovare, ordine dei byte dell'host</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6274">**physical_msw** Top 16 bits (47-32) of the physical address to find, host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6275">**physical_lsw** Inferiore 32 bit (31-0) dell'indirizzo fisico da trovare, ordine dei byte dell'host</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6275">**physical_lsw** Lower 32 bits (31-0) of the physical address to find, host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6276">**interface_index** Puntatore all'indice del dispositivo di rete tramite il quale è possibile raggiungere l'indirizzo IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6276">**interface_index** Pointer to the network device index through which the IPv6 address can be reached</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6277">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6277">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6278">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha individuato correttamente l'indirizzo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6278">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully found the address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6279">Indirizzo fisico **NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) non trovato nella cache del router adiacente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6279">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Physical address not found in the neighbor cache</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6280">La funzionalità IPv6 **NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) non è integrata nella libreria NETX Duo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6280">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6281">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) un'istanza IP o uno spazio di archiviazione non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6281">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance or storage space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6282">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questo servizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6282">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6283">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** indirizzo Mac (irreversibile 0x4D) è zero.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6283">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) MAC address is zero.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6288">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6288">Example</span></span>

```c
/* This example inputs a hardware address to search on for the
   matching IPv6 global address in the neighbor cache table. */

NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;
ULONG physical_msw = 0xcf;
ULONG physical_lsw = 0x01020304;
UINT  interface_index;

/* Obtain the IPv6 address mapped to the supplied hardware
   Address on the primary device. */
status = nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find(&ip_0, &ip_address,
                                      physical_msw, physical_lsw,
                                      &interface_index);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, a matching entry was found in the
   neighbor cache table and the global IPv6 address returned in
   variable ip_address. */
```

## <a name="nxd_tcp_client_socket_connect"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6305">nxd_tcp_client_socket_connect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6305">nxd_tcp_client_socket_connect</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6306">Creare una connessione TCP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6306">Make a TCP Connection</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6307">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6307">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_tcp_client_socket_connect(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr
    NXD_ADDRESSS *server_ip,
    UINT server_port,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6308">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6308">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6309">Questo servizio esegue la connessione TCP utilizzando un socket client TCP creato in precedenza sulla porta del server specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6309">This service makes TCP connection using a previously created TCP client socket to the specified server's port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6310">Questo servizio funziona su reti IPv4 o IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6310">This service works on either IPv4 or IPv6 networks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6311">Le porte del server TCP valide sono comprese tra 0 e 0xFFFF.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6311">Valid TCP server ports range from 0 through 0xFFFF.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6312">NetX Duo determina l'interfaccia fisica appropriata in base all'indirizzo IP del server.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6312">NetX Duo determines the appropriate physical interface based on the server IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6313">L'equivalente IPv4 NetX è ***nx_tcp_client_socket_connect***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6313">The NetX IPv4 equivalent is ***nx_tcp_client_socket_connect***.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6314">Il socket deve essere stato associato a una porta locale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6314">The socket must have been bound to a local port.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6315">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6315">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6316">**socket_ptr** Puntatore al socket TCP creato in precedenza</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6316">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6317">**server_ip** Puntatore all'indirizzo di destinazione IPv4 o IPv6, in ordine byte host</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6317">**server_ip** Pointer to IPv4 or IPv6 destination address, in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6318">**SERVER_PORT** Numero di porta del server a cui connettersi (da 1 a 0xFFFF), nell'ordine dei byte dell'host</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6318">**server_port** Server port number to connect to (1 through 0xFFFF), in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6319">**WAIT_OPTION** Opzione wait mentre viene stabilita la connessione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6319">**wait_option** Wait option while the connection is being established.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6320">Le opzioni di attesa sono definite come segue:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6320">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6321">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6321">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6322">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6322">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6323">**valore di timeout in cicli (da 0x00000001 a** 0xfffffffe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6323">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6324">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6324">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6325">Connessione socket **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6325">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket connect</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6326">La sospensione richiesta **NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) è stata interrotta da una chiamata al tx_thread_wait_abort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6326">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6327">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) indirizzo IPv4 o IPv6 del server non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6327">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid server IPv4 or IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6328">Il socket **NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) non è associato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6328">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket is not bound</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6329">Il socket **NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) non è in uno stato chiuso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6329">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) Socket is not in a closed state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6330">**NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0x37) non è stata specificata alcuna attesa. il tentativo di connessione è in corso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6330">**NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0x37) No wait was specified, connection attempt is in progress</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6331">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) indice di interfaccia non valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6331">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid interface index.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6332">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0X50) l'interfaccia di rete non dispone di un indirizzo IPv6 valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6332">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) The network interface does not have valid IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6333">TCP **NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) non abilitato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6333">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP not enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6334">Porta **NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6334">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Invalid port</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6335">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore al socket non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6335">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6336">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questo servizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6336">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6337">La connessione **NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) non riesce.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6337">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) Connection fails.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6338">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6338">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6339">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6339">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6340">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6340">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6341">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6341">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6342">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6342">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS peer_ip_address;
ULONG       peer_port;

/* Set Peer IPv6 address */
peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0] = 0x20010000;
peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1] = 0;
peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2] = 0;
peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3] = 0x101;

/* Set peer port number */
peer_port = 2563;

/* Connect to the peer */
status = nxd_tcp_client_socket_connect(socket_ptr,
                                       &peer_ip_address,
                                       peer_port, NX_WAIT_FOREVER);
```

## <a name="nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6366">nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6366">nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6367">Recupera il numero di porta e l'indirizzo IP del socket TCP peer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6367">Retrieves Peer TCP Socket IP Address and Port Number</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6368">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6368">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get
    (NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *peer_ip_address,
    ULONG *peer_port);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6369">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6369">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6370">Questo servizio recupera le informazioni sull'indirizzo IP e sulla porta del peer per il socket TCP connesso tramite la rete IPv4 o IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6370">This service retrieves peer IP address and port information for the connected TCP socket over either IPv4 or IPv6 network.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6371">Il servizio NetX IPv4 equivalente è ***nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6371">The equivalent NetX IPv4 service is ***nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get***.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6372">Si noti che *socket_ptr* deve puntare a un socket TCP che si trova già nello stato connesso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6372">Note that *socket_ptr* must point to a TCP socket that is already in the connected state.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6373">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6373">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6374">**socket_ptr** Puntatore al socket TCP connesso all'host peer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6374">**socket_ptr** Pointer to TCP socket connected to peer host</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6375">**peer_ip_address** Puntatore a indirizzo peer IPv4 o IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6375">**peer_ip_address** Pointer to IPv4 or IPv6 peer address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6376">L'indirizzo IP restituito è nell'ordine dei byte dell'host.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6376">The returned IP address is in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6377">**peer_port** Puntatore al numero di porta peer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6377">**peer_port** Pointer to peer port number.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6378">Il numero di porta restituito è nell'ordine dei byte dell'host.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6378">The returned port number is in host byte order.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6379">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6379">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6380">Recupero delle informazioni sul socket **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) completato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6380">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Socket information successfully retrieved</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6381">Socket **NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) non connesso al peer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6381">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) Socket not connected to peer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6382">TCP **NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) non abilitato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6382">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP not enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6383">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) input puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6383">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6384">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questo servizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6384">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6385">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6385">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6386">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6386">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6387">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6387">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6388">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6388">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6389">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6389">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS  peer_ip_address;
ULONG        peer_port;

/* Get TCP socket information. */
status = nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get(socket_ptr, &peer_ip_address,
                                      &peer_port);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the service returns valid peer info: */
if(peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_version == NX_IP_VERSION_V4)
    /* Peer IP address is stored in
       peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v4 */

if(peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_version == NX_IP_VERSION_V6)
    /* Peer IP address is stored in
       peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6 */
```

## <a name="nxd_udp_packet_info_extract"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6413">nxd_udp_packet_info_extract</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6413">nxd_udp_packet_info_extract</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6414">Estrai parametri di rete dal pacchetto UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6414">Extract network parameters from UDP packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6415">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6415">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_udp_packet_info_extract(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    UINT *protocol,
    UINT *port,
    UINT *interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6416">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6416">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6417">Questo servizio estrae i parametri di rete da un pacchetto ricevuto nelle reti UDP IPv4 o IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6417">This service extracts network parameters from a packet received on either IPv4 or IPv6 UDP networks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6418">Il servizio equivalente NetX è ***nx_udp_packet_info_extract.***</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6418">The NetX equivalent service is ***nx_udp_packet_info_extract.***</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6419">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6419">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6420">**packet_ptr** Puntatore al pacchetto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6420">**packet_ptr** Pointer to packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6421">**ip_address** Puntatore all'indirizzo IP del mittente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6421">**ip_address** Pointer to sender IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6422">**protocollo** di Puntatore al protocollo da restituire.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6422">**protocol** Pointer to protocol to be returned.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6423">**porta** Puntatore al numero di porta del mittente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6423">**port** Pointer to sender’s port number.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6424">**interface_index** Puntatore all'indice dell'interfaccia di rete da cui viene ricevuto il pacchetto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6424">**interface_index** Pointer to the index of the network interface from which this packet is received</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6425">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6425">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6426">Estrazione dei dati dell'interfaccia di pacchetti **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) completata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6426">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Packet interface data successfully extracted.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6427">Il pacchetto **NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) non è né IPv4 né IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6427">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) Packet is neither IPv4 or IPv6.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6428">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) input puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6428">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6429">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questo servizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6429">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6430">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6430">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6431">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6431">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6432">Precedenza possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6432">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6433">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6433">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6434">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6434">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Extract network data from UDP packet interface.*/
status = nxd_udp_packet_info_extract(packet_ptr, &ip_address,
                                    &protocol, &port,
                                    &interface_index);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS packet data was successfully retrieved.*/
```

## <a name="nxd_udp_socket_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6457">nxd_udp_socket_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6457">nxd_udp_socket_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6458">Inviare un datagramma UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6458">Send a UDP Datagram</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6459">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6459">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_udp_socket_send(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    UINT port);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6460">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6460">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6461">Questo servizio invia un datagramma UDP tramite un socket UDP precedentemente creato e associato per le reti IPv4 o IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6461">This service sends a UDP datagram through a previously created and bound UDP socket for either IPv4 or IPv6 networks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6462">NetX Duo trova un indirizzo IP locale appropriato come indirizzo di origine in base all'indirizzo IP di destinazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6462">NetX Duo finds a suitable local IP address as source address based on the destination IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6463">Per specificare un'interfaccia e un indirizzo IP di origine specifici, l'applicazione deve usare il servizio ***nxd_udp_socket_source_send*** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6463">To specify a specific interface and source IP address, the application should use the ***nxd_udp_socket_source_send*** service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6464">Si noti che questo servizio viene restituito immediatamente, indipendentemente dal fatto che il datagramma UDP sia stato inviato correttamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6464">Note that this service returns immediately regardless of whether the UDP datagram was successfully sent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6465">Il servizio equivalente NetX (IPv4) è ***nx_udp_socket_send***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6465">The NetX (IPv4) equivalent service is ***nx_udp_socket_send***.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6466">Il socket deve essere associato a una porta locale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6466">The socket must be bound to a local port.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6467">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6467">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6468">**socket_ptr** Puntatore all'istanza Socket UDP creata in precedenza</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6468">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6469">**packet_ptr** Puntatore al pacchetto del datagramma UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6469">**packet_ptr** UDP datagram packet pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6470">**ip_address** Puntatore a indirizzo IPv4 o IPv6 di destinazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6470">**ip_address** Pointer to destination IPv4 or IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6471">**porta** Numero di porta di destinazione valido compreso tra 1 e 0xFFFF), in ordine byte host</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6471">**port** Valid destination port number between 1 and 0xFFFF), in host byte order</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6472">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6472">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6473">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) trasmissione socket UDP riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6473">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful UDP socket send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6474">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) indirizzo IPv4 o IPv6 del server non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6474">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid server IPv4 or IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6475">Socket **NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) non associato ad alcuna porta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6475">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket not bound to any port</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6476">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0X50) non è possibile trovare un'interfaccia in uscita adatta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6476">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) No suitable outgoing interface can be found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6477">Lo spazio di **NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) non è sufficiente per l'intestazione UDP nel pacchetto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6477">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Not enough room for UDP header in the packet</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6478">Puntatore di aggiunta pacchetto di **NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6478">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Packet append pointer is invalid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6479">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore a socket non valido, puntatore all'indirizzo o puntatore al pacchetto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6479">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer, address pointer, or packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6480">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questo servizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6480">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6481">Il **NX_NOT_ENABLED** UDP (0x14) non è stato abilitato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6481">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) UDP has not been enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6482">Il numero di porta **NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) non è compreso in un intervallo valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6482">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Port number is not within a valid range</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6486">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6486">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6487">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6487">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address, server_address;

/* Set the UDP Client IPv6 address. */
ip_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0] = 0x20010000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1] = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2] = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3] = 1;

/* Set the UDP server IPv6 address to send to. */
server_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0] = 0x20010000;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1] = 0;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2] = 0;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3] = 2;

/* Set the global address (indicated by the 64 bit prefix) using the
   IPv6 address just created on the primary device (index 0). We
   don’t need the index into the address table, so the last argument
   is set to null. */

interface_index = 0;
status = nxd_ipv6_address_set(&client_ip, interface_index,
                              &ip_address, 64, NX_NULL);

/* Create the UDP socket client_socket with the ip_address and
   allocate a packet pointed to by packet_ptr (not shown). */

/* Send a packet to the UDP server at server_address on port 12. */
status = nxd_udp_socket_send(&client_socket, packet_ptr,
                             &server_address, 12);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the UDP host successfully transmitted
   the packet out the UDP socket to the server. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6513">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6513">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6514">Questo servizio invia un datagramma UDP tramite un socket UDP precedentemente creato e associato per le reti IPv4 o IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6514">This service sends a UDP datagram through a previously created and bound UDP socket for either IPv4 or IPv6 networks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6515">Il parametro *address_index* specifica l'indirizzo IP di origine da utilizzare per il pacchetto in uscita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6515">The parameter *address_index* specifies the source IP address to use for the outgoing packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6516">Si noti che la funzione viene restituita immediatamente, indipendentemente dal fatto che il datagramma UDP sia stato inviato correttamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6516">Note that the function returns immediately regardless of whether the UDP datagram was successfully sent.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6517">Il socket deve essere associato a una porta locale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6517">The socket must be bound to a local port.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6518">Il servizio equivalente NetX (IPv4) è ***nx_udp_socket_source_send***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6518">The NetX (IPv4) equivalent service is ***nx_udp_socket_source_send***.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6541">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6541">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address, server_address;
UINT address_index;

/* Set the UDP Client IPv6 address. */
ip_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0] = 0x20010000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1] = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2] = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3] = 1;

/* Set the UDP server IPv6 address to send to. */
server_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0] = 0x20010000;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1] = 0;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2] = 0;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3] = 2;

/* Set the global address (indicated by the 64 bit prefix) using the IPv6
   address just created on the primary device (index 0). The address index
   is needed for nxd_udp_socket_source_send. */

status = nxd_ipv6_address_set(&client_ip, 0,
                              &ip_address, 64, &address_index);

/* Create the UDP socket client_socket with the ip_address and
   allocate a packet pointed to by packet_ptr (not shown). */

/* Send a packet to the UDP server at server_address on port 12. */
status = nxd_udp_socket_source_send(&client_socket, packet_ptr,
                                    &server_address, 12, address_index);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the UDP host successfully transmitted the
   packet out the UDP socket to the server. */
```

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="4be0a-6583">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4be0a-6583">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;
UINT         port;

/* Create the UDP socket client_socket and
   allocate the packet pointed to by packet_ptr (not shown). */

/* Extract the IP address and port of the packet received on the UDP
   socket specified in the packet interface. */
status = nxd_udp_source_extract(&packet_ptr, &ip_address, &port);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the source IP address and port of the
   packet received on the UDP socket was successfully extracted. */
```
